    16                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    17                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    18                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    19                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    20                                        
    21                                  ;------ Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    22                                  ;	at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    23                                  ;	moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    24                                  ;	Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    25                                  ;	SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    26                                  ;	(MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    27                                  
    28                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    29                                  
    30                                  ;bpbx		struc ;	(sizeof=0x19)	
    31                                  ;
    32                                  ;bytespersec	dw ?			; base 10
    33                                  ;secperclust	db ?			; base 10
    34                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    35                                  ;numfats	db ?			; base 10
    36                                  ;rootdirents	dw ?			; base 10
    37                                  ;totalsize16	dw ?			; base 10
    38                                  ;mediaid	db ?
    39                                  ;fatsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    40                                  ;secpertrack	dw ?			; base 10
    41                                  ;heads		dw ?			; base 10
    42                                  ;hiddensecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    43                                  ;hiddensecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    44                                  ;totalsecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    45                                  ;totalsecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    46                                  ;
    47                                  ;bpbx		ends
    48

   139                                  ;	  block of io.sys is, in fact, at cluster 2. This would be saving
   140                                  ;	  a whole lot of time during system debugging.
   141                                  ;
   142                                  ;============================================================================
   143                                  ;
   144                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   145                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   146                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   147                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   148                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   149                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   150                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   151                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   152                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the
   153                                  ;	     extention of msboot program.

   252                                  ;   ds:si = original rom bios diskette parameter table.
   253                                  ;

   256                                  ; extended boot record.

   260                                  ;
   261                                  ;   bx = first data sector on disk
   262                                  ;
   263                                  ;   MediaByte = input ch
   264                                  ;   BootDrive = input dl
   265                                  ;   FirstSectorL = input bx
   266                                  ;   FirstSectorH = input AX, if an extended boot record.;j.k.
   267                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.
   268                                  ;   TotalSectorsH = high word of the above
   269                                  ;   HiddenSectorsL = hidden secotrs

   271                                  ;   ReservSectors = reserved sectors
   272                                  ;   SecPerTrack = sectors/track
   273                                  ;   NumHeads = heads/cylinder

   275                                  ;   ds = 0

   470 000000B1 890E[2200]              		mov	[FirstSectorH], cx
   471 000000B5 890E[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], cx ; **!**

   473                                  		; here, DI points to FatStartSecL
   474                                  set_fat_start:
   475                                  		; 24/12/2022
   476                                  		; dx:ax = HiddenSectors
   477                                  		; bx = ReservSectors

   480 000000BB 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0

   486 000000C1 AB                      		stosw

   488 000000C4 AB                      		stosw		
   489                                  	
   490                                  ; Relocate
   491                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   492                                  ;
   493                                  ; NOTES:
   494                                  ;
   495                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   496                                  ;
   497                                  ; INPUT:     none
   498                                  ;
   499                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   500                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   501                                  ;
   502                                  ; calls:     none
   503                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   504                                  ;
   505                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   506                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   507                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   508                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   509                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   510                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   511                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   512                                  ;
   513                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   514                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   515                                  ;
   516                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   517                                  ;
   518                                  ; jump to relocated code
   519                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   520                                  
   521                                  relocate:
   522                                  		; 24/12/2022
   523                                  		;cld
   524                                  
   525 000000C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si
   526 000000C7 89F7                    		mov	di, si
   527 000000C9 CD12                    		int	12h		; MEMORY SIZE -
   528                                  					; Return: AX = number of contiguous 1K blocks of memory
   529 000000CB B106                    		mov	cl, 6
   530 000000CD D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl		; Memory size in paragraphs
   531                                  
   532                                  ;------ Check if an RPL program is present at TOM and do not tromp over it
   533                                  
   534                                  		; 10/12/2022
   535                                  		; ds = 0
   536                                  		; 24/12/2022
   537                                  		; ds = cs
   538 000000CF 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
   539 000000D1 8EDB                    		mov	ds, bx		; ZERO
   540                                  		
   541                                  		;mov	bx, [DskAddr+44h] ; 2Fh*4 (Int 2Fh)
   542                                  		;mov	ds, [DskAddr+46h] ; 2Fh*4+2
   543                                  		; 10/12/2022
   544 000000D3 8B1EBC00                		mov	bx, [2Fh*4]	; (Int 2Fh)
   545 000000D7 8E1EBE00                		mov	ds, [2Fh*4+2]		
   546                                  
   547                                  		;cmp	word ptr [bx+3], 'PR'
   548                                  		; 09/12/2022
   549 000000DB 817F035250              		cmp	word [bx+3], 'RP' ; 'RPL'
   550 000000E0 750F                    		jnz	short Skip_RPL
   551 000000E2 807F054C                		cmp	byte [bx+5], 'L'
   552 000000E6 7509                    		jnz	short Skip_RPL
   553 000000E8 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; get TOM into DX
   554 000000EA B8064A                  		mov	ax, 4A06h	; (multMULT shl	8) + multMULTRPLTOM
   555 000000ED CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; Get new TOM from any RPL
   556 000000EF 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
   557                                  Skip_RPL:
   558                                  		; 24/12/2022
   559 000000F1 0E                      		push	cs
   560 000000F2 1F                      		pop	ds	; 25/12/2022
   561                                  
   562 000000F3 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
   563 000000F5 8B16[1200]              		mov	dx, [BytesPerSec] ; 24/12/2022
   564                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
   565 000000F9 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl
   566 000000FB 42                      		inc	dx
   567 000000FC 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
   568 000000FE A3[3000]                		mov	[FatSegment], ax ; 24/12/2022
   569                                  		;mov	[cs:FatSegment], ax ; This will be used for fat sector
   570                                  		; 22/12/2022
   571                                  		;mov	dx, EndOfLoader
   572 00000101 BA[9004]                		mov	dx, EndOfLoader+256
   573                                  				; loader size + temporary/local stack space (*)
   574 00000104 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl
   575 00000106 42                      		inc	dx
   576 00000107 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
   577 00000109 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax	; ES:DI -> place be relocated.
   578                                  		; 22/12/2022
   579 0000010B 4A                      		dec	dx
   580 0000010C D3E2                    		shl	dx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes (*)	
   581                                  				; (stack pointer will be set to this offset)
   582                                  		; 24/12/2022
   583                                  		;push	cs
   584                                  		;pop	ds		; DS:SI -> source
   585                                  
   586 0000010E B9[9003]                		mov	cx, EndOfLoader
   587 00000111 F3A4                    		rep movsb
   588                                  
   589 00000113 06                      		push	es
   590 00000114 B8[1901]                		mov	ax, SetupStack
   591 00000117 50                      		push	ax		; Massage stack for destin of CS:IP
   592 00000118 CB                      		retf
   593                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   594                                  
   595                                  ; Start of relocated code
   596                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   597                                  ;
   598                                  ; Move the stack to just under the boot record and relocation area (0:7c00h)
   599                                  ;
   600                                  
   601                                  SetupStack:	
   602                                  		; 22/12/202		; ...
   603                                  		;mov	ax, cs		; Start	of relocated code
   604                                  		;mov	ss, ax
   605                                  		;;mov	sp, NumHeads	; StackPtr offset
   606                                  		; 20/12/2022
   607                                  		;mov	sp, StackPtr	; StackPtr offset
   608                                  		
   609                                  ; 22/12/2022
   610                                  ; (set a temporary stack just above the relocated loader code)
   611                                  ; ((instead of using/reserving 256 bytes of stack space in 'IO.SYS' file))
   612                                  
   613                                  		; 22/12/2022
   614                                  		; cs = loader segment (relocated)
   615                                  		; dx = loader size + stack space (*) -paragraph aligned-
   616

   623 00000122 FB                      		sti
   624                                  
   625                                  ; FindClusterSize
   626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   627                                  ;
   628                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   629                                  ;
   630                                  ; OUTPUT:
   631                                  ;
   632                                  ;	ds = 0
   633                                  ;	ax = bytes/cluster
   634                                  ;	bx = sectors/cluster
   635                                  ;	si destroyed
   636                                  ; calls:     none
   637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   638                                  ;
   639                                  ; get bytes/sector from bpb
   640                                  ;
   641                                  ; get sectors/cluster from bpb
   642                                  ;
   643                                  ; bytes/cluster = bytes/sector * sector/cluster
   644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   645                                  
   646                                  FindClusterSize:
   647                                  
   648                                  ;for the time being just ASSUME the boot record is valid and the bpb is there.
   649

   652                                  		;xor	ax, ax
   653                                  		;mov	ds, ax

   664                                  
   665                                  ; CalcFatSize
   666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   667                                  ;
   668                                  ; NOTES:
   669                                  ;
   670                                  ;   Determine if fat is 12 or 16 bit fat. 12 bit fat if floppy, read mbr
   671                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   672                                  ;
   673                                  ; INPUT:
   674                                  ;
   675                                  ; OUTPUT:
   676                                  ;
   677                                  ;   CS:FatSize = FAT_12_BIT or FAT_16_BIT
   678                                  ;   all other registers destroyed
   679                                  ;
   680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   681                                  
   682                                  CalcFatSize:
   683                                  		; 24/12/2022
   684                                  		; ds = cs
   685 0000012D C606[2500]01            		mov	byte [Fatsize], 1
   686                                  		;mov	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1 ; FAT_12_BIT (assume)
   687                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:TotalSectorsH]
   688                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TotalSectorsL] ; DX:AX = total disk sectors
   689 00000132 8B16[1E00]              		mov	dx, [TotalSectorsH]
   690 00000136 A1[1C00]                		mov	ax, [TotalSectorsL] ; DX:AX = total disk sectors
   691                                  		;;;		
   692                                  ; 24/12/2202
   693                                  %if 0
   694                                  		sub	ax, [ReservSectors]
   695                                  		;sub	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
   696                                  		sbb	dx, 0		; DX:AX	= Total	avail sectors
   697                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerFat]
   698                                  		mov	bx, [SecPerFat]
   699                                  		shl	bx, 1		; (Assume 2 FATs)
   700                                  		sub	ax, bx
   701                                  		sbb	dx, 0
   702                                  		;mov	bx, [7C11h]	; Root directory entry count
   703                                  		mov	bx, [RootDirEntries]
   704                                  		mov	cl, 4
   705                                  		shr	bx, cl		; BX = Total directory sectors
   706                                  		sub	ax, bx
   707                                  		sbb	dx, 0		; DX:AX	= Sectors in data area
   708                                  %endif
   709                                  		; 24/12/2022
   710 00000139 2B06[2000]              		sub	ax, [FirstSectorL] ; total sectors - start of data
   711 0000013D 1B16[2200]              		sbb	dx, [FirstSectorH]
   712                                  				; DX:AX	= Sectors in data area
   713                                  		;;;
   714                                  		;xor	cx, cx
   715                                  		;mov	cl, [7C0Dh]	; Sectors per cluster
   716 00000141 8B0E[1400]              		mov	cx, [SecPerCluster] ; *#*
   717 00000145 50                      		push	ax
   718 00000146 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
   719 00000148 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
   720 0000014A F7F1                    		div	cx  ; *#*
   721                                  		; 24/12/2022

   723                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax

   726 0000014F 3DF60F                  		cmp	ax, 4086	; 4096-10
   727 00000152 7205                    		jb	short ReadInFirstClusters ; 12 bit FAT
   728                                  		;mov	byte [cs:Fatsize], 4 ; FAT_16_BIT
   729 00000154 C606[2500]04            		mov	byte [Fatsize], 4 ; FAT_16_BIT
   730                                  
   731                                  ; ReadInFirstClusters
   732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   733                                  ;
   734                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   735                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   736                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   737                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   738                                  ;
   739                                  ; INPUT:
   740                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   741                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   742                                  ;
   743                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   744                                  ;   ClusterSize
   745                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   746                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   747                                  ;
   748                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   749                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   750                                  ;
   751                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   752                                  ; logic:
   753                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   754                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   755                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   756                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   757                                  ;	read in so far.
   758                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   759                                  
   760                                  ; 09/12/2022
   761                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   762                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   763                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   764                                  	
   765                                  ReadInFirstClusters:
   766                                  		; 24/12/2022
   767                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   768                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   769                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   770                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   771                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2
   772                                  		;;mov	[cs:CurrentCluster], ax ;  Initialize to this cluster
   773                                  		; 24/12/2022
   774                                  		; ds = cs
   775                                  		;mov	[CurrentCluster], ax
   776                                  		; 24/12/2022
   777                                  		; [CurrentCluster] = word [51Ah] - 2
   778                                  
   779                                  		;mov	ax, IbmLoadSize
   780 00000159 B80300                  		mov	ax, 3		; Load the 3rd and other IO.SYS	sectors
   781 0000015C F6F1                    		div	cl ; *#*
   782                                  		;div	byte [SecPerCluster]
   783                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   784                                  					; AL = total cluster read in
   785                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster
   786                                  		; 10/12/2022
   787 0000015E 20E4                    		and	ah, ah
   788                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   789 00000160 7433                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster
   790                                  
   791 00000162 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
   792 00000164 50                      		push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader
   793                                  					; already read in
   794                                  ; 24/12/2022
   795                                  %if 0		
   796                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorL] ;	Put starting sector of disk data
   797                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   798                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   799                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], cx
   800                                  		mul	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   801                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   802                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   803                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   804                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   805                                  		dec	ax
   806                                  		dec	ax
   807                                  		xor	bx, bx
   808                                  		mov	bl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
   809                                  		mul	bx		; DX:AX = logical start sector
   810                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax
   811                                  		adc	[cs:StartSecH], dx
   812                                  					; abs start sector for next read of
   813                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster
   814                                  		pop	ax
   815                                  		push	ax
   816                                  		mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
   817                                  		;mov	di, BiosOffset
   818                                  		mov	di, 700h	; IO.SYS offset	(segment = 0)
   819                                  		add	di, ax
   820                                  		xor	ax, ax
   821                                  		mov	es, ax		; ES = segment 0
   822                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]
   823                                  					; Read in the entire last cluster
   824                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax
   825                                  		call	ReadSectors
   826                                  		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader
   827                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   828                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...
   829                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clusters read in based 2
   830                                  		add	[cs:CurrentCluster], ax
   831                                  		dec	ax		; CurrentCluster = Last	cluster	read
   832                                  					; AX = number of clusters loaded
   833                                  %endif
   834                                  		; 24/12/2022
   835                                  		; ds =cs
   836                                  		;mov	cx, [FirstSectorL] ; Put starting sector of disk data
   837                                  		;mov	[StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   838                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   839                                  		;mov	[StartSecH], cx
   840                                  		; [StartSecL] = [FirstSectorL] ; **!**
   841                                  		; [StartSecH] = [FirstSectorH] ; **!**
   842                                  		
   843                                  		; 24/12/2022
   844                                  		; cx = [SecPerCluster]  ; *#*
   845                                  
   846                                  		;mul	byte [SecPerCluster]
   847 00000165 F6E1                    		mul	cl ; *#*
   848 00000167 0106[0600]              		add	[StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   849 0000016B 8316[0800]00            		adc	word [StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   850                                  
   851                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   852                                  		;dec	ax
   853                                  		;dec	ax
   854 00000170 A1[1000]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster]
   855                                  		; ax = word [51Ah] - 2
   856                                  		
   857                                  		;;xor	bx, bx
   858                                  		;;mov	bl, [SecPerCluster]
   859                                  		;mov	bx, [SecPerCluster]
   860                                  		;mul	bx		; DX:AX = logical start sector
   861 00000173 F7E1                    		mul	cx  ; [SecPerCluster]  ; *#*
   862                                  
   863 00000175 0106[0600]              		add	[StartSecL], ax
   864 00000179 1116[0800]              		adc	[StartSecH], dx
   865                                  					; abs start sector for next read of
   866                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster
   867 0000017D 58                      		pop	ax
   868 0000017E 50                      		push	ax
   869 0000017F F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
   870                                  		;mov	di, BiosOffset
   871 00000183 BF0007                  		mov	di, 700h	; IO.SYS offset	(segment = 0)
   872 00000186 01C7                    		add	di, ax
   873 00000188 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
   874 0000018A 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES = segment 0
   875                                  		; 24/12/2022

   877                                  		;			; Read in the entire last cluster
   878                                  		;mov	[SectorCount], ax
   879 0000018C 890E[0E00]              		mov	[SectorCount], cx ; [SecPerCluster]  ; *#*
   880                                  		
   881 00000190 E86700                  		call	ReadSectors
   882 00000193 58                      		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader
   883 00000194 40                      		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   884                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...
   885 00000195 40                      		inc	ax		; AX = total clusters read in based 2
   886 00000196 0106[1000]              		add	[CurrentCluster], ax
   887 0000019A 48                      		dec	ax		; CurrentCluster = Last	cluster	read
   888                                  					; AX = number of clusters loaded

   890                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   892                                  ;
   893                                  ; NOTES:
   894                                  ;
   895                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
   896                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
   897                                  ;
   898                                  ; INPUT:
   899                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
   900                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
   901                                  ;
   902                                  ; OUTPUT:
   903                                  ;	ES = 70h
   904                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
   905                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
   906                                  ;
   907                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
   908                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
   909                                  ;
   910                                  ; calls:     none
   911                                  ;
   912                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   913                                  ;
   914                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
   915                                  ;
   916                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
   917                                  ;
   918                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
   919                                  ;
   920                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   921                                  
   922                                  SaveLoadedBios:
   923 0000019B 1E                      		push	ds
   924                                  		; 24/12/2022
   925                                  		; ds = cs
   926                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
   927 0000019C F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
   928                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
   929                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
   930                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
   931                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
   932                                  
   933 000001A0 2D[9003]                		sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
   934 000001A3 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
   935 000001A5 B87000                  		mov	ax, 70h		; Segment at 70h
   936 000001A8 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
   937 000001AA 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
   938 000001AC BE[9003]                		mov	si, EndOfLoader ; EndOfLoader
   939 000001AF 31FF                    		xor	di, di
   940 000001B1 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Relocate this code to 0070h:0000h
   941                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di
   942                                  		;;mov	[cs:NextBioLocation], di
   943                                  
   944                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
   945                                  
   946 000001B3 1F                      		pop	ds		; Save where location for next read
   947                                  
   948                                  ; GetContigClusters
   949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   950                                  ;
   951                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
   952                                  ;
   953                                  ;
   954                                  ; INPUT:
   955                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
   956                                  ;   CS:
   957                                  ;
   958                                  ; OUTPUT:
   959                                  ;
   960                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
   961                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   962                                  ;
   963                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
   964                                  ;
   965                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
   966                                  ;
   967                                  ;Call check_for_eof
   968                                  ;
   969                                  ;if (nc returned)
   970                                  ;
   971                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
   972                                  ;
   973                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
   974                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
   975                                  ;
   976                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
   977                                  ;
   978                                  ;	 if (nc returned)
   979                                  ;
   980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   981                                  
   982                                  ; 09/12/2022
   983                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
   984                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
   985                                  
   986                                  GetContigClusters:
   987                                  
   988                                  ; 24/12/2022
   989                                  %if 0	
   990                                  		xor	ah, ah
   991                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
   992                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
   993                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
   994                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
   995                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
   996                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
   997                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
   998                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
   999                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1000                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1001                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1002                                  		dec	ax
  1003                                  		dec	ax
  1004                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1005                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1006                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1007                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1008                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1009                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1010                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1011                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1012                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1013                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1014                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1015                                  		mov	es, ax
  1016                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1017                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1018                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1019                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1020                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1021                                  
  1022                                  %endif
  1023                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1024                                  		; ds = cs
  1025                                  
  1026 000001B4 A1[1400]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1027 000001B7 A3[0E00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1028                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]
  1029 000001BA 50                      		push	ax
  1030 000001BB E8B900                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1031 000001BE 8F06[0E00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]
  1032 000001C2 A3[1000]                		mov	[CurrentCluster], ax	; Update the last one found
  1033                                  
  1034 000001C5 803E[2700]FF            		cmp	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh	; END_OF_FILE
  1035 000001CA 741A                    		je	short GoToBioInit ; 23/12/2022
  1036                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1037                                  		;xor	dx, dx ; * (not required)
  1038                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1039                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1040 000001CC 48                      		dec	ax
  1041 000001CD 48                      		dec	ax
  1042                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1043                                  		; ax = cluster index
  1044                                  		;mov	cx, [SecPerCluster]
  1045                                  		;mul	cx ; *			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1046 000001CE F726[1400]              		mul	word [SecPerCluster]
  1047 000001D2 0306[2000]              		add	ax, [FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1048 000001D6 1316[2200]              		adc	dx, [FirstSectorH]
  1049 000001DA A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax		; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1050 000001DD 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx
  1051                                  
  1052                                  		; es:di = (current) buffer address for (current) read
  1053

  1055                                  				; ES:DI = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1056                                  		
  1057 000001E4 EBCE                    		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1058                                  
  1059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1060                                  
  1061                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1063                                  ;
  1064                                  ; NOTES:
  1065                                  ;
  1066                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1067                                  ;
  1068                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1069                                  ;
  1070                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1071                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1072                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1073                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1074                                  ;
  1075                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1076                                  ;
  1077                                  ;   required by msinit
  1078                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1079                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1080                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1081                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1082                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1083                                  ;
  1084                                  ; calls:     none
  1085                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1086                                  ;
  1087                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1088                                  ;
  1089                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1090                                  
  1091                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1092                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1093                                  		; ds = cs	
  1094                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1095                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1096                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1097                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1098                                  
  1099 000001E6 8A2E[2600]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1100 000001EA 8A16[2400]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1101 000001EE 8B1E[2000]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1102 000001F2 A1[2200]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1103                                  
  1104 000001F5 EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1105                                  
  1106                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1107                                  
  1108                                  ; ReadSectors
  1109                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1110                                  ; notES:
  1111                                  ;
  1112                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1113                                  ;
  1114                                  ;
  1115                                  ; INPUT:
  1116                                  ;
  1117                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1118                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1119                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1120                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1121                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1122                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1123                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1124                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1125                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1126                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1127                                  ;
  1128                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1129                                  ;
  1130                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1131                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1132                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1133                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1134                                  ;
  1135                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1136                                  ;
  1137                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1138                                  ;
  1139                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1140                                  ;
  1141                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1142                                  ;
  1143                                  ; do the read
  1144                                  ;
  1145                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1146                                  ;
  1147                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1148                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1149                                  ;
  1150                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1151                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1152                                  
  1153                                  ReadSectors:
  1154                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1155                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1156                                  ReadSectors:

  1158

  1203                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1204                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)

  1210                                  		or	di, di
  1211                                  		jz	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for the 1st read
  1212                                  		;cmp	byte [BootDrive], 80h
  1213                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1214                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1215                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1216                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1217                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1218                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1219                                  		push	dx
  1220                                  		push	ax

  1223                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1224                                  		mov	bx, es

  1226                                  		shl	bx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes
  1227                                  		; bx = segment start position (for 64K memory sections)
  1228                                  		add	bx, ax	; byte count to read
  1229                                  		pop	ax
  1230                                  		pop	dx

  1232                                  		jnc	short dma_boundary_ok
  1233                                  		
  1234                                  		; Sector count must be decreased to prevent
  1235                                  		; DMA boundary error or segment override risk!

  1239                                  %endif

  1268 0000023D 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits

  1372                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1373                                  
  1374                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1375                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1376                                  ;
  1377                                  ; NOTES:
  1378                                  ;
  1379                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1380                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1381                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1382                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1383                                  ;
  1384                                  ; INPUT:
  1385                                  ;
  1386                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1387                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1388                                  ;
  1389                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1390                                  ;
  1391                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1392                                  ;
  1393                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1394                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1395                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1396                                  ;
  1397                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1398                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1399                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1400                                  ;     else
  1401                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1402                                  ;
  1403                                  ; else
  1404                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1405                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1406                                  ;     else
  1407                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1408                                  ;
  1409                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1410                                  ;
  1411                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1412                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1413                                  ;
  1414                                  ;	 else
  1415                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1416                                  ;	}
  1417                                  ;    }
  1418                                  ;
  1419                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1420                                  
  1421                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1422                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1423                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1424                                  
  1425                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1426 00000277 06                      		push	es
  1427                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1428                                  		; ds = cs
  1429                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1430 00000278 A1[3000]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1431 0000027B 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1432                                  		; 09/12/2022

  1434                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1435                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1436                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1437                                  		; ds = cs
  1438 0000027D C606[2700]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1439 00000282 A1[1000]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1440 00000285 803E[2500]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1441                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1442                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1443 0000028A 7537                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1444 0000028C 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1445 0000028E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1446 00000290 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1447                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1448                                  		;push	dx
  1449                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1450 00000292 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1451 00000294 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1452                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1453                                  		;pop	dx
  1454 00000297 7510                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1455 00000299 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1456                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1457                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1458                                  		;push	ax ; (*)
  1459 0000029C 46                      		inc	si
  1460                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1461                                  		;push	dx
  1462 0000029D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1463 0000029F E83C00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1464                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1465                                  		;pop	dx
  1466                                  		; 22/12/2022

  1468                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1469                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1470                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1471                                  		;pop	ax ; (*) 
  1472 000002A2 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1473 000002A7 EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1474                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1475                                  
  1476                                  ClusterOk:				
  1477 000002A9 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1478                                  EvenOdd:	
  1479                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1480                                  		; ds = cs
  1481 000002AC F606[1000]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1482                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1483                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1484                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1485 000002B1 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1486 000002B3 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1487 000002B6 EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1489                                  
  1490                                  OddResult:

  1492 000002BA D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1493                                  TestEOF:

  1495 000002BF 731B                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1496 000002C1 EB14                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster

  1524                                  
  1525                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1526                                  
  1527                                  ; GetFatSector
  1528                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1529                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1530                                  ;
  1531                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1532                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1533                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1534                                  ;
  1535                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1536                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1537                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1538                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1539                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1540                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1541                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1542                                  ;
  1543                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1544                                  
  1545                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1546                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1547                                  GetFatSector:
  1548 000002DE 50                      		push	ax
  1549 000002DF 56                      		push	si
  1550 000002E0 57                      		push	di
  1551 000002E1 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1552                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1553                                  		; ds = cs
  1554                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1555                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1556 000002E3 F736[1200]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1557 000002E7 3B06[0C00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1558                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1559 000002EB 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1560 000002ED A3[0C00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1561                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1562 000002F0 52                      		push	dx
  1563                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1564 000002F1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1565                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1566                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1567                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1568                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1569                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1570                                  		; ds = cs
  1571 000002F3 0306[2C00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1572 000002F7 1316[2E00]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1573 000002FB A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1574 000002FE 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1575                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1576                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1577                                  		
  1578 00000302 C706[0E00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector			
  1579                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1580 00000308 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1581                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1582 0000030A E8EDFE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1583 0000030D 5A                      		pop	dx
  1584                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1585                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1586                                  SplitChk:
  1587                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1588 0000030E 8B0E[1200]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]				
  1589 00000312 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1590 00000313 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1591 00000315 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1592 00000317 5F                      		pop	di
  1593 00000318 5E                      		pop	si
  1594 00000319 58                      		pop	ax
  1595                                  EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1596 0000031A C3                      		retn
  1597                                  
  1598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1599                                  
  1600                                  ErrorOut:
  1601                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1602                                  		; ds = cs
  1603                                  		;push	cs
  1604                                  		;pop	ds
  1605                                  		
  1606 0000031B BE[4203]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...
  1607 0000031E E81400                  		call	WriteTTY
  1608                                  
  1609                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.
  1610                                  		; Use the bios keyboard interrupt.
  1611                                  
  1612 00000321 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  1613 00000323 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  1614                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1615                                  
  1616                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk
  1617                                  		; parameter table to the location at [0:DskAddr]. The address
  1618                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in
  1619                                  		; 0:OrgDasdPtr and 0:OrgDasdPtr+2. After this table address
  1620                                  		; has been restored we can reboot by invoking the bootstrap
  1621                                  		; loader bios interrupt.
  1622                                  
  1623                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1624                                  		;xor	bx, bx
  1625                                  		;mov	ds, bx
  1626                                  		;les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Wrong DS segment !
  1627                                  					 ; (Erdogan Tan, 23/12/2022)
  1628 00000325 C41E[2800]              		les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Correct DS segment = CS
  1629                                  		
  1630                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1631 00000329 16                      		push	ss ; 0
  1632 0000032A 1F                      		pop	ds
  1633                                  		; ds = 0		
  1634                                  
  1635 0000032B BE7800                  		mov	si, DskAddr	; (Int 1Eh)
  1636 0000032E 891C                    		mov	[si], bx	; restore offset		
  1637 00000330 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; restore segment
  1638 00000333 CD19                    		int	19h		; reboot
  1639                                  
  1640                                  
  1641                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1642                                  
  1643                                  ; WriteTTY
  1644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1645                                  ; in) DS:si -> asciiz string.
  1646                                  ;
  1647                                  ; WriteTTY the character in al to the screen.
  1648                                  ; use video service 'write teletype to active page' (ROM_TTY)
  1649                                  ; use normal character attribute
  1650                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1651                                  
  1652                                  WriteTTY:
  1653 00000335 AC                      		lodsb
  1654 00000336 08C0                    		or	al, al
  1655 00000338 74E0                    		jz	short EndWrite
  1656                                  		;mov	AH, ROM_TTY	; 09/12/2022
  1657 0000033A B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  1658 0000033C B307                    		mov	bl, 7		; "normal" attribute
  1659 0000033E CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  1660                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  1661                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  1662 00000340 EBF3                    		jmp	short WriteTTY
  1663                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1664                                  
  1665                                  ; 10/12/2022	
  1666                                  ;EndWrite:
  1667                                  ;		retn

  1870 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  1871                                  
  1872                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  1873                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  1874                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  1875                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  1876                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  1877                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  1878                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  1879                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  1880                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  1881                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  1882                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  1883                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  1884                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  1885                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  1886                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  1887                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  1888                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  1889                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  1890                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  1891                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  1892                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  1893                                  
  1894 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  1895 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  1896 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  1897                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  1898 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  1899 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  1900 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  1901 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  1902 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  1903                                  
  1904                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  1905                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  1906                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  1907                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  1908                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  1909                                  ; algorithm is used:
  1910                                  ;
  1911                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  1912                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  1913                                  ;	set slow = 15
  1914                                  ;   else
  1915                                  ;	set slow = value
  1916                                  ;   ...
  1917                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  1918                                  ;	use slow
  1919                                  ;   else
  1920                                  ;	use fast
  1921                                  ;   ...
  1922                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  1923                                  
  1924 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  1925 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  1926 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  1927 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  1928 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  1929 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  1930 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  1931 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  1932 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  1933 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  1934 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  1935 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  1936 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  1937 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  1938 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  1939 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt
  1940                                  
  1941                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1942

  1944

  1975                                  ; in them which causes the byte after the buffer to be trashed
  1976                                  ; on floppy reads to odd-byte boundaries. Although no general effort 
  1977                                  ; is made to enforce this in the bigger picture, this one small sacrifice
  1978                                  ; makes that system more-or-less work.

  1991                                  ;	various values are patched whenever actions are performed.

  1993                                  ;	the bpb has not been filled. link also set to -1 to signify end
  1994                                  ;	of list. # of cylinders in maxparms initialized to -1 to indicate
  1995                                  ;	that the parameters have not been set.

  2318                                  ttticks:	dw 396h, 2C7h		; time_to_ticks

  2349                                  ;************************************************************************
  2350                                  ;*									*
  2351                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2352                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2353                                  ;*									*
  2354                                  ;************************************************************************
  2355                                  
  2356                                  strategy:	; proc far		
  2357 000006F5 2E891E[1200]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav], bx ; store es:bx (device driver request packet)
  2358                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call
  2359 000006FA 2E8C06[1400]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav+2], es
  2360 000006FF CB                      		retf
