  7375 00002240 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7376                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7377 00002242 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7378 00002244 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7379                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7380                                  
  7381                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7382                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7383 00002246 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7384                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7385 00002248 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7386                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7387 0000224B C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7388                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7389 0000224F 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7390                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7391                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7392 00002252 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7393 00002255 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7394 00002259 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7395 0000225B 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7396 00002260 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7397 00002264 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7398 00002269 5B                      		pop	bx
  7399 0000226A 5E                      		pop	si
  7400 0000226B C3                      		retn
  7401                                  
  7402                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7403                                  
  7404                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7405                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7406                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7407                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7408                                  
  7409                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7410 0000226C 50                      		push	ax
  7411 0000226D 51                      		push	cx
  7412 0000226E 52                      		push	dx
  7413 0000226F 55                      		push	bp
  7414 00002270 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7415                                  loop_clock:				
  7416 00002272 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7417 00002274 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7418 00002276 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7419 00002278 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7420                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7421                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7422                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7423 0000227A 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7424 0000227D 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7425 0000227F 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7426 00002282 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7427 00002284 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7428 00002287 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7429 00002289 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7430 0000228A B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7431                                  delay:					
  7432 0000228D E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7433 0000228F EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7434                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7435                                  
  7436                                  clock_present:				
  7437 00002291 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7438 00002297 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7439                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7440                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7441 0000229A 56                      		push	si
  7442 0000229B E88BF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7443 0000229E FA                      		cli
  7444                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7445 0000229F 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7446 000022A3 FB                      		sti
  7447 000022A4 5E                      		pop	si
  7448                                  
  7449                                  no_readdate:				
  7450 000022A5 5D                      		pop	bp
  7451 000022A6 5A                      		pop	dx
  7452 000022A7 59                      		pop	cx
  7453 000022A8 58                      		pop	ax
  7454 000022A9 C3                      		retn
  7455                                  
  7456                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7457                                  
  7458                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7459                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7460                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7461                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7462                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7463                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7464                                  ;
  7465                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7466                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7467                                  ;
  7468                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7469                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7470                                  ;
  7471                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7472                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7473                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7474                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7475                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7476                                  ;
  7477                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7478                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7479                                  
  7480                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7481                                  
  7482                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7483                                  
  7484                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7485                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7486                                  			
  7487 000022AA 50                      		push	ax
  7488 000022AB 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7489 000022B1 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7490 000022B3 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7491                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7492 000022B9 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7493 000022BB 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7494                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7495 000022C1 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7496                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7497                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7498                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7499                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7500                                  cmosck4:				
  7501 000022C3 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7502                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7503 000022C5 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7504                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7505 000022C7 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7506 000022CA B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7507                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7508 000022CC E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7509 000022CF 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7510                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7511 000022D1 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7512 000022D3 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7513                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7514 000022D5 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7515                                  cmosck9:				
  7516 000022D8 58                      		pop	ax
  7517 000022D9 C3                      		retn
  7518                                  
  7519                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7520                                  
  7521                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7522                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7523                                  ;									       :
  7524                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7525                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7526                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7527                                  ;									       :
  7528                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7529                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7530                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7531                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7532                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7533                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7534                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7535                                  
  7536                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7537 000022DA 9C                      		pushf
  7538 000022DB FA                      		cli
  7539 000022DC 53                      		push	bx
  7540 000022DD 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7541 000022DE 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7542 000022E0 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7543                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7544 000022E2 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7545 000022E3 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7546 000022E5 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7547 000022E7 58                      		pop	ax
  7548 000022E8 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7549 000022EA 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7550 000022EC E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7551                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7552 000022EE 90                      		nop
  7553 000022EF E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7554 000022F1 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7555 000022F3 5B                      		pop	bx
  7556 000022F4 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7557 000022F5 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7558 000022F8 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7559                                  
  7560                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7561                                  
  7562                                  cmos_popf:				
  7563 000022F9 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7564                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7565                                  
  7566                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7567                                  
  7568                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7569                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7570                                  ;									       :
  7571                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7572                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7573                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7574                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7575                                  ;									       :
  7576                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7577                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7578                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7579                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7580                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7581                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7582                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7583                                  
  7584                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7585 000022FA 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7586 000022FB 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7587 000022FC FA                      		cli
  7588 000022FD 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7589 000022FE 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7590 00002300 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7591                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7592 00002302 90                      		nop
  7593 00002303 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7594 00002305 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7595 00002307 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7596 00002308 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7597 0000230A 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7598 0000230C E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7599                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7600 0000230E 90                      		nop
  7601 0000230F E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7602 00002311 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7603 00002312 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7604 00002313 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7605 00002316 C3                      		retn
  7606                                  
  7607                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7608                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7610                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7612                                  
  7613                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7614                                  ;
  7615                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7616                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7617                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7618                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7619                                  
  7620                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7621                                  
  7622                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7623                                  ;
  7624                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7625                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7626                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7627                                  
  7628                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7629                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7630                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7631                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7632                                  
  7633                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7634                                  getclus:				
  7635 00002317 51                      		push	cx
  7636 00002318 57                      		push	di
  7637 00002319 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7638 0000231E 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7639 00002320 48                      		dec	ax
  7640 00002321 48                      		dec	ax
  7641 00002322 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7642                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7643                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7644 00002324 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7645 00002329 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7646                                  unpack:					
  7647 0000232E 1E                      		push	ds
  7648 0000232F 50                      		push	ax
  7649 00002330 53                      		push	bx
  7650 00002331 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7651 00002336 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7652 00002338 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7653 0000233A 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7654                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7655 00002340 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7656 00002342 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7657                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7658 00002344 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7659                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7660 00002346 52                      		push	dx
  7661 00002347 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7662 00002349 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7663 0000234C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7664 0000234D 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7665 0000234F 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7666                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7667                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7668 00002351 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7669 00002355 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7670 00002356 52                      		push	dx
  7671 00002357 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7672 00002359 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7673 0000235C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7674                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7675 0000235D A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7676 00002360 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7677 00002364 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7678                                  even_odd:				
  7679 00002368 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7680 00002369 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7681 0000236A D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7682 0000236C 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7683 0000236E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7684                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7685 00002370 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7686 00002372 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7687 00002374 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7688                                  havclus:				
  7689 00002376 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7690 00002378 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7691 0000237C EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7692                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7693                                  
  7694                                  unpack16:				
  7695 0000237E 52                      		push	dx
  7696 0000237F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7697 00002381 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7698 00002383 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7699 00002386 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7700 00002389 5A                      		pop	dx
  7701 0000238A 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7702                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7703                                  unpackx:				
  7704 0000238C 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7705 0000238D 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7706 0000238E 1F                      		pop	ds
  7707 0000238F 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7708 00002391 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7709 00002394 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7710 00002396 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7711 0000239B EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7712                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7713                                  
  7714                                  getcl2:					
  7715 0000239D 53                      		push	bx
  7716 0000239E 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7717 0000239F 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7718 000023A0 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7719 000023A4 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7720 000023A9 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7721 000023AA 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7722                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7723 000023AF 1E                      		push	ds
  7724 000023B0 0E                      		push	cs
  7725 000023B1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7726 000023B2 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7727                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7728 000023B3 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7729                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7730                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7731 000023B6 E8ACF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7732 000023B9 1F                      		pop	ds
  7733 000023BA 5B                      		pop	bx
  7734 000023BB 5F                      		pop	di
  7735 000023BC 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7736 000023C0 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7737 000023C2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7738 000023C4 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7739 000023C6 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7740 000023C7 C3                      		retn
  7741                                  
  7742                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7743                                  
  7744                                  
  7745                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7746                                  ;
  7747                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7748                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7749                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7750                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7751                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7752                                  ;
  7753                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7754                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7755                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7756                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7757                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7758                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7759                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7760                                  
  7761                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7762                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7763 000023C8 50                      		push	ax
  7764 000023C9 51                      		push	cx
  7765 000023CA 57                      		push	di
  7766 000023CB 56                      		push	si
  7767 000023CC 06                      		push	es
  7768 000023CD 1E                      		push	ds
  7769 000023CE 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7770 000023D0 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7771 000023D5 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7772 000023D7 90                      		nop
  7773                                  
  7774                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7775                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7776                                  
  7777 000023D8 06                      		push	es
  7778 000023D9 1E                      		push	ds
  7779 000023DA 57                      		push	di
  7780 000023DB 50                      		push	ax
  7781 000023DC 0E                      		push	cs
  7782 000023DD 1F                      		pop	ds
  7783                                  
  7784 000023DE 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7785 000023E2 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7786                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7787                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7788 000023E5 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7789 000023E6 E87CF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7790 000023E9 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7791 000023EA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7792                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7793 000023EE 5F                      		pop	di
  7794 000023EF 1F                      		pop	ds
  7795 000023F0 07                      		pop	es
  7796 000023F1 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7797 000023F6 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7798 000023F8 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7799                                  					; sector number
  7800                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7801 000023FC 52                      		push	dx
  7802 000023FD 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7803                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7804                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7805 00002404 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7806 00002406 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7807 00002409 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7808 0000240D 1E                      		push	ds
  7809 0000240E 07                      		pop	es
  7810 0000240F 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7811 00002411 1E                      		push	ds
  7812 00002412 0E                      		push	cs
  7813 00002413 1F                      		pop	ds
  7814 00002414 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7815 00002415 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7816                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7817                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7818 00002418 E84AF3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7819 0000241B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7820 0000241C 5A                      		pop	dx
  7821 0000241D 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7822                                  
  7823                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7824 00002422 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7825 00002423 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7826                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7827                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7828 00002425 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7829 00002427 1F                      		pop	ds
  7830 00002428 07                      		pop	es
  7831 00002429 5E                      		pop	si
  7832 0000242A 5F                      		pop	di
  7833 0000242B 59                      		pop	cx
  7834 0000242C 58                      		pop	ax
  7835 0000242D C3                      		retn
  7836                                  
  7837                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7838                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7839                                  
  7840                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7841                                  
  7842                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7843                                  		;db 0
  7844                                  
  7845                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7846                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7847                                  
  7848                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7849 0000242E 00<rep 2h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7850                                  %endif
  7851                                  
  7852                                  ;align 16
  7853                                  
  7854                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7855                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7856                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7857

  7859                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7860                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7861                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7862                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022

  7864                                  
  7865                                  ;============================================================================
  7866                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7867                                  ;============================================================================
  7868                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7869                                  
  7870                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7871                                  
  7872                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7873                                   
  7874                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7875                                  
  7876                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7877                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7878                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7880                                  
  7881                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7882 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7883 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7884                                  
  7885                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7886                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7887                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7888                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7889                                  
  7890                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7891                                  
  7892                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7893                                  
  7894                                  ;************************************************************************
  7895                                  ;*									*
  7896                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7897                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7898                                  ;*									*
  7899                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7900                                  ;*									*
  7901                                  ;************************************************************************
  7902                                  
  7903                                  _seg_reinit:
  7904 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7905                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7906                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7907 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7908 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7909                                  
  7910                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7911 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7912 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7913 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7914 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7915 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7916                                  
  7917                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7918                                  
  7919                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7920                                  
  7921                                  ;************************************************************************
  7922                                  ;*									*
  7923                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7924                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7925                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7926                                  ;*									*
  7927                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7928                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7929                                  ;*									*
  7930                                  ;************************************************************************
  7931                                  
  7932                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7933 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7934 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7935 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7936 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7937 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7938 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7939 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7940 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7941 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7942 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7943 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7944                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7945                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7946 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7947 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7948 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7949 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7950 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7951 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7952 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7953 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7954 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7955 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7956                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7957 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7958                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7959                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7960 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7961                                  
  7962                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7963                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7964                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7965                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7966                                  ;
  7967                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7968                                  ;
  7969                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7970                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7971                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7972                                  ;
  7973                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7974                                  
  7975                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7976 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7977 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7978 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7979 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7980                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7981                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7982 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7983 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7984                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7985                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7986 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7987 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7988 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7989 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7990 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7991 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7992 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7993 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7994 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7995 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7996                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7997 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7998                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7999 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8000 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8001                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8002                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8003                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8004                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8005 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8006                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8007 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8008 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8009                                  					; mark operation complete
  8010 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8011 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8012 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8013 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8014 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8015 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8016 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8017 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8018 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8019 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8020                                  	
  8021                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8023                                  bc_retf:
  8024 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8025                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8026                                  
  8027                                  command_error:				
  8028 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8029 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8030                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8031                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8032                                  
  8033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8034                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8035                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8036                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8037                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8038                                  ; high.
  8039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8040                                  
  8041                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8042                                  
  8043                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8044                                  
  8045 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8046                                  
  8047 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8048                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8049                                  		
  8050                                  
  8051                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8052                                  
  8053                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8054                                  
  8055                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8056 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8057                                  					; unknown command error
  8058                                  
  8059                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8060                                  
  8061                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8062                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8063                                  
  8064                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8065                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8066                                  
  8067                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8068                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8069                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8070 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8071 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8072                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8073 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8074 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8075 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8076                                  
  8077                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8078                                  
  8079                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8080                                  
  8081                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8082                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8084                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8085                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8086                                  
  8087                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8088                                  
  8089                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8090                                  
  8091                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8092                                  
  8093                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8094                                  
  8095                                  ;************************************************************************
  8096                                  ;*									*
  8097                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8098                                  ;*									*
  8099                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8100                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8101                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8102                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8103                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8104                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8105                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8106                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8107                                  ;*									*
  8108                                  ;************************************************************************
  8109                                  
  8110                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8111                                  		;db 0
  8112                                  
  8113                                  		; 13/12/202
  8114 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8115                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8116 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8117                                  					; 00 init
  8118 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8119 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8120 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8121                                  					; 03
  8122 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8123                                  					; 04
  8124 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8125                                  					; 05
  8126 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8127 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8128                                  					; 07
  8129 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8130                                  					; 08
  8131 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8132 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8133                                  con_table_end:
  8134 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8135                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8136 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8137 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8138 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8139 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8140 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8141                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8142 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8143                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8144 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8145 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8146 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8147 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8148 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8149 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8150 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8151 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8152 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8153 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8154 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8155 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8156 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8157 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8158 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8159 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8160 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8161 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8162 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8163 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8164                                  prn_table_end:
  8165 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8166                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8167 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8168 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8169 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8170 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8171 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8172 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8173 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8174 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8175 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8176 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8177 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8178                                  aux_table_end:
  8179 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8180                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8181 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8182 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8183 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8184 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8185 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8186 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8187 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8188 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8189 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8190 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8191                                  tim_table_end:
  8192                                  
  8193                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8194                                  
  8195                                  ;************************************************************************
  8196                                  ;*									*
  8197                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8198                                  ;*									*
  8199                                  ;************************************************************************
  8200                                  
  8201                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8202                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8203 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8204                                  con_loop:				
  8205 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8206 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8207 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8208                                  con_exit:				
  8209 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8210 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8211                                  
  8212                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8213                                  
  8214                                  ;************************************************************************
  8215                                  ;*									*
  8216                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8217                                  ;*									*
  8218                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8219                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8220                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8221                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8222                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8223                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8224                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8225                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8226                                  ;*									*
  8227                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8228                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8229                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8230                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8231                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8232                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8233                                  ;*									*
  8234                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8235                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8236                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8237                                  ;*									*
  8238                                  ;************************************************************************
  8239                                  
  8240                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8241                                  chrin:		
  8242 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8243 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8244 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8245 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8246 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8247 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8248 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8249 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8250 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8251 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8252 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8253 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8254                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8255                                  
  8256                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8257                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8258                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8259                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8260                                  ;      else
  8261                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8262                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8263                                  ;      endif
  8264                                  ;    endif
  8265                                  ;  endif
  8266                                  
  8267                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8268 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8269 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8270 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8271 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8272 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8273 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8274 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8275 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8277                                  
  8278                                  not_ext:				
  8279 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8280 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8281                                  alt_save:				
  8282 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8283                                  keyret:					
  8284 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8285                                  
  8286                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8287                                  
  8288                                  ;************************************************************************
  8289                                  ;*									*
  8290                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8291                                  ;*									*
  8292                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8293                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8294                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8295                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8296                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8297                                  ;*									*
  8298                                  ;************************************************************************
  8299                                  
  8300                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8301                                  con_rdnd:				
  8302 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8303 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8304 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8305 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8306 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8307 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8308 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8309 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8310 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8311                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8312 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8313                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8314 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8315 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8316 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8317 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8318                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8319                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8320                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8321                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8322 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8323 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8324 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8326                                  
  8327                                  gotchr:					
  8328 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8329 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8330 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8331 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8332 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8333                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8334                                  
  8335                                  notbrk:					
  8336 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8337 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8338 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8339 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8340                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8341                                  
  8342                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8343 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8344 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8345 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8346 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8347 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8348 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8349 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8350                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8351                                  rdexit:					
  8352 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8353 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8354                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8355                                  bc_exvec:				
  8356 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8357                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8358 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8359                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8360                                  
  8361                                  ;************************************************************************
  8362                                  ;*									*
  8363                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8364                                  ;*									*
  8365                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8366                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8367                                  ;*									*
  8368                                  ;************************************************************************
  8369                                  
  8370                                  con_writ:
  8371                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8372 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8373                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8374                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8375                                  con_lp:					
  8376 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8377 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8378 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8379                                  					; AL = character to display
  8380 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8381                                  cc_ret:					
  8382 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8383 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8384                                  
  8385                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8386                                  
  8387                                  ;************************************************************************
  8388                                  ;*									*
  8389                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8390                                  ;*									*
  8391                                  ;************************************************************************
  8392                                  
  8393                                  con_flush:
  8394 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8395                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8396 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8397 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8398                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8399                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8400                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8401 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8402 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8403 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8404                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8405 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8406                                  
  8407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8408                                  
  8409                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8410                                  
  8411                                  ;************************************************************************
  8412                                  ;*									*
  8413                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8414                                  ;*									*
  8415                                  ;************************************************************************
  8416                                  
  8417                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8418                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8419                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8420                                  
  8421                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8422                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8423                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8424                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8425                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8426                                  ;
  8427                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8428                                  
  8429                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8430                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8431                                  
  8432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8433                                  
  8434                                  ;************************************************************************
  8435                                  ;*									*
  8436                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8437                                  ;*									*
  8438                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8439                                  ;*									*
  8440                                  ;************************************************************************
  8441                                  
  8442                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8443 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8444                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8445                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8446                                  prn_done:
  8447 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8448 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8449                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8450                                  
  8451                                  ;************************************************************************
  8452                                  ;*									*
  8453                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8454                                  ;*									*
  8455                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8456                                  ;*									*
  8457                                  ;************************************************************************
  8458                                  
  8459                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8460                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8461 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8462                                  prn_loop:				
  8463 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8464                                  prn_out:				
  8465 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8466 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8467 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8468 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8469 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8470 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8471 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8472 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8473 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8474 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8475 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8477                                  
  8478                                  _prnwf:					
  8479 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8480 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8481                                  TestPrnError:				
  8482 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8483 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8484                                  pmessg:					
  8485 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8487

  8490 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8491                                  ;prn_done:				
  8492                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8493                                  prn_done2:
  8494                                  		;clc
  8495                                  		; cf=0
  8496 0000024D C3                      		retn

  8499                                  ;************************************************************************
  8500                                  ;*									*
  8501                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8502                                  ;*									*
  8503                                  ;************************************************************************
  8504                                  
  8505                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8506 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8507 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8508 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8509                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8510                                  		; 12/12/2022
