  9963                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9964                                  
  9965                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9966                                  
  9967                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9968                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
  9969                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
  9970                                  ;
  9971                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
  9972                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9973                                  
  9974                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9975                                  
  9976                                  readbootsec:	
  9977 000006B1 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
  9978 000006B3 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
  9979 000006B6 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
  9980 000006B9 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
  9981 000006BB 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
  9982                                  
  9983                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
  9984                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
  9985                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
  9986                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
  9987                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
  9988                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
  9989                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
  9990                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
  9991                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
  9992                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
  9993                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
  9994                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
  9995                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
  9996                                  		; informations
  9997                                  
  9998                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
  9999                                  
 10000                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10001                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10002                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10003                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10004                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10005                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10006                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10007                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10008                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10009                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10010                                  
 10011                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10012 000006BD A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 10013 000006C0 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 10014 000006C2 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10015                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 10016 000006C4 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 10017 000006C6 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10018                                  					; no need for nop
 10019 000006C8 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 10020 000006CA 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10021 000006CC 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10022 000006D1 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10023                                  
 10024                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10025                                  ;
 10026                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10027                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10028                                  ;;
 10029                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10030                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10031                                  ;;
 10032                                  ;;check_signature:
 10033                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10034                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10035                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if single sided medium.
 10036                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10037                                  
 10038                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10039                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10040                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10041                                  
 10042                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10043                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10044 000006D3 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10045                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10046 000006D6 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10047 000006D7 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10048 000006D9 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10049 000006DB 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10050 000006DC 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10051                                  
 10052                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10053                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10054                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10055                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10056                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10057                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10058                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10059                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10060                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10061                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10062                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10063                                  
 10064                                  checksinglesided:
 10065                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10066                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10067                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10068 000006DE 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10069 000006E0 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10070 000006E2 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10071 000006E4 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10072 000006E6 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10073 000006EC 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10074 000006EE 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10075 000006F3 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10076                                  
 10077                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10078                                  
 10079                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10080 000006F5 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10081                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10082 000006FA EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk

 10100                                  
 10101                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10102                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10103                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10104                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10105                                  ;
 10106                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10107                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10108                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10109                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10110                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10111                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10112                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10113                                  
 10114                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10115                                  
 10116                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10117                                  movbpb:

 10119                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10120                                  					; sectors per unit
 10121 00000703 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10122                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10123                                  					; number of directory entries
 10124 00000707 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10125                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10126                                  					; size of drive
 10127 0000070B 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10128                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10129                                  					; media	descriptor
 10130 0000070F A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10131                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10132                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10133 00000712 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10134                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10135                                  					; sectors per track
 10136 00000716 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10137                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10138                                  					; number of heads
 10139 0000071A 803E[0A05]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?

 10141 00000721 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 10142 00000724 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?

 10144                                  movbpb_conv:

 10146 00000730 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10147 00000732 E8A811                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.

 10149                                  		; cf = 0

 10154                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10155                                  
 10156                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10157                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10158                                  ;by es:di.
 10159                                  
 10160                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10161                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10162                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10163                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10164                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10165                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10166                                  
 10167                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10168                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10169 00000736 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10170                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10171                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE

 10210                                  
 10211                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10212                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10213                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10214                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10215                                  ; output:
 10216                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10217                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10218                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10219                                  
 10220                                  readfat:	
 10221                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10222                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10223 0000076B 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10224 0000076D B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10225                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2

 10227 00000773 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10228 00000775 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10229                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10230 00000777 C3                      		retn
 10231                                  
 10232                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10233                                  
 10234                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10235                                  
 10236                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10237                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10238                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10239                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10240                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10241                                  ;		dh has head
 10242                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10243                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10244                                  ;
 10245                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10246                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10247                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10248                                  ;
 10249                                  ;		carry set
 10250                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10251                                  ;
 10252                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10254                                  
 10255                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10256                                  
 10257                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10258                                  read_sector:	
 10259 00000778 55                      		push	bp
 10260 00000779 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10261 0000077C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10262 00000780 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10263                                  rd_ret:					
 10264 00000783 06                      		push	es
 10265 00000784 1E                      		push	ds
 10266 00000785 07                      		pop	es
 10267 00000786 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10268 00000789 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10269                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10270                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10271                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10272 0000078B 07                      		pop	es
 10273 0000078C 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10274                                  rd_rty:					
 10275 0000078E E87404                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10276 00000791 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10277 00000793 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10278                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10279                                  					; fnon_removable
 10280 00000798 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10281 0000079A 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10282 0000079F 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10283 000007A1 50                      		push	ax
 10284 000007A2 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10285 000007A3 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10286                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10287                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10288                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10289                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10290 000007A7 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10291 000007A9 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10292                                  		; 
 10293 000007AC 1F                      		pop	ds
 10294 000007AD A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10295 000007B0 58                      		pop	ax
 10296                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10297 000007B1 06                      		push	es
 10298 000007B2 1E                      		push	ds
 10299 000007B3 07                      		pop	es
 10300 000007B4 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10301 000007B7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10302                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10303                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10304                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10305 000007B9 07                      		pop	es
 10306 000007BA 9C                      		pushf
 10307 000007BB 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10308 000007C0 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10309 000007C2 50                      		push	ax
 10310 000007C3 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10311 000007C6 1E                      		push	ds
 10312 000007C7 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10313 000007CB 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10314 000007CE 1F                      		pop	ds
 10315 000007CF 58                      		pop	ax
 10316                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10317 000007D0 9D                      		popf
 10318 000007D1 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10319 000007D3 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 10320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10321                                  
 10322                                  err_rd_ret:				
 10323 000007D5 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 10324                                  					; return error
 10325 000007D7 F9                      		stc
 10326                                  
 10327                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 10328                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 10329                                  
 10330                                  okret2:					
 10331 000007D8 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 10332 000007DC 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 10333 000007E0 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10334                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive

 10338 000007E8 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 10339 000007E9 5D                      		pop	bp
 10340 000007EA C3                      		retn

 10364 00000809 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 10365 0000080B 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 10366                                  exitjx:					
 10367                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10368                                  		; cf = 0
 10369                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10370                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10371 0000080F C3                      		retn

 10433                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10434                                  
 10435                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10436                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10437                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10438                                  
 10439                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10440                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10441                                  ;
 10442                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10443                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10444                                  
 10445                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10446                                  checksingle:		
 10447 0000083A 50                      		push	ax
 10448 0000083B 53                      		push	bx
 10449 0000083C 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10450                                  
 10451                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10452                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10453                                  
 10454 00000840 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10455 00000843 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10456 00000845 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10457                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10458 00000848 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10459                                  
 10460                                  
 10461                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10462                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10463                                  
 10464 0000084A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10465                                  					; get physical drive number
 10466 0000084E 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10467 0000084F 57                      		push	di
 10468 00000850 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10469                                  scan_list:				
 10470 00000854 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10471 00000858 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10472 0000085A B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10473 0000085C 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10474 00000860 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10475 00000862 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10476 00000866 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10477 00000867 07                      		pop	es
 10478 00000868 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10479                                  
 10480                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10481                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10482                                  ; in this case.
 10483 0000086C 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10484 00000871 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10485                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10486 00000873 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10487 00000878 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10488 0000087A 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10489                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10490                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10491 0000087E 06                      		push	es
 10492 0000087F 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10493 00000883 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10494                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10495                                  					; set up sdsb
 10496 00000887 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10497 00000888 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10498                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10499                                  
 10500                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10501                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10502                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10503                                  
 10504                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10505 0000088A 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10506 0000088F 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10507 00000891 50                      		push	ax
 10508 00000892 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10509 00000896 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10510 00000898 06                      		push	es
 10511 00000899 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10512 0000089D 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10513                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10514                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10515 000008A2 07                      		pop	es
 10516 000008A3 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10517 000008A5 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10518 000008A6 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10519                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10520 000008A8 E85C0E                  		call	swpdsk
 10521 000008AB EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10522                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10523                                  
 10524                                  scan_skip:	
 10525 000008AD 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10526                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10527                                  					; go to	next bds
 10528 000008B0 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10529 000008B3 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10530 000008B5 F9                      		stc

 10532 000008B7 07                      		pop	es
 10533

 10555                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10556                                  
 10557                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10558                                  
 10559                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10560                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10561                                  ;
 10562                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10563                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10564                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10565                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10566                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10567                                  ;	ds = cs
 10568                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10569                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10570                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10571                                  ;
 10572                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10573                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10575                                  
 10576                                  diskrd:	
 10577                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10578                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10579 000008C3 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10580                                  
 10581                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10582                                  
 10583                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10584                                  diskio:
 10585 000008C8 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10586 000008CA 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10587 000008CE E8FAFB                  		call	SetDrive
 10588 000008D1 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10589 000008D5 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10590                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10591 000008D8 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10592                                  
 10593                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10594                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10595                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10596                                  
 10597 000008DA 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10598                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10599                                  					; unformatted_media
 10600 000008DF 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10601 000008E1 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10602 000008E5 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10603                                  
 10604                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10605                                  
 10606 000008E9 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10607 000008EB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10608 000008ED 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10609                                  		;adc	si, 0
 10610                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10611 000008EF D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1
 10612 000008F1 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10613                                  					; 32 bit sector ?
 10614 000008F6 740C                    		jz	short sanity32
 10615                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 10616                                  		; 02/09/2023

 10618 000008FA 75BF                    		jnz	short baddrive

 11036 00000B24 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11037                                  
 11038                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11039                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11040                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11041                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to

 11043                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11044                                  
 11045 00000B26 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11046 00000B29 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11047 00000B2B FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11048 00000B2F 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11049 00000B31 E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11050 00000B34 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11051                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11052                                  
 11053                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11054 00000B36 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11055 00000B39 FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11056 00000B3D EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11057                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11058                                  
 11059                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11060                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11061                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11062                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11063                                  
 11064                                  dskerr:					
 11065 00000B3F 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11066 00000B44 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11067 00000B46 E8FE0C                  		call	checkio
 11068                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11069 00000B49 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11070 00000B4E 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11071 00000B50 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11072 00000B53 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11073                                  dochkagain:				
 11074 00000B58 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11075                                  dskerr0:

 11077 00000B5D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11078                                  					; fnon_removable
 11079 00000B62 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11080 00000B64 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11081 00000B67 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11082                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11083 00000B69 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11084 00000B6C 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11085 00000B6E C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11086                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11087                                  dskerr1:				
 11088 00000B74 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11089                                  		;jmp	retry
 11090                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11091 00000B75 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11093                                  
 11094                                  write_fault_err:

 11096                                  					; for write fault error.
 11097 00000B7B EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11098                                  
 11099                                  		; fall into harderr

 11102                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves

 11118                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11119                                  
 11120                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11121                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11122                                  
 11123                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11124                                  normspeed:
 11125 00000B90 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11126 00000B95 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed

 11131 00000BA0 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]

 11138                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11139 00000BB3 07                      		pop	es
 11140 00000BB4 C3                      		retn
 11141                                  
 11142                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11143                                  
 11144                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11145                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11146                                  
 11147                                  fastspeed:

 11149                                  					; ftoobig

 11151 00000BBC 06                      		push	es
 11152 00000BBD 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11153 00000BC1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11154 00000BC3 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11155 00000BC7 07                      		pop	es
 11156 00000BC8 C3                      		retn

 11158                                  
 11159                                  notready:

 11161 00000BCA B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11162 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11163                                  
 11164                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11165                                  
 11166                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11167                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11168                                  
 11169                                  maperror:

 11171 00000BCE 06                      		push	es

 11174 00000BD1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11175 00000BD3 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11176 00000BD6 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11177                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11178 00000BD9 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11179 00000BDC F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11180                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11181 00000BDE 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11182                                  					; get translation
 11183                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary !

 11187 00000BE3 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11188 00000BE4 C3                      		retn
 11189                                  
 11190                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11191                                  
 11192                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11193                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11194                                  
 11195                                  set_tim:

 11197 00000BE6 E891F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11198                                  
 11199                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11200                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11201                                  
 11202 00000BE9 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11203 00000BED 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11204 00000BEF 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11205                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11206                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11207 00000BF3 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11208                                  setaccess:				
 11209 00000BF5 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11210 00000BFA 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11211 00000BFE 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11212                                  done_set:				
 11213 00000C02 F8                      		clc
 11214                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11215 00000C03 58                      		pop	ax
 11216 00000C04 C3                      		retn
 11217                                  
 11218                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11219                                  
 11220                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11221                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11222                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11223                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11224                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11225                                  
 11226                                  again:	
 11227 00000C05 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11228 00000C08 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11229 00000C0B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11230                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11231 00000C0D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11232 00000C0E C3                      		retn
 11233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11234                                  
 11235                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11236 00000C0F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11237 00000C11 C3                      		retn

 11250                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11251                                  ;
 11252                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11253                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11254                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11255                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11256                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11257                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11258                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11259                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11343                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11344                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11345                                  ;
 11346                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11347                                  ;
 11348                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11349                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11350                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11351                                  ;
 11352                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11353                                  
 11354                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11355                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11356                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11357 00000C42 E886F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11358 00000C45 06                      		push	es
 11359 00000C46 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11360 00000C4A 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11361                                  					; RAWIO
 11362 00000C4F 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11363 00000C53 07                      		pop	es
 11364 00000C54 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11365                                  
 11366                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11367                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11368                                  
 11369                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11370 00000C56 BE[130C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11371                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11372                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11373 00000C59 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11374 00000C5B 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11375                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11376 00000C5D BE[260C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11377                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11378                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11379                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11380 00000C60 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11381 00000C62 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11382 00000C64 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11383 00000C67 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11384 00000C69 98                      		cbw
 11385 00000C6A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11386 00000C6C 46                      		inc	si
 11387 00000C6D 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11388 00000C6F 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11389                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11390 00000C72 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11391                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11392                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11393 00000C77 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11394 00000C79 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11395                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11396                                  
 11397                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11398                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11399                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11400 00000C7A 5A                      		pop	dx
 11401                                  
 11402                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11403 00000C7B E957F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11404                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11405                                  
 11406                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11407                                  
 11408                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11409                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11410                                  ;
 11411                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11412                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11413                                  ;
 11414                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11415                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11416                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11417                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11418                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11419                                  
 11420                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11421                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11422                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11423                                  
 11424 00000C7E C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11425 00000C82 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11426                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11427 00000C85 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11428 00000C89 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11429 00000C8C 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11430 00000C90 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11431                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11432 00000C93 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11433 00000C96 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11434 00000C9A 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11435 00000C9D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11436 00000C9F 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11437                                  					
 11438                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11439 00000CA2 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11440 00000CA5 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11441                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11442 00000CA8 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11443 00000CAA 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11444 00000CAB 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11445                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11446                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11447                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11448 00000CB0 E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11449 00000CB3 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11450 00000CB6 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11451 00000CB7 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11452 00000CB9 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11453                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11454                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11455 00000CBC 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11456                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11457 00000CBF B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11458                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11459 00000CC2 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11460 00000CC3 06                      		push	es
 11461 00000CC4 1F                      		pop	ds
 11462 00000CC5 07                      		pop	es
 11463 00000CC6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11464                                  		
 11465                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11466                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11467                                  		;clc
 11468                                  GetParmRet:				
 11469 00000CC8 C3                      		retn
 11470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11471                                  
 11472                                  ; 17/10/2022

 11641                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11642                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11643                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11644                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11645                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11646                                  ;
 11647                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11648                                  ;
 11649                                  ; output:
 11650                                  ;	for status call:
 11651                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11652                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11653                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11654                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11655                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11656                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11657                                  ;
 11658                                  ;	for format track:
 11659                                  ;		carry set if error
 11660                                  ;
 11661                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11662                                  
 11663                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11664                                  
 11665                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11666                                  FormatTrack:
 11667 00000D9C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 11668 00000DA0 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 11669 00000DA3 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11670                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 11672 00000DA8 1E                      		push	ds

 11803

 11811 00000E79 890E[3301]              		mov	[curtrk], cx

 11813 00000E80 8B0E[3905]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 11814                                  
 11815                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11816                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11817                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11818                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11819                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11820                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11821                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11822                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11823                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11824                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11825                                  		; register.
 11826                                  
 11827                                  					; Special function requested?

 11829 00000E87 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack

 11832 00000E8D 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 11833 00000E8F F6E1                    		mul	cl
 11834 00000E91 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11835 00000E93 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 11836 00000E95 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 11837                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11838 00000E97 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 11839                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11840                                  					; fnon_removable
 11841 00000E9C 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11842                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 11843                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11844                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11845 00000E9E F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11846                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11847                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11848 00000EA3 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11849 00000EA5 C606[3605]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1

 11903                                  ReadWriteTrack:

 11905                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register

 11928                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11929                                  
 11930                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11931                                  
 11932                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11933                                  ;
 11934                                  ; TrackIo:
 11935                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11936                                  ;
 11937                                  ;   input:
 11938                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11939                                  ;		  3 = write
 11940                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11941                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11942                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11943                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11944                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11945                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11946                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11947                                  ;
 11948                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11949                                  
 11950                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11951                                  		
 11952                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11953                                  TrackIo:	
 11954                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11955 00000EF4 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11956 00000EF8 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv

 11960 00000F02 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o

 11964 00000F08 58                      		pop	ax

 11971                                  		; WE WANT:
 11972                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11973                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11974                                  		
 11975 00000F12 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11976                                  		; 12/12/2022

 11993                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11994                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11995                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.

 12006                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12007 00000F32 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.

 12009 00000F38 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx

 12012 00000F3E 59                      		pop	cx

 12065                                  ; are permissible.

 12101                                  ;
 12102                                  ; SetDASD
 12103                                  ;
 12104                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12105                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12106                                  ;
 12107                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12108                                  ;
 12109                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12110                                  
 12111                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12112                                  SetDasd:	
 12113 00000F79 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12114                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12115 00000F7E 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12116                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12117 00000F80 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12119                                  					; set_dasd_true

 12124                                  					; ~set_dasd_true

 12177 00000FCC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12178                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12179                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 12184                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12185                                  
 12186                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12187                                  
 12188                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12189                                  ;
 12190                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12191                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12192                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12193                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12194                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12195                                  ;
 12196                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12197                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12198                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12199                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12200                                  ;
 12201                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12202                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12203                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12204                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12205                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12206                                  ;
 12207                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12208                                  
 12209                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12210                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12211 00000FD7 51                      		push	cx
 12212 00000FD8 52                      		push	dx
 12213                                  
 12214                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12215                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12216                                  
 12217 00000FD9 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12218 00000FDE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12219 00000FE0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12220 00000FE2 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12221 00000FE7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12222 00000FE9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12224                                  
 12225                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12226 00000FEB 06                      		push	es
 12227 00000FEC 56                      		push	si
 12228                                  
 12229                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12230                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12231 00000FED 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12232 00000FEF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12233                                  
 12234 00000FF1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12235                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12236                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12237 00000FF6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si

 12251 0000100F D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1

 12260 00001021 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12261                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12262 00001023 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12263 00001025 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1

 12267                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12273 00001032 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12275                                  					; Get current disk base	table

 12344                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12345                                  
 12346                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12347                                  ;
 12348                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12349                                  ;
 12350                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12351                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12352                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12353                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12354                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12355                                  ;
 12356                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12357                                  
 12358                                  ResetDisk:
 12359 0000106B 50                      		push	ax
 12360                                  
 12361                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12362 0000106C B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12363 0000106F 3806[3806]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12364                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12365                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12366 00001073 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12367                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12368                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12369 00001075 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12370                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12371                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12372                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12373 00001078 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12374                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12375 0000107A C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12376                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12377 0000107F 58                      		pop	ax
 12378 00001080 C3                      		retn

 12381                                  
 12382                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12385                                  ;
 12386                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12387                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12388                                  ;
 12389                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12390                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12391                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12392                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12393                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12394                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12395                                  ;
 12396                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12397                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12400                                  
 12401                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12402                                  ToRom:	
 12403 00001081 53                      		push	bx
 12404 00001082 56                      		push	si
 12405                                  
 12406                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12407                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12408                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12409                                  
 12410 00001083 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12411 00001088 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12412 0000108A 50                      		push	ax
 12413 0000108B 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12414 0000108C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12415                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12416 00001091 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12417 00001092 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12418                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12419 00001096 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12420                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12421                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12422 0000109B 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12423 0000109F 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12424                                  		
 12425 000010A3 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12426 000010A6 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12427 000010AA A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12428 000010AD 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12429                                  					; Important for	format
 12430 000010B1 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12431                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12432                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12433 000010B6 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12434 000010B7 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12435 000010B9 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12436                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12437 000010BE 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12438 000010BF 58                      		pop	ax
 12439                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12440 000010C0 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12441 000010C4 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12442 000010C6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12443 000010CA 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12444 000010CE 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12445 000010CF 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12446 000010D3 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12447 000010D5 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12448 000010D6 5E                      		pop	si
 12449 000010D7 5B                      		pop	bx
 12450 000010D8 C3                      		retn
