 12454                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12455                                  
 12456                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12457                                  
 12458                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12459                                  ;
 12460                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12461                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12462                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12463                                  ;
 12464                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12465                                  
 12466                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12467                                  ioctl_getown:
 12468 000010D9 E8EFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12469 000010DC 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12470                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12471 000010E0 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12472                                  ownloop:				
 12473 000010E4 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12474 000010E8 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12475                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12476 000010EA 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12477                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12478                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12479 000010EF 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12480                                  getnextBDS:				
 12481 000010F1 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12482 000010F4 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12484                                  
 12485                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12486                                  ;
 12487                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12488                                  ; in al to al.
 12489                                  ;
 12490                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12491                                  
 12492                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12493                                  ioctl_setown:
 12494 000010F6 E8D2F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12495 000010F9 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12496                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12497 000010FE E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12498                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12499 00001101 FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12500                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12501                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12502                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12503                                  
 12504                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12505                                  ;
 12506                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12507                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12508                                  ;
 12509                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12510                                  
 12511                                  exitown:				
 12512 00001105 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12513                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12514 00001107 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12515                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12516                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12517 0000110C 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12518 0000110E 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12519                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12520                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12521 00001112 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12522                                  exitnomult:				
 12523 00001114 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12524 00001118 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12525                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12526                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12527                                  		; cf=0
 12528                                  		;clc
 12529 0000111B C3                      		retn

 12583                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12584                                  ;	get media id
 12585                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12586                                  ;
 12587                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12588                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12589                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12590                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12591                                  ;
 12592                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12593                                  ;
 12594                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12595                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12596                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12597                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12598                                  ;
 12599                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12600                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12601                                  ;
 12602                                  ; LOGIC:
 12603                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12604                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12605                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12606                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12607                                  ;
 12608                                  ; {
 12609                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12610                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12611                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12612                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12613                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12614                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12615                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12616                                  ;		};
 12617                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12618                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12619                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12620                                  ;		};
 12621                                  ;	else
 12622                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12623                                  ;
 12624                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12625                                  
 12626                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12627                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12628                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12629                                  
 12630                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12631                                  GetMediaId:
 12632 0000114A E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12633 0000114D 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12634 00001151 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12635 00001156 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12636 00001159 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12637                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12638 0000115B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12639                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12640 00001160 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12641                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12642 00001162 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12643 00001165 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12644                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12645                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12646 00001168 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12647 0000116A C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12648 0000116E 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12649                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12650 00001172 46                      		inc	si
 12651                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12652                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12653 00001173 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12654 00001176 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12655                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12656                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12657 00001179 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12658                                  	
 12659                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12660                                  		; cf = 0
 12661                                  		;clc
 12662                                  
 12663 0000117B C3                      		retn
 12664                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12665                                  
 12666                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12667 0000117C B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12668 0000117E F9                      		stc
 12669                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12670 0000117F C3                      		retn
 12671                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12672                                  
 12673                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12674                                  
 12675                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12676                                  ;  set media id
 12677                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12678                                  
 12679                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12680                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12681                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12682                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12683                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12684                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12685                                  ;
 12686                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12687                                  ;
 12688                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12689                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12690                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12691                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12692                                  ;
 12693                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12694                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12695                                  ;
 12696                                  ; logic:
 12697                                  ;
 12698                                  ; {
 12699                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12700                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12701                                  ;	BootIo;
 12702                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12703                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12704                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12705                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12706                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12707                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12708                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12709                                  ;		};
 12710                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12711                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12712                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12713                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12714                                  ;		};
 12715                                  ;	else
 12716                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12717                                  ;
 12718                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12719                                  
 12720                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12721                                  SetMediaId:
 12722 00001180 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12723 00001183 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12724                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12725 00001187 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12726 00001189 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12727 0000118E 52                      		push	dx
 12728 0000118F E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12729 00001192 5A                      		pop	dx
 12730 00001193 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12731                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12732 00001195 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12733                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12734 0000119A 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12735 0000119C 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12736                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12737 000011A1 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12738 000011A3 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12739 000011A4 57                      		push	di
 12740 000011A5 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12741 000011A6 07                      		pop	es
 12742 000011A7 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12743 000011AA C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12744 000011AE C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12745 000011B1 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12746 000011B4 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12747                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12748                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12749 000011B7 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12750 000011B9 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12751 000011BA 1F                      		pop	ds
 12752 000011BB 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12753 000011BC 07                      		pop	es
 12754 000011BD E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12755 000011C0 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12756 000011C2 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12757 000011C7 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12758 000011CA C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12759                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12760                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12761 000011CF C3                      		retn
 12762                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12763                                  
 12764                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12765 000011D0 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12766 000011D2 F9                      		stc
 12767                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12768 000011D3 C3                      		retn

 12771                                  
 12772                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12773                                  
 12774                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12775                                  ;	BootIo
 12776                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12777                                  ;
 12778                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12779                                  ;
 12780                                  ; input :
 12781                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12782                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12783                                  ;
 12784                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12785                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12786                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12787                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12788                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12789                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12790                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12791                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12792                                  ;
 12793                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12794                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12795                                  ;
 12796                                  ; logic:
 12797                                  ;
 12798                                  ; {
 12799                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12800                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12801                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12802                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12803                                  ; }
 12804                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12805                                  
 12806                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12807                                  BootIo:	
 12808 000011D4 06                      		push	es
 12809 000011D5 57                      		push	di
 12810 000011D6 53                      		push	bx
 12811 000011D7 1E                      		push	ds
 12812 000011D8 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12813                                  
 12814                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12815                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12816                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12817                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12818                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12819                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12820                                  
 12821 000011D9 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12822 000011DC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12823 000011DE 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12824 000011E2 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12825 000011E5 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 12826 000011E8 5B                      		pop	bx
 12827 000011E9 5F                      		pop	di
 12828 000011EA 07                      		pop	es
 12829 000011EB C3                      		retn
 12830                                  
 12831                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12832                                  
 12833                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12834                                  
 12835                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12836                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12838                                  ;
 12839                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12840                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12841                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12842                                  ; history in the flags.
 12843                                  ;
 12844                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12845                                  ;
 12846                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12847                                  ;
 12848                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12849                                  ;
 12850                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12851                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12852                                  ;
 12853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12854                                  
 12855                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12856 000011EC 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12857 000011F0 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12858 000011F2 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12859                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12860 000011F4 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12861                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12862                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12863 000011F9 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12864 000011FB 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12865 00001200 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12866 00001202 E8DE06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12867 00001205 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12868                                  
 12869                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12870                                  
 12871 00001207 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12872 00001209 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12873                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12874                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12875 0000120B 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12876 0000120D 53                      		push	bx
 12877 0000120E BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12878                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12879                                  					; physical drive
 12880 00001211 E8A806                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12881 00001214 5B                      		pop	bx
 12882                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12883 00001215 C3                      		retn
 12884                                  
 12885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12886                                  
 12887                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12888                                  
 12889                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12890                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12891                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12892                                  ;
 12893                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12894                                  ;
 12895                                  ; INPUT :
 12896                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12897                                  ;
 12898                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12899                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12900                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12901                                  
 12902                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12903                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12904 00001216 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12905 0000121A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12906                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12907                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12908 0000121D 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12909                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12910 0000121F 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12911                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12912                                  					; unformatted_media
 12913 00001224 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12914 00001226 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12915                                  
 12916                                  GafDone:				
 12917 00001228 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12918 0000122B C3                      		retn
 12919                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12920                                  
 12921                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12922                                  
 12923                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12924                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12925                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12926                                  ;
 12927                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12928                                  ;
 12929                                  ; input :
 12930                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12931                                  ;
 12932                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12933                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12934                                  
 12935                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12936                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12937 0000122C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12938 00001230 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12939                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12940 00001233 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12941                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12942                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12943 00001238 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12944 0000123C 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12945                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12946 0000123E 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12947                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12948                                  					; unformatted_media
 12949                                  saf_Done:				
 12950 00001243 C3                      		retn
 12951                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12952                                  
 12953                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12954                                  
 12955                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12956                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12957                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12958                                  ;
 12959                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12960                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12961                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12962                                  ;
 12963                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12964                                  
 12965                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12966                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12967 00001244 06                      		push	es
 12968 00001245 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12969 00001249 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12970                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12971 0000124D 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12972                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12973 0000124F 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12974 00001251 0E                      		push	cs
 12975 00001252 07                      		pop	es
 12976 00001253 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12977                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12978 00001256 BF[370C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12979                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12980                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12981 00001259 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12982 0000125B F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12983 0000125D 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12984 0000125F B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12985                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12986                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12987                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12988                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12989                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12990                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12991                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12992 00001262 07                      		pop	es
 12993                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12994                                  		; cf = 0
 12995                                  		;clc
 12996 00001263 C3                      		retn
 12997                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12998                                  nosupport:				
 12999 00001264 07                      		pop	es
 13000 00001265 E96DEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13001                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13002                                  
 13003                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13004                                  
 13005                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13006                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13007                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13008                                  ;
 13009                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13010                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13011                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13012                                  ;	    drive)
 13013                                  ;
 13014                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13015                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13016                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13017                                  ;
 13018                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13019                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13020                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13021                                  ;
 13022                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13023                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13024                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13025                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13026                                  ;
 13027                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13028                                  ;
 13029                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13030                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13031                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13032                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13033                                  ; 
 13034                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13035                                  
 13036                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13037                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13038 00001268 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13039 0000126C C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13040                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13041                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13042 0000126F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13043 00001271 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13044                                  		;
 13045 00001273 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13046                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13047                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13048                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13049 00001277 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13050                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13051 00001279 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13052 0000127B 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13053 0000127D FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13054                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13055 0000127F FEC8                    		dec	al
 13056 00001281 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13057 00001283 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13058 00001285 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13059 00001287 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13060 00001289 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13061 0000128B 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13062 0000128D 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13063                                  GotMediaType:				
 13064 0000128F 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13065                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13066                                  		; cf = 0
 13067                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13068 00001292 C3                      		retn
 13069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13070                                  
 13071                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13072 00001293 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13073 00001296 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13074 00001298 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13075 0000129A 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13076 0000129D 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13077                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13078 0000129F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13079                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13080 000012A1 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13081 000012A3 F9                      		stc
 13082 000012A4 C3                      		retn
 13083                                  
 13084                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13085                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13086                                  		;db    0
 13087                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13088                                  
 13089                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13090                                  
 13091                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13092                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13093                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13094                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13095                                  
 13096                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13097                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13098                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13099                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13100                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13101                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13102                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13103                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13104                                  ;
 13105                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13106                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13107                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13108                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13109                                  ;
 13110                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13111                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13112                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13113                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13114                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13115                                  ;
 13116                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13117                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13118                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13119                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13120                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13121                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13122                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13123                                  
 13124                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13125                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13126                                  
 13127                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13128                                  
 13129                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13130 000012A5 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13131 000012A8 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13132 000012AA 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13133 000012AD 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13134                                  
 13135                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13136                                  
 13137 000012AF 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13138 000012B2 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13139 000012B4 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13140 000012B7 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13141 000012B9 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13142                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13143                                  
 13144                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13145 000012BC CF                      		iret
 13146                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13147                                  
 13148                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 13149 000012BD 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13150 000012BE 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13151                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13152                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13153                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13154 000012C0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13155                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13156                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13157                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13158                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13159                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13160                                  		
 13161                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13162                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13163 000012C5 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13164                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13165 000012C9 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13166                                  
 13167                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13168                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13169                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13170                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13171                                  		
 13172                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13173                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13174 000012CD 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13175 000012D1 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13176                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13177                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13178 000012D4 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13179 000012D8 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13180                                  
 13181 000012DC 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13182                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13183                                  		;pop	bx
 13184 000012DD 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13185                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13186 000012DE 58                      		pop	ax
 13187                                  i2f_iret:
 13188 000012DF CF                      		iret
 13189                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13190                                  
 13191                                  mine:					
 13192 000012E0 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13193 000012E2 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13194 000012E4 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13195 000012E6 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13196 000012E8 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13197                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13198                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13199 000012EA CF                      		iret
 13200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13201                                  
 13202                                  disp_func:				
 13203 000012EB 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 13204 000012ED 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 13205 000012EF 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 13206 000012F1 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 13207                                  
 13208                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 13209                                  
 13210 000012F3 1E                      		push	ds
 13211 000012F4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 13212                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13213                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 13214                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13215                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13216                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13217 000012F9 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13218 000012FD 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13219 00001301 1F                      		pop	ds
 13220                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13221                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13222                                  		;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13223 00001302 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13224                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13225                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13226                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13227                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13228                                  
 13229                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13230                                  
 13231                                  do_subfun_01:				
 13232 00001307 06                      		push	es
 13233 00001308 1E                      		push	ds
 13234 00001309 1E                      		push	ds
 13235 0000130A 07                      		pop	es
 13236                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13237 0000130B 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13238                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13239                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13240 00001310 E8BC03                  		call	install_bds
 13241 00001313 1F                      		pop	ds
 13242 00001314 07                      		pop	es
 13243                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13244                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13245 00001315 CF                      		iret
 13246                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13247                                  
 13248                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 13249                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13250 00001316 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13251                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13252 0000131B C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13253                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13254                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13255                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13256                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13257 0000131F CF                      		iret
 13258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13259                                  
 13260                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13261                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13262                                  
 13263                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13264                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13265                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13266                                  
 13267                                  win386call:				
 13268 00001320 1E                      		push	ds
 13269 00001321 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13270                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]

 13284 00001338 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret

 13386                                  
 13387                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13388                                  ;
 13389                                  ; procedure : HMAPtr
 13390                                  ;
 13391                                  ;		Gets the offset of the free HMA area ( with respect to
 13392                                  ;							seg ffff )
 13393                                  ;		If DOS has not moved high, tries to move DOS high.
 13394                                  ;		In the course of doing this, it will allocate all the HMA
 13395                                  ;		and set the FreeHMAPtr to past the end of the BIOS and 
 13396                                  ;		DOS code. The call to MoveDOSIntoHMA (which is a pointer)
 13397                                  ;		enters the routine in sysinit1 called FTryToMovDOSHi.
 13398                                  ;
 13399                                  ;	RETURNS : offset of free HMA in DI
 13400                                  ;		  BIOS_DATA, seg in DS
 13401                                  ;
 13402                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13403                                  
 13404                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13405                                  HMAPtr:
 13406 000013A0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13407                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13408 000013A5 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13409                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 13410 000013A9 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13411 000013AC 750F                    		jnz	short HMAPtr_retn
 13412 000013AE 803E[FB08]00            		cmp	byte [SysinitPresent], 0
 13413                                  		;cmp	ds:SysinitPresent, 0
 13414 000013B3 7408                    		jz	short HMAPtr_retn
 13415 000013B5 FF1E[F708]              		call	far [MoveDOSIntoHMA]
 13416                                  		;call	ds:MoveDOSIntoHMA ; call far [MoveDOSIntoHMA]
 13417 000013B9 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13418                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 13419                                  HMAPtr_retn:				
 13420 000013BD C3                      		retn
 13421                                  
 13422                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13423                                  
 13424                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13425                                  
 13426                                  ; move a 512 byte sector from ds:si to es:di, do not trash cx
 13427                                  ; but go ahead and update direction flag, si, & di
 13428                                  
 13429                                  move_sector:
 13430                                  
 13431                                  ; The 80386 microprocessor considers an access to WORD 0FFFFh in
 13432                                  ; any segment to be a fault. Theoretically, this could be handled
 13433                                  ; by the fault handler and the behavior of an 8086 could be emulated
 13434                                  ; by wrapping the high byte to offset 0000h. This would be a lot
 13435                                  ; of work and was, indeed, blown off by the Win386 guys. COMPAQ
 13436                                  ; also handles the fault incorrectly in their ROM BIOS for real
 13437                                  ; mode. Their fault handler was only designed to deal with one
 13438                                  ; special case which occurred in a magazine benchmark, but didn't
 13439                                  ; handle the general case worth beans.
 13440                                  ;
 13441                                  ; Simply changing this code to do a byte loop would work okay but
 13442                                  ; would involve a general case performance hit. Therefore, we'll
 13443                                  ; check for either source or destination offsets being within one
 13444                                  ; sector of the end of their segments and only in that case fall
 13445                                  ; back to a byte move.
 13446                                  
 13447 000013BE FC                      		cld
 13448 000013BF 51                      		push	cx
 13449 000013C0 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256
 13450 000013C3 81FE00FE                		cmp	si, 0FE00h
 13451 000013C7 770A                    		ja	short movsec_bytes
 13452 000013C9 81FF00FE                		cmp	di, 0FE00h
 13453 000013CD 7704                    		ja	short movsec_bytes
 13454 000013CF F3A5                    		rep movsw
 13455 000013D1 59                      		pop	cx
 13456 000013D2 C3                      		retn
 13457                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13458                                  
 13459                                  movsec_bytes:				
 13460 000013D3 D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1
 13461 000013D5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13462 000013D7 59                      		pop	cx
 13463 000013D8 C3                      		retn
 13464                                  
 13465                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13466                                  
 13467                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13468                                  
 13469                                  ; check_wrap is a routine that adjusts the starting sector, starting head
 13470                                  ; and starting cylinder for an int 13 request that requests i/o of a lot
 13471                                  ; of sectors. it only does this for fixed disks. it is used in the sections
 13472                                  ; of code that handle ecc errors and dma errors. it is necessary, because
 13473                                  ; ordinarily the rom would take care of wraps around heads and cylinders,
 13474                                  ; but we break down a request when we get an ecc or dma error into several
 13475                                  ; i/o of one or more sectors. in this case, we may already be beyond the
 13476                                  ; number of sectors on a track on the medium, and the request would fail.
 13477                                  ;
 13478                                  ; input conditions:
 13479                                  ;	all registers set up for an int 13 request.
 13480                                  ;
 13481                                  ; output:
 13482                                  ;	dh - contains starting head number for request
 13483                                  ;	cx - contains starting sector and cylinder numbers
 13484                                  ;	(the above may or may not have been changed, and are 0-based)
 13485                                  ;	all other registers preserved.
 13486                                  
 13487                                  check_wrap:	
 13488 000013D9 50                      		push	ax
 13489 000013DA 53                      		push	bx
 13490 000013DB 06                      		push	es
 13491 000013DC 57                      		push	di
 13492 000013DD E86C00                  		call	find_bds	; get pointer to bds for drive in dl
 13493 000013E0 725E                    		jb	short no_wrap	; finished if DOS doesn't use it
 13494                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13495 000013E2 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 13496                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags],fnon_removable
 13497 000013E7 7457                    		jz	short no_wrap	; no wrapping for removable media
 13498 000013E9 268B5D13                		mov	bx, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13499 000013ED 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 13500 000013EF 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh		; extract sector number
 13501 000013F2 39D8                    		cmp	ax, bx		; are we going to wrap?
 13502 000013F4 764A                    		jbe	short no_wrap
 13503 000013F6 F6F3                    		div	bl		; ah=new sector	#, al=#	of head	wraps
 13504                                  
 13505                                  ; we need to be careful here. if the new sector # is 0, then we are on the
 13506                                  ; last sector on that track.
 13507                                  
 13508 000013F8 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 13509 000013FA 7503                    		jnz	short not_on_bound
 13510                                  		; 18/12/2022
 13511 000013FC 48                      		dec	ax ; *
 13512 000013FD 88DC                    		mov	ah, bl		; set sector=BDS_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK
 13513                                  					; if on	boundary
 13514                                  		;dec	al ; *		; also decrement # of head wraps
 13515                                  not_on_bound:				
 13516 000013FF 80E1C0                  		and	cl, 0C0h	; zero out sector #
 13517 00001402 08E1                    		or	cl, ah		; or in	new sector #
 13518 00001404 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; ax = # of head wraps
 13519 00001406 40                      		inc	ax
 13520 00001407 00F0                    		add	al, dh		; add in starting head #
 13521 00001409 80D400                  		adc	ah, 0		; catch	any carry
 13522                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13523 0000140C 268B5D15                		mov	bx, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 13524 00001410 39D8                    		cmp	ax, bx
 13525                                  		;cmp	ax, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 13526                                  					; are we going to wrap around a	head?
 13527 00001412 7632                    		jbe	short no_wrap_head ; do	not lose new head number!!
 13528 00001414 52                      		push	dx		; preserve drive number and head number
 13529 00001415 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13530                                  		;mov	bx, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 13531 00001417 F7F3                    		div	bx		; dx=new head #, ax=# of cylinder wraps
 13532                                  
 13533                                  ; careful here! if new head # is 0, then we are on the last head.
 13534                                  
 13535 00001419 09D2                    		or	dx, dx
 13536 0000141B 7507                    		jnz	short no_head_bound
 13537 0000141D 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		; on boundary. set to BDS_BPB.BPB_HEADS
 13538                                  
 13539                                  ; if we had some cylinder wraps, we need to reduce them by one!!
 13540                                  
 13541 0000141F 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 13542 00001421 7401                    		jz	short no_head_bound
 13543 00001423 48                      		dec	ax		; reduce number	of cylinder wraps
 13544                                  no_head_bound:				
 13545 00001424 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; bh has new head number
 13546 00001426 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore drive number and head number
 13547 00001427 FECF                    		dec	bh		; get it 0-based
 13548 00001429 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; set up new head number in dh
 13549 0000142B 88CF                    		mov	bh, cl
 13550 0000142D 80E73F                  		and	bh, 3Fh		; preserve sector number
 13551 00001430 B306                    		mov	bl, 6
 13552 00001432 86CB                    		xchg	cl, bl
 13553 00001434 D2EB                    		shr	bl, cl		; get ms cylinder bits to ls end
 13554 00001436 00C5                    		add	ch, al		; add in cylinder wrap
 13555 00001438 10E3                    		adc	bl, ah		; add in high byte
 13556 0000143A D2E3                    		shl	bl, cl		; move up to ms	end
 13557 0000143C 86D9                    		xchg	bl, cl		; restore cylinder bits	into cl
 13558 0000143E 08F9                    		or	cl, bh		; or in	sector number
 13559                                  no_wrap:				
 13560 00001440 F8                      		clc
 13561 00001441 5F                      		pop	di
 13562 00001442 07                      		pop	es
 13563 00001443 5B                      		pop	bx
 13564 00001444 58                      		pop	ax
 13565 00001445 C3                      		retn
 13566                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13567                                  
 13568                                  no_wrap_head:				
 13569 00001446 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; do not lose new head number
 13570 00001448 FECE                    		dec	dh		; get it 0-based
 13571 0000144A EBF4                    		jmp	short no_wrap
 13572                                  
 13573                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13574                                  
 13575                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13576                                  
 13577                                  ; this is a special version of the bds lookup code which is
 13578                                  ; based on physical drives rather than the usual logical drives
 13579                                  ; carry is set if the physical drive in dl is found, es:di -> its bds
 13580                                  ; otherwise carry is clear
 13581                                  ;
 13582                                  ; guaranteed to trash no registers except es:di
 13583                                  
 13584                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13585                                  find_bds:	
 13586 0000144C C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]	; point es:di to first bds
 13587                                  fbds_1:					
 13588 00001450 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13589 00001454 7409                    		jz	short fdbs_2
 13590 00001456 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13591                                  					; go to next bds
 13592 00001459 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13593 0000145C 75F2                    		jnz	short fbds_1
 13594 0000145E F9                      		stc
 13595                                  fdbs_2:					
 13596 0000145F C3                      		retn
 13597                                  
 13598                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13599                                  
 13600                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13601                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13602                                  doint:
 13603                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13604 00001460 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 13605                                  					; get physical drive number
 13606                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary !
 13607                                  		;db	8Ah, 96h, 8, 0	; mov dl, [bp+8]	
 13608                                  		
 13609 00001463 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 13610 00001465 08C0                    		or	al, al
 13611 00001467 7410                    		jz	short dointdone	; if zero sectors, return ax=0
 13612                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13613 00001469 8A6603                  		mov	ah, [bp+3]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax+1]
 13614                                  					; get request code
 13615                                  		;db	8Ah, 0A6h, 3, 0	; mov ah, [bp+3]
 13616 0000146C FF7610                  		push	word [bp+10h]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldf]
 13617                                  		;db	0FFh, 0B6h, 10h, 0 ; push word [bp+10h]
 13618 0000146F 9D                      		popf
 13619                                  		;call	far 70h:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:14EAh
 13620                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13621 00001470 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 13622                                  		;;call	call_orig13	; call far 70h:797h
 13623                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 13624 00001475 9C                      		pushf
 13625                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13626 00001476 8F4610                  		pop	word [bp+10h]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldf]
 13627                                  		;db	8Fh, 86h, 10h, 0 ; pop word [bp+10h]
 13628                                  dointdone:				
 13629 00001479 C3                      		retn
 13630                                  
 13631                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13632                                  
 13633                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13634                                  
 13635                                  ; this is the true int 13 handler. we parse the request to see if there is
 13636                                  ; a dma violation. if so, depending on the function, we:
 13637                                  ;   read/write break the request into three pieces and move the middle one
 13638                                  ;	       into our internal buffer.
 13639                                  ;
 13640                                  ;   format     copy the format table into the buffer
 13641                                  ;   verify     point the transfer address into the buffer
 13642                                  ;
 13643                                  ; this is the biggest bogosity of all. the ibm controller does not handle
 13644                                  ; operations that cross physical 64k boundaries. in these cases, we copy
 13645                                  ; the offending sector into the buffer below and do the i/o from there.
 13646                                  
 13647                                  ;struc INT13FRAME
 13648                                  ;.oldbp: resw
 13649                                  ;.oldax: resw 
 13650                                  ;.oldbx: resw
 13651                                  ;.oldcx: resw
 13652                                  ;.olddx: resw
 13653                                  ;.oldds: resw	; now we save caller's ds, too
 13654                                  ;.olddd: resd
 13655                                  ;.oldf:	resw
 13656                                  ;end struc
 13657                                  
 13658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13659                                  
 13660                                  ;   entry conditions:
 13661                                  ;	ah = function
 13662                                  ;	al = number of sectors
 13663                                  ;	es:bx = dma address
 13664                                  ;	cx = packed track and sector
 13665                                  ;	dx = head and drive
 13666                                  ;   output conditions:
 13667                                  ;	no dma violation.
 13668                                  
 13669                                  ;	use extreme caution when working with this code. In general,
 13670                                  ;	  all registers are hot at all times.
 13671                                  ;
 13672                                  ;	question:  does this code handle cases where dma errors
 13673                                  ;	  occur during ecc retries, and where ecc errors occur during
 13674                                  ;	  dma breakdowns???? Hmmmmm.
 13675                                  
 13676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13677                                  
 13678                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13679                                  
 13680 0000147A 90004000                dtype_array:	dd 400090h		; 40:90	is drive type array
 13681                                  
 13682                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13683                                  ;DTYPEARRAY equ dtype_array - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h ; (14F5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13684                                  ; 09/12/2022
 13685                                  DTYPEARRAY equ dtype_array
 13686                                  
 13687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13688                                  
 13689                                  ; stick some special stuff out of mainline
 13690                                  
 13691                                  ; we know we're doing a format command. if we have changeline
 13692                                  ; support, then flag some special changed stuff and set changed
 13693                                  ; by format bit for all logical drives using this physical drive
 13694                                  
 13695                                  format_special_stuff:			
 13696 0000147E 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we have changeline support?
 13697 00001483 7459                    		jz	short format_special_stuff_done ; brif not
 13698 00001485 53                      		push	bx
 13699 00001486 BB4001                  		mov	bx, 140h	; fchanged_by_format+fchanged
 13700 00001489 E83004                  		call	set_changed_dl	; indicate that media changed by format
 13701 0000148C 5B                      		pop	bx
 13702 0000148D EB4F                    		jmp	short format_special_stuff_done
 13703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13704                                  
 13705                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13706                                  
 13707                                  ; we know we've got ec35's on the system. Now see if we're doing
 13708                                  ; a floppy. If so, create a mask and see if this particular
 13709                                  ; drive is an ec35. If so, set dtype_array[drive]=93h
 13710                                  
 13711                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13712                                  ec35_special_stuff:			
 13713 0000148F 84D2                    		test	dl, dl		; floppy or hard disk?
 13714 00001491 7852                    		js	short ec35_special_stuff_done ;	if hard	drive, we're done
 13715 00001493 50                      		push	ax		; see if this PARTICULAR drive is ec35
 13716 00001494 51                      		push	cx
 13717 00001495 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; turn drive number into bit map
 13718 00001497 B001                    		mov	al, 1		; assume drive 0
 13719 00001499 D2E0                    		shl	al, cl		; shift	over correct number of times
 13720 0000149B 8406[3105]              		test	[ec35flag], al	; electrically compatible 3.5 incher?
 13721 0000149F 59                      		pop	cx
 13722 000014A0 58                      		pop	ax
 13723 000014A1 7442                    		jz	short ec35_special_stuff_done
 13724                                  					; done if this floppy is not an	ec35
 13725 000014A3 53                      		push	bx		; free up a far	pointer	(es:bx)

 13727                                  		; 17/10/2022

 13730                                  					; 0070h:3A65h =	2C7h:14F5h
