 14435                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14436                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14437                                  
 14438                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14439 00001749 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14440 0000174B 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14440 00001754 736B6574746520666F-
 14440 0000175D 7220647269766520   
 14441                                  
 14442                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14443 00001765 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14443 0000176E 65737320616E79206B-
 14443 00001777 6579207768656E2072-
 14443 00001780 656164790D0A       
 14444 00001786 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14445                                  
 14446                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14447                                  
 14448                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14449                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14450                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14451                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14452                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14453                                  
 14454                                  chkopcnt:		
 14455 00001788 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14456 0000178D C3                      		retn
 14457                                  
 14458                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14459                                  
 14460                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14461                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14462                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14463                                  ;
 14464                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14465                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14466                                  
 14467                                  mediacheck:	
 14468 0000178E E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14469 00001791 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14470 00001793 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14471 00001796 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14472 00001798 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14473 0000179B 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14474 0000179D 50                      		push	ax
 14475 0000179E 52                      		push	dx
 14476 0000179F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14477                                  					; set logical drive number
 14478 000017A3 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14479 000017A5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14480                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14481                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14482 000017A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 14483 000017A8 58                      		pop	ax
 14484 000017A9 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14485 000017AB BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14486                                  
 14487                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14488                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14489                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14490                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14491                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14492                                  ; status.
 14493                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14494 000017AE 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14495 000017B2 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14496                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14497                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14498                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14499                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14500 000017B6 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14501                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14502                                  
 14503                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14504                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14505                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14506                                  
 14507 000017B8 50                      		push	ax
 14508 000017B9 51                      		push	cx
 14509 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 14510 000017BB E895ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14511 000017BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14512 000017BF 59                      		pop	cx
 14513 000017C0 58                      		pop	ax
 14514 000017C1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14515 000017C3 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14516                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14517 000017C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14518                                  mediaret:				
 14519 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 14520                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14521                                  
 14522                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14523                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14524                                  ; or write.
 14525                                  
 14526                                  mediadovolid:				
 14527 000017C8 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14528 000017CB 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14529 000017CD E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14530 000017D0 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14531 000017D2 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14532                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14533                                  
 14534                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14535                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14536                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14537                                  ; dos.
 14538                                  ;
 14539                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14540                                  
 14541                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14542                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14543                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14544                                  
 14545                                  checklatchio:	
 14546                                  
 14547                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14548                                  			
 14549 000017D5 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14550 000017D8 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14551                                  
 14552                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14553                                  
 14554 000017DA E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14555 000017DD 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14556                                  
 14557                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14558                                  ; expensive verification.
 14559                                  
 14560 000017DF E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14561 000017E2 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14562 000017E4 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14563 000017E7 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14564 000017E9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14565 000017EB 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14566 000017ED E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14567                                  checklatchret:				
 14568 000017F0 E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14569                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14570 000017F3 F9                      		stc
 14571 000017F4 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14572                                  checkret:				
 14573 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 14574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14575                                  
 14576                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14577                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14578                                  ;
 14579                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14580                                  
 14581                                  checkfatvid:				
 14582 000017F6 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14583 000017F9 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14584 000017FB 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14585                                  
 14586                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14587                                  
 14588                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14589                                  
 14590                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14591                                  
 14592                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14593                                  ;
 14594                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14595                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14596                                  ;
 14597                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14598                                  ;
 14599                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14600                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14601                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14602                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14603                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14604                                  ;
 14605                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14606                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14607                                  ; routine.)
 14608                                  ;
 14609                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14610                                  
 14611                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14612                                  check_vid:
 14613                                  
 14614                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14615                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14616                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14617                                  
 14618 000017FD 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14619                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14620                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14621 00001802 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14622 00001804 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14623 00001807 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14624 00001809 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14625 0000180B 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14626                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14627 00001810 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14628                                  					; if not fat system
 14629 00001812 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14630 00001815 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14631 00001817 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14632 0000181A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14633                                  					; definitely changed
 14634 0000181D 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14635                                  
 14636 0000181F 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14637                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14638 00001820 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14639                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14640                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14641                                  		;clc
 14642                                  checkfatret:				
 14643 00001823 C3                      		retn
 14644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14645                                  
 14646                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14647                                  changed_drv:
 14648 00001824 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14649 00001825 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14650                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14651 0000182A C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14653                                  
 14654                                  ; extended id check
 14655                                  
 14656                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14657                                  
 14658                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14659                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14660                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14661                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14662                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14663                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14664                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14665                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14666                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14667                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14668                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14669                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14670                                  ;
 14671                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14672                                  
 14673                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14674                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14675 0000182B 50                      		push	ax
 14676                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14677                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14678 0000182C A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14679                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14680 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14681 00001831 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14682 00001835 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14683 00001837 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14684 0000183A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14685 0000183E 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14686                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14687                                  					; don't know
 14688 00001840 58                      		pop	ax
 14689 00001841 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14690                                  					; reset the flag
 14691                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14692                                  
 14693                                  ext_changed:
 14694 00001843 58                      		pop	ax
 14695                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14696 00001844 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14697                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14698                                  					; disk changed!
 14699                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14700                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14701                                  		;clc
 14702 00001845 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14703                                  
 14704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14705                                  
 14706                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14707                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14708                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14709                                  ;
 14710                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14711                                  
 14712                                  checkio:				
 14713 00001847 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14714 0000184A 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14715 0000184C E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14716 0000184F 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14717 00001851 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 14718 00001854 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14719 00001856 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14720 00001859 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14721 0000185B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14722 0000185D 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14723 0000185F 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14724 00001860 C3                      		retn
 14725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14726                                  
 14727                                  checkioerr:				
 14728 00001861 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14729                                  
 14730                                  checkioret:				
 14731 00001864 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14732 00001865 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14734                                  
 14735                                  no_error_map:				
 14736 00001868 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14737                                  
 14738                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14739                                  
 14740                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14741                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14742                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14743                                  
 14744                                  returnvid:		
 14745 0000186B BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14746                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14747 0000186E E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14748 00001871 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14749 00001873 F9                      		stc
 14750 00001874 C3                      		retn
 14751                                  
 14752                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14753                                  
 14754                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14755                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14756                                  ;
 14757                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14758                                  ; **trashes si**
 14759                                  
 14760                                  media_set_vid:				
 14761 00001875 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14762                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14763                                  
 14764                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14765                                  
 14766                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14767                                  
 14768                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14769                                  
 14770                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14771                                  vid_into_packet:
 14772 00001878 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14773 00001879 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14774 0000187D 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14775 00001880 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14776 00001882 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14777 00001885 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14778 00001888 1F                      		pop	ds
 14779                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14780 00001889 C3                      		retn
 14781                                  
 14782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14783                                  
 14784                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14785                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14786                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14787                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14788                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14789                                  ;
 14790                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14791                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14792                                  ;
 14793                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14794                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14795                                  ;		carry set
 14796                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14797                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14798                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14799                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14800                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14801                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14802                                  ;
 14803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14804                                  
 14805                                  hidensity:
 14806                                  
 14807                                  ; check for correct drive
 14808                                  		
 14809                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14810 0000188A 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14811                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14812                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14813 0000188F 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14814                                  
 14815                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14816                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14817                                  
 14818 00001891 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14819 00001896 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14820                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14821                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14822 00001898 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14823 0000189B 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14824                                  
 14825                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14826                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14827                                  
 14828                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14829 0000189D 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14830 000018A1 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 14831                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14832                                  					; ffOther
 14833 000018A3 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 14834 000018A5 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 14835                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14836                                  					; ff288
 14837 000018A7 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 14838 000018A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14839 000018AB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14840                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14841                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14842 000018AE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14843                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14844                                  					; 2 sides
 14845                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14846 000018B1 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 14847 000018B2 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14848                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14849                                  					; & head max
 14850                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14851 000018B5 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14852                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14853                                  
 14854                                  Is720K:
 14855                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14856 000018B8 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 14857                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14858 000018B9 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14859                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14860                                  
 14861                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14862                                  ;dofloppy:
 14863                                  		;retn
 14864                                  
 14865                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14866                                  
 14867                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14868                                  
 14869                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14870                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14871                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14872                                  ;
 14873                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14874                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14875                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14876                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14877                                  ;
 14878                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14879                                  ;
 14880                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14881                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14882                                  
 14883                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14884 000018BC 06                      		push	es
 14885 000018BD 57                      		push	di
 14886                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14887                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14888 000018BE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14889                                  
 14890                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14891                                  
 14892                                  scan_bds:				
 14893 000018C2 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14894 000018C6 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14895                                  
 14896                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14897                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14898                                  
 14899 000018C8 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14900                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14901                                  get_next_bds:				
 14902 000018CC 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14903                                  					; go to	next bds
 14904 000018CF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14905 000018D2 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14906 000018D4 5F                      		pop	di
 14907 000018D5 07                      		pop	es
 14908 000018D6 C3                      		retn
 14909                                  
 14910                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14911                                  
 14912                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14913                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14914                                  ;
 14915                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14916                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14917                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14918                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14919                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14920                                  
 14921                                  checkromchange:	
 14922                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14923                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14924 000018D7 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14925                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14926                                  					; fchanged
 14927 000018DC C3                      		retn
 14928                                  
 14929                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14930                                  
 14931                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14932                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14933                                  ;
 14934                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14935                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14936                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14937                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14938                                  
 14939                                  resetchanged:	
 14940                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14941                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14942 000018DD 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14943                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14944                                  					; ~fchanged
 14945 000018E2 C3                      		retn
 14946                                  
 14947                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14948                                  
 14949                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14950                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14951                                  ;
 14952                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14953                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14954                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14955                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14956                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14957                                  
 14958                                  haschange:
 14959                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14960                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14961 000018E3 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14962                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14963                                  					; fchangeline
 14964 000018E8 C3                      		retn
 14965                                  
 14966                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14967                                  
 14968                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14969                                  
 14970                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14971                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14972                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14973                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14974                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14975                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14976                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14977                                  
 14978                                  ; set_volume_id
 14979                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14980                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14981                                  ;
 14982                                  ;   on entry:
 14983                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14984                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14985                                  ;
 14986                                  ;   on exit:
 14987                                  ;	carry clear:
 14988                                  ;	   successful call
 14989                                  ;	carry set
 14990                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14991                                  
 14992                                  set_volume_id:				
 14993 000018E9 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14994 000018EA 50                      		push	ax
 14995 000018EB E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14996 000018EE 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14997 000018F0 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14998 000018F3 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14999 000018F5 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15000 000018F8 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15001                                  setvret:				
 15002                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15003                                  		; cf = 0
 15004                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15005 000018FB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15006 000018FC 5A                      		pop	dx
 15007 000018FD C3                      		retn
 15008                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15009                                  
 15010                                  seterr:					
 15011 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15012 000018FF 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15013 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15015 00001901 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15016                                  
 15017                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15018                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15019                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15020                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15021                                  
 15022                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15023                                  
 15024                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15025                                  
 15026                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15027                                  ;
 15028                                  ;   on entry:
 15029                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15030                                  ;
 15031                                  ;   on exit:
 15032                                  ;	carry clear
 15033                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15034                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15035                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15036                                  ;
 15037                                  ;	carry set:
 15038                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15039                                  
 15040                                  read_volume_id:
 15041 00001903 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15042 00001904 51                      		push	cx
 15043 00001905 53                      		push	bx
 15044 00001906 50                      		push	ax
 15045 00001907 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15046 00001908 57                      		push	di
 15047 00001909 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15048 0000190A 07                      		pop	es
 15049 0000190B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15050 0000190E BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15051 00001911 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15052 00001914 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15053 00001916 5F                      		pop	di
 15054 00001917 07                      		pop	es
 15055 00001918 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15056                                  					; # of fats
 15057 0000191C 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15058                                  					; sectors / fat
 15059 00001920 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15060 00001922 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15061                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15062                                  					;
 15063                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15064                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15065 00001926 2EA3[0119]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15066                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15067                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15068 0000192A 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15069                                  					; # root dir entries
 15070 0000192E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15071 00001930 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15072                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15073                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15074 00001932 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15075                                  next_sec:				
 15076 00001933 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15077 00001934 2EA1[0119]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15078                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15079                                  					; get sector #
 15080 00001938 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15081                                  					; sectors / track
 15082 0000193C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15083 0000193E F7F1                    		div	cx
 15084                                  
 15085                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15086                                  
 15087 00001940 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15088                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15089 00001941 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15090 00001943 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15091 00001945 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15092                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15093 00001949 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15094 0000194B 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15095 0000194D E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15096                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15097 00001950 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15098 00001952 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15099 00001955 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15100                                  fvid_loop:
 15101                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15102 00001957 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15103                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15104 00001959 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15105 0000195B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15106 0000195E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15107 00001960 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15108 00001963 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15109                                  ent_loop:				
 15110 00001965 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15111 00001968 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15112 0000196A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15113 0000196B 2EFF06[0119]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15114                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15115                                  					; next sector
 15116 00001970 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15117                                  notfound:
 15118                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15119                                  		;xor	si, si
 15120 00001972 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15121                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15122                                  
 15123                                  found_vid:
 15124                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15125                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15126 00001974 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15127 00001975 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15128 00001977 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15129 00001978 57                      		push	di
 15130 00001979 1E                      		push	ds
 15131 0000197A 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15132 0000197B BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15133 0000197E B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15134                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15135 00001981 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15136                                  		;xor	al, al
 15137                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15138 00001983 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15139 00001984 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15140                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15141                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15142                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15143 00001985 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15144 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15145                                  fvid_ret:
 15146                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15147 00001987 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15148                                  				
 15149 00001989 58                      		pop	ax
 15150                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15151                                  		; cf = 0
 15152                                  		;clc
 15153                                  rvidret:
 15154 0000198A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15155 0000198B 59                      		pop	cx
 15156 0000198C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15157 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15158                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15159                                  
 15160                                  no_vid:
 15161 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15162                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15163                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15164 0000198F EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15166                                  
 15167                                  readviderr:				
 15168 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15169 00001992 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15170 00001993 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15171                                  
 15172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15173                                  
 15174                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15175                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15176                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15177 00001995 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15178                                  		;
 15179                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15180                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15181                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15182                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15183 00001998 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15184 0000199B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15185                                  		;
 15186 0000199E FC                      		cld
 15187 0000199F C3                      		retn
 15188                                  
 15189                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15190                                  
 15191                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15192                                  ;
 15193                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15194                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15195                                  
 15196                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15197 000019A0 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15198 000019A1 56                      		push	si
 15199 000019A2 51                      		push	cx
 15200                                  		
 15201                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15202                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15203                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15204                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15205                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15206                                  		;cld
 15207                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15208 000019A3 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15209                                  
 15210 000019A6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15211 000019A8 59                      		pop	cx
 15212 000019A9 5E                      		pop	si
 15213 000019AA 5F                      		pop	di
 15214 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15215                                  
 15216                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15217                                  
 15218                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15219                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15220                                  ;
 15221                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15222                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15223                                  
 15224                                  check_volume_id:
 15225 000019AC 57                      		push	di
 15226 000019AD 51                      		push	cx
 15227                                  		
 15228                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15229                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15230                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15231                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15232                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15233                                  		;cld
 15234                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15235 000019AE E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15236                                  
 15237 000019B1 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15238 000019B3 59                      		pop	cx
 15239 000019B4 5F                      		pop	di
 15240 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15241                                  
 15242                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15243                                  
 15244                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15245                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15246                                  ;
 15247                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15248                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15249                                  ;
 15250                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15251                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15252                                  ;
 15253                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15254                                  
 15255                                  fat_check:		
 15256 000019B6 50                      		push	ax
 15257 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15258 000019B9 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15259 000019BC 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15260                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15261 000019C0 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15262 000019C2 4E                      		dec	si
 15263                                  okret1:					
 15264 000019C3 58                      		pop	ax
 15265 000019C4 C3                      		retn
 15266                                  
 15267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15268                                  
 15269                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15270                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15271                                  
 15272                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15273                                  
 15274                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15275                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15276                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15277                                  
 15278                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15279                                  
 15280                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15281                                  		;db 0
 15282                                  
 15283                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15284                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15285                                  
 15286                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15287 000019C5 00<rep Bh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15288                                  %endif
 15289                                  
 15290                                  ;align 16
 15291                                  
 15292                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15293                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15294                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15295                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15296                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15297                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15298                                  
 15299                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
