 30471                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; Now check if they offered /L:0
 30472                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 30473                                  
 30474                                  	or	al,al		; --Is the load UMB 0? (-1==unspecified)
 30475                                  	jnz	short husX	; If not, we're done.
 30476                                  
 30477                                  	call	hl_unlink	; If so, however, fix UMBs and strategy.
 30478                                  husX:	
 30479                                  	pop	es
 30480                                  	pop	ds
 30481                                  	pop	cx
 30482                                  	pop	ax
 30483                                  	retn
 30484                                  
 30485                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30486                                  ;*** GetLoadUMB - Returns the load UMB number in AL (-1 if not specified)
 30487                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30488                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30489                                  ; EXIT:   AL == load UMB
 30490                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30491                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30492                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30493                                  
 30494                                  ;GetLoadUMB:
 30495                                  ;	;getdata al, UmbLoad
 30496                                  ;	push	ds
 30497                                  ;	push	cs
 30498                                  ;	pop	ds
 30499                                  ;	mov	al,[UmLoad]
 30500                                  ;	pop	ds
 30501                                  ;	retn
 30502                                  
 30503                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30504                                  ;*** GetLoadSize - Returns the load UMB minimum size (0 if not specified)
 30505                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30506                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30507                                  ; EXIT:   AX == load UMB minimum size
 30508                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30509                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30510                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30511                                  
 30512                                  GetLoadSize:
 30513                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30514                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30515                                  	jmp	short GetSize
 30516                                  
 30517                                  	;push	bx
 30518                                  	;;push	si
 30519                                  	;push	ds
 30520                                  	;push	cs
 30521                                  	;pop	ds
 30522                                  
 30523                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 30524                                  
 30525                                  	;xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 30526                                  	;mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 30527                                  	;shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 30528                                  	;;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 30529                                  	;;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 30530                                  
 30531                                  	;;lodsw				;    ax==size
 30532                                  
 30533                                  	;add	bx,ax
 30534                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 30535                                  
 30536                                  	;pop	ds
 30537                                  	;;pop	si
 30538                                  	;pop	bx
 30539                                  	;retn
 30540                                  
 30541                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30542                                  ;*** GetSize - Returns the UMB in AL's minimum size (0 if not specified)
 30543                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30544                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == a UMB number
 30545                                  ; EXIT:   AX == UMB minimum size, as specified by the user
 30546                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30547                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30548                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30549                                  
 30550                                  GetSize:
 30551                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30552                                  
 30553                                  	push	bx
 30554                                  	;push	si
 30555                                  	;push	ds
 30556                                  	;push	cs
 30557                                  	;pop	ds
 30558                                  
 30559                                  	xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 30560                                  	mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 30561                                  	shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 30562                                  	;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 30563                                  	;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 30564                                  
 30565                                  	;lodsw				;    ax==size
 30566                                  
 30567                                  	add	bx,ax
 30568                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 30569                                  	mov	ax,[cs:bx]
 30570                                  
 30571                                  	;pop	ds
 30572                                  	;pop	si
 30573                                  	pop	bx
 30574                                  	retn
 30575                                  
 30576                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30577                                  ;*** StoLoadUMB - Overrides the load UMB number with what's in AL
 30578                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30579                                  ; ENTRY:   AL == new load UMB
 30580                                  ; EXIT:    None
 30581                                  ; ERROR:   None
 30582                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX
 30583                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30584                                  ; CAUTION: Should only be used if /L:... was used.  Logically, that is the only
 30585                                  ;          time you would ever need this, so that's okay.
 30586                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30587                                  
 30588                                  ;StoLoadUMB:
 30589                                  ;	;putdata UmbLoad, al
 30590                                  ;	push	es
 30591                                  ;	push	cs
 30592                                  ;	pop	es
 30593                                  ;	mov	[es:UmbLoad],al
 30594                                  ;	pop	es
 30595                                  ;	retn
 30596                                  
 30597                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30598                                  ;*** StoLoadSize - Overrides the load UMB minimum size with what's in AX
 30599                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30600                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == new load size
 30601                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30602                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30603                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30604                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30605                                  
 30606                                  StoLoadSize:
 30607                                  	push	dx
 30608                                  
 30609                                  	;getdata dl, UmbLoad		; Put UMB# in DL and size in AX
 30610                                  	;
 30611                                  	;push	ds
 30612                                  	;push	cs
 30613                                  	;pop	ds
 30614                                  	;mov	dl,[UmbLoad]
 30615                                  	;pop	ds	
 30616                                  
 30617                                  	mov	dl,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30618                                  
 30619                                  	cmp	dl,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh
 30620                                  	je	short sls10
 30621                                  
 30622                                  	call	stowSiz			; We've got a function to do just this
 30623                                  sls10:	
 30624                                  	pop	dx
 30625                                  	retn
 30626                                  
 30627                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30628                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 30629                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30630                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 30631                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 30632                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30633                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30634                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30635                                  
 30636                                  hideUMB:
 30637                                  	push	ax
 30638                                  	push	es
 30639                                  
 30640                                  	call	findUMB		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30641                                  	jc	short huX
 30642                                  
 30643                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30644                                  ; HU10--ES - MCB inside UMB; if it's a system MCB,
 30645                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.
 30646                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30647                                  
 30648                                  hu10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30649                                  	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 30650                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30651                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30652                                  	jnz	short hu20
 30653                                  
 30654                                  	call	hideMCB
 30655                                  hu20:	
 30656                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30657                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 30658                                  	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30659                                  
 30660                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30661                                  	mov     ax,es
 30662                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30663                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30664                                  	inc     ax
 30665                                  	mov     es,ax
 30666                                  
 30667                                  	jmp	short hu10
 30668                                  huX:	
 30669                                  	pop	es
 30670                                  	pop	ax
 30671                                  	retn
 30672                                  
 30673                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30674                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 30675                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30676                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30677                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 30678                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30679                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30680                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30681                                  
 30682                                  isTiny:
 30683                                  	push	ax
 30684                                  
 30685                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 30686                                  	;
 30687                                  	;push	ds
 30688                                  	;push	cs
 30689                                  	;pop	ds
 30690                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 30691                                  	;pop	ds
 30692                                  
 30693                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 30694                                  
 30695                                  	or	al,al
 30696                                  	pop	ax
 30697                                  	retn
 30698                                  
 30699                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30700                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 30701                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30702                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30703                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 30704                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30705                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30706                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30707                                  
 30708                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 30709                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30710                                  ;	retn
 30711                                  
 30712                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30713                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30714                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30715                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30716                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30717                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30718                                  ; USES:     None
 30719                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30720                                  
 30721                                  hideMCB:
 30722                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30723                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30724                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30725                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30726                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30727                                  	retn
 30728                                  
 30729                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30730                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30732                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30733                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30734                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30735                                  ; USES:     None
 30736                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30737                                  
 30738                                  unHideMCB:
 30739                                  	push	ax
 30740                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30741                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30742                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30743                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30744                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30745                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30746                                  	pop	ax
 30747                                  	retn
 30748                                  
 30749                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30750                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30751                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30752                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30753                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30754                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30755                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30756                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30757                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30758                                  
 30759                                  findUMB:
 30760                                  	push	ax
 30761                                  	push	cx
 30762                                  	push	dx
 30763                                  
 30764                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30765                                  
 30766                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30767                                  
 30768                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30769                                  	mov	es,ax
 30770                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30771                                  
 30772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30773                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30774                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30775                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30776                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30777                                  
 30778                                  fu10:	
 30779                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30780                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30781                                  
 30782                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30783                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30784                                  
 30785                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30786                                  fu20:	
 30787                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30788                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30789                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30790                                  
 30791                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30792                                  	mov     ax,es
 30793                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30794                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30795                                  	inc     ax
 30796                                  	mov     es,ax
 30797                                  
 30798                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30799                                  fuE:	
 30800                                  	stc
 30801                                  fuX:
 30802                                  	pop	dx
 30803                                  	pop	cx
 30804                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30805                                  	retn
 30806                                  
 30807                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30808                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30810                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30811                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30812                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30813                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30814                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30815                                  
 30816                                  BigFree:
 30817                                  	push	bx
 30818                                  	push	cx
 30819                                  
 30820                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30821                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30822                                  
 30823                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30824                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30825                                  
 30826                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30827                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30828                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30829                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30830                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30831                                  
 30832                                  bf10:	
 30833                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30834                                  	jz	short bf30
 30835                                  
 30836                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30837                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30838                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30839                                  
 30840                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30841                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30842                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30843                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30844                                  
 30845                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30846                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30847                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30848                                  
 30849                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30850                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30851                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30852                                  
 30853                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30854                                  	mov     ax,es
 30855                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30856                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30857                                  	inc     ax
 30858                                  	mov     es,ax
 30859                                  
 30860                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30861                                  
 30862                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30863                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30864                                  	or	bx,bx
 30865                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30866                                  bfE:	
 30867                                  	stc
 30868                                  bfX:
 30869                                  	pop	cx
 30870                                  	pop	bx
 30871                                  	retn
 30872                                  
 30873                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30874                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30875                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30876                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30877                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30878                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30879                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30880                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30881                                  
 30882                                  isSpecified:
 30883                                  	push	ax
 30884                                  
 30885                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30886                                  	mov	bl,al
 30887                                  
 30888                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30889                                  	;
 30890                                  	;push	ds
 30891                                  	;push	cs
 30892                                  	;pop	ds
 30893                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30894                                  	;pop	ds
 30895                                  	
 30896                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30897                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30898                                  
 30899                                  	pop	ax
 30900                                  	retn
 30901                                  
 30902                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30903                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30904                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30905                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30906                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30907                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30908                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30909                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30910                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30911                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30912                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30913                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30914                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30915                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30916                                  
 30917                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30918                                  
 30919                                  shrinkMCB:
 30920                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30921                                  	push	bx
 30922                                  	push	cx
 30923                                  	push	es
 30924                                  
 30925                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30926                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30927                                  
 30928                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30929                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30930                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30931                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30932                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30933                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30934                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30935                                  
 30936                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30937                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30938                                  
 30939                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30940                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30941                                  
 30942                                  	add	ax,bx
 30943                                  	inc	ax
 30944                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30945                                  
 30946                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30947                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30948                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30949                                  	; ax > 0
 30950                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30951                                  
 30952                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30953                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30954                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30955                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30956                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30957                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30958                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30959                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30960                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30961                                  
 30962                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30963                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30964                                  
 30965                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30966                                  	; cf=0
 30967                                  	;clc
 30968                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30969                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30970                                  smE:	
 30971                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30972                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30973                                  	;stc
 30974                                  smX:	
 30975                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30976                                  	pop	es
 30977                                  	pop	cx
 30978                                  	pop	bx
 30979                                  	retn
 30980                                  
 30981                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30982                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30983                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30984                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30985                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30986                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30987                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30988                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30989                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30990                                  ;
 30991                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30992                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30993                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30994                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30995                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30996                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30997                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30998                                  ;       Endif
 30999                                  ;    Endif
 31000                                  ; Endif
 31001                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31002                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31003                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31004                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31005                                  ;    ENDIF
 31006                                  ; ENDIF
 31007                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31008                                  
 31009                                  _hideUMB_:
 31010                                  	push	bx
 31011                                  	push	dx
 31012                                  	push	es
 31013                                  
 31014                                  	mov	al,cl
 31015                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31016                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31017                                  
 31018                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31019                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31020                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31021                                  
 31022                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31023                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31024                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31025                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31026                                  
 31027                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31028                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31029                                  
 31030                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31031                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31032                                  
 31033                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31034                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31035                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 31036                                  hu_10:	
 31037                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31038                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31039                                  
 31040                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31041                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31042                                  
 31043                                  	mov	dx,es
 31044                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31045                                  
 31046                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31047                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31048                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31049                                  
 31050                                  	xor	dx,dx
 31051                                  hu_30:	
 31052                                  	mov	al,cl
 31053                                  
 31054                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31055                                  
 31056                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31057                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31058                                  
 31059                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31060                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31061                                  hu_X:	
 31062                                  	pop	es
 31063                                  	pop	dx
 31064                                  	pop	bx
 31065                                  	retn
 31066                                  
 31067                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31068                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31069                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31070                                  ; Entry:  None
 31071                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31072                                  ; Error:  None
 31073                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31074                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31075                                  
 31076                                  UnFreeze:
 31077                                  	push	ax
 31078                                  	push	es
 31079                                  
 31080                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31081                                  	jc	short ufX
 31082                                  
 31083                                  	mov	es,ax
 31084                                  
 31085                                  ; ------------------------------
 31086                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31087                                  ; ------------------------------
 31088                                  
 31089                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31090                                  	jnz	short uf20
 31091                                  	call	unHideMCB
 31092                                  uf20:	
 31093                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31094                                  
 31095                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31096                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31097                                  
 31098                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31099                                  	mov     ax,es
 31100                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31101                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31102                                  	inc     ax
 31103                                  	mov     es,ax
 31104                                  
 31105                                  	jmp	short uf10
 31106                                  ufX:	
 31107                                  	pop	es
 31108                                  	pop	ax
 31109                                  	retn
 31110                                  
 31111                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31112                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31113                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31114                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31115                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31116                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31117                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31118                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31119                                  
 31120                                  isFrozMCB:
 31121                                  	;push	ax
 31122                                  
 31123                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31124                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31125                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31126                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31127                                  
 31128                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31129                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31130                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31131                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31132                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31133                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31134                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31135                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31136                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31137                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31138                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31139                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31140                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31141                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31142                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31143                                  ifmX:	
 31144                                  	;pop	ax
 31145                                  	retn
 31146                                  
 31147                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31148                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31149                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31150                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31151                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31152                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31153                                  ; USES:     None
 31154                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31155                                  
 31156                                  frezMCB:
 31157                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 31158                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31159                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31160                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31161                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31162                                  	retn
 31163                                  
 31164                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31165                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31166                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31167                                  ; Entry:  None
 31168                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31169                                  ; Error:  None
 31170                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31171                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31172                                  
 31173                                  FreezeUM:
 31174                                  	push	ax
 31175                                  	push	cx
 31176                                  	push	dx
 31177                                  	push	es
 31178                                  
 31179                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 31180                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31181                                  
 31182                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31183                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31184                                  
 31185                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31186                                  	mov	es,ax
 31187                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31188                                  
 31189                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31190                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31191                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31192                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31193                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31194                                  
 31195                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31196                                  	jnz	short fum20
 31197                                  
 31198                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31199                                  fum20:	
 31200                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31201                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31202                                  
 31203                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31204                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31205                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31206                                  
 31207                                  	call	frezMCB
 31208                                  fum30:	
 31209                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31210                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31211                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31212                                  
 31213                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31214                                  	mov     ax,es
 31215                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31216                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31217                                  	inc     ax
 31218                                  	mov     es,ax
 31219                                  	
 31220                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31221                                  
 31222                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31223                                  	pop	dx
 31224                                  	pop	cx
 31225                                  	pop	ax
 31226                                  	retn
 31227                                  
 31228                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31229                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31230                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31231                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31232                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31233                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31234                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31235                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31236                                  
 31237                                  UmbTest:
 31238                                  	push	ax
 31239                                  	push	bx
 31240                                  	push	ds
 31241                                  	push	es
 31242                                  
 31243                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31244                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31245                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31246                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31247                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31248                                  
 31249                                  	pop	es
 31250                                  	pop	ds
 31251                                  	pop	bx
 31252                                  	pop	ax
 31253                                  	retn
 31254                                  
 31255                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31256                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31257                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31258                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31259                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31260                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31261                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31262                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31263                                  
 31264                                  WalkMem:
 31265                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31266                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31267                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31268                                  		   	
 31269                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31270                                  	int	21h
 31271                                  
 31272                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31273                                  	mov	es,ax
 31274                                  
 31275                                  ; ------------------------------
 31276                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31277                                  ; ------------------------------
 31278                                  
 31279                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31280                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31281                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31282                                  
 31283                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31284                                  
 31285                                  	mov     bx,es
 31286                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31287                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31288                                  	inc     bx
 31289                                  	mov     es,bx
 31290                                  		
 31291                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31292                                  um20:	
 31293                                  	mov	ax,es
 31294                                  
 31295                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31296                                  
 31297                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31298                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31299                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31300                                  	retn
 31301                                  
 31302                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31303                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31304                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31305                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31306                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31307                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31308                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31309                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31310                                  
 31311                                  hl_unlink:
 31312                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31313                                  
 31314                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31315                                  	;
 31316                                  	;push	ds
 31317                                  	;push	cs
 31318                                  	;pop	ds
 31319                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31320                                  	;pop	ds
 31321                                  
 31322                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31323                                  
 31324                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31325                                  	int	21h
 31326                                  	retn
 31327                                  
 31328                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31329                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31330                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31331                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31332                                  
 31333                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31334                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31335                                  
 31336                                  ;   Modification log:
 31337                                  ;
 31338                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31339                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31340                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31341                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31342                                  
 31343                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31344                                  
 31345                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31346                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31347                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31348                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31349                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31350                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31351                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31352                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31353                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31354                                  
 31355                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31356                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31357                                  
 31358                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31359                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31360                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31361                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31362                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31363                                  ;    every command execution.
 31364                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31365                                  
 31366                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31367                                  	;
 31368                                  	;push	ds
 31369                                  	;push	cs
 31370                                  	;pop	ds
 31371                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31372                                  	;pop	ds	
 31373                                  
 31374                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31375                                  
 31376                                  	or	al,al
 31377                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31378                                  
 31379                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31380                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31381                                  	retn			; that.
 31382                                  uhu10:	
 31383                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31384                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31385                                  
 31386                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31387                                  	;
 31388                                  	;push	es
 31389                                  	;push	cs
 31390                                  	;pop	es
 31391                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31392                                  	;pop	ds	
 31393                                  
 31394                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31395                                  
 31396                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31397                                  
 31398                                  	pop	ax
 31399                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31400                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31401                                  	retn
 31402                                  
 31403                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31404                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31405                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31406                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31407                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31408                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31409                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31410                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31411                                  
 31412                                  he_unlink:
 31413                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31414                                  
 31415                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31416                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31417                                  
 31418                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31419                                  	int	21h
 31420                                  	retn
 31421                                  
 31422                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31423                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31424                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31425                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31426                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31427                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31428                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31429                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31430                                  
 31431                                  FreeUMBs:
 31432                                  	push	ax
 31433                                  	push	es
 31434                                  
 31435                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31436                                  	jc	short fusX
 31437                                  
 31438                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31439                                  fus10:	
 31440                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31441                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31442                                  	call	freeMCB
 31443                                  fus20:	   
 31444                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31445                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31446                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31447                                  
 31448                                  	mov	ax,es
 31449                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31450                                  	inc	ax
 31451                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31452                                  
 31453                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31454                                  fusX:	
 31455                                  	pop	es
 31456                                  	pop	ax
 31457                                  	retn
 31458                                  
 31459                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31460                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31461                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31462                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31463                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31464                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31465                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31466                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31467                                  
 31468                                  isHideMCB:
 31469                                  	;push	ax
 31470                                  
 31471                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31472                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31473                                  
 31474                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31475                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31476                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31477                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31478                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31479                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31480                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31481                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31482                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31483                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31484                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31485                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31486                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31487                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31488                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31489                                  ihm_x:	
 31490                                  	;pop	ax
 31491                                  	retn
 31492                                  
 31493                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31494                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31495                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31496                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31497                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31498                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31499                                  ; USES:     AX
 31500                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31501                                  
 31502                                  freeMCB:
 31503                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31504                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31505                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31506                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31507                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31508                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31509                                  	retn
 31510                                  
 31511                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31512                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31513                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31514                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31515                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31516                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31517                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31519                                  
 31520                                  HeadUmb:
 31521                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31522                                  
 31523                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31524                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31525                                  	;push	es
 31526                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31527                                  
 31528                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31529                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31530                                  
 31531                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31532                                  	int	21h
 31533                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31534                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31535                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31536                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31537                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31538                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31539                                  
 31540                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31541                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31542                                  xhu_e:	
 31543                                  	;stc
 31544                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31545                                  xhu_x:	
 31546                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31547                                  	;pop	es	
 31548                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31549                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31550                                  	retn
 31551                                  
 31552                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31553                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31554                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31555                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31556                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31557                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31558                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31559                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31560                                  
 31561                                  linkumb:
 31562                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31563                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31564                                  
 31565                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31566                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31567                                  
 31568                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31569                                  	mov	bx,1
 31570                                  	int	21h
 31571                                  lumbX:
 31572                                  	retn
 31573                                  
 31574                                  %endif
 31575                                  
 31576                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31577                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31578                                  
 31579                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31580                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31581                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31582                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31583                                  
 31584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31585                                  ;
 31586                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31587                                  ;
 31588                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31589                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31590                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31591                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31592                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31593                                  ;
 31594                                  ;	Output : none
 31595                                  ;
 31596                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31597                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31598                                  ;
 31599                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31600                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31601                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31602                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31603                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31604                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31605                                  
 31606                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31607                                  InitDevLoad:
 31608                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31609                                  	; ds = cs
 31610 00002773 803E[851E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31611                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31612                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31613 00002778 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31614                                  
 31615                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31616                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31617                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31618                                  ;
 31619                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31620                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31621                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31622                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31623                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31624                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31625                                  ;
 31626                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31627                                  ;
 31628                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31629                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
