 31630                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31631                                  ;	pushf
 31632                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31633                                  ;	popf
 31634                                  ;
 31635                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31636                                  ;
 31637                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31638                                  
 31639                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31640                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31641                                  InitForConv:
 31642                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31643                                  	; ds = cs
 31644 0000277A E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31645                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31646 0000277D 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31647 0000277F E83E04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31648 00002782 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31649 00002785 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31650                                  					;  in low memory
 31651                                  InitForHi:
 31652                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31653                                  	; ds = cs
 31654                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31655                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31656                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31657 00002787 A1[7B1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31658 0000278A 8B16[771E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31659 0000278E 0316[791E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31660 00002792 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31661                                  
 31662                                  InitForLo:
 31663                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31664                                  	; ds = cs
 31665                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31666 00002794 C606[851E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31667                                  initforlo_x:
 31668                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31669                                  	; ds = cs
 31670                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31671                                  					;  we are loading low
 31672                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31673                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31674 00002799 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31675 0000279C 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31676                                  idl1:
 31677 000027A0 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31678                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31679                                  	; ds = cs
 31680                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31681                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31682                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31683                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31684 000027A3 A3[6A1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31685 000027A6 8916[6C1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31686 000027AA C706[6E1E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31687 000027B0 A3[701E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31688 000027B3 C3                      	retn
 31689                                  
 31690                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31691                                  ;
 31692                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31693                                  ;
 31694                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31695                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31696                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31697                                  ;		   current UMB
 31698                                  ;
 31699                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31700                                  
 31701                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31702                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31703                                  	; ds = cs
 31704                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31705                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31706                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31707 000027B4 A1[791E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31708 000027B7 0306[771E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31709 000027BB 2B06[7B1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31710                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31711                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31712                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31713                                  	;stc
 31714                                  	;retn
 31715                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31716 000027BF 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31717 000027C2 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31718                                  spcinumb1:
 31719 000027C4 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31720                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31721                                  	; ds = cs
 31722 000027C5 3B06[681E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31723                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31724                                  spcinumb2:
 31725 000027C9 C3                      	retn
 31726                                  
 31727                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31728                                  ;
 31729                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31730                                  ;
 31731                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31732                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31733                                  ;
 31734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31735                                  
 31736                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31737                                  ;
 31738                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31739                                  ;	push	ds
 31740                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31741                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31742                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31743                                  ;	pop	ds
 31744                                  ;
 31745                                  ;	inc	ax
 31746                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31747                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31748                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31749                                  ;	retn
 31750                                  
 31751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31752                                  ;
 31753                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31754                                  ;
 31755                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31756                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31757                                  ;		 the device.
 31758                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31759                                  ;
 31760                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31761                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31762                                  ;	UMB.
 31763                                  ;
 31764                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31765                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31766                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31767                                  ;
 31768                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31769                                  
 31770                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31771                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31772                                  
 31773                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31774                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31775                                  	; ds = cs
 31776 000027CA BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31777 000027CD B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31778 000027D0 CD21                    	int	21h
 31779                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31780                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31781                                  
 31782 000027D2 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31783                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 31784                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31785 000027D4 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 31786                                  
 31787 000027D6 4B                      	dec	bx
 31788                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31789                                  	; ds = cs
 31790 000027D7 391E[681E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31791                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31792 000027DB 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31793                                  
 31794 000027DD 43                      	inc	bx
 31795                                  
 31796 000027DE B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31797 000027E1 CD21                    	int	21h
 31798 000027E3 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31799                                  
 31800                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31801                                  	;dec	ax
 31802                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31803                                  	;
 31804                                  PrepareMark:
 31805 000027E5 1E                      	push	ds
 31806 000027E6 48                      	dec	ax
 31807 000027E7 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31808 000027E9 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31809 000027EF C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31810 000027F5 40                      	inc	ax
 31811 000027F6 1F                      	pop	ds
 31812                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31813                                  	; ds = cs
 31814                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31815                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31816                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31817                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 31818 000027F7 891E[791E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31819 000027FB A3[771E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31820 000027FE A3[7B1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31821                                  	;
 31822                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31823                                  	; cf=0
 31824                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31825 00002801 C3                      	retn
 31826                                  
 31827                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31828                                  %if 1
 31829                                  gufd_err:
 31830 00002802 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 31831                                  gufd_error:
 31832 00002804 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31833 00002806 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 31834 00002807 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 31835                                  %endif
 31836                                  
 31837                                  ; 09/09/2023
 31838                                  %if 0
 31839                                  gufd_err:
 31840                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31841                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31842                                  	; ds = cs
 31843                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31844                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31845                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31846                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31847                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31848                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31849                                  	stc
 31850                                  	retn
 31851                                  %endif

 31853                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31854                                  ;
 31855                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31856                                  ;
 31857                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31858                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31859                                  ;
 31860                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31861                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31862                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31863                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31864                                  ;
 31865                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31866                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31867                                  ;
 31868                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31869                                  
 31870                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31871                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31872                                  
 31873                                  DevSetMark:
 31874 00002809 06                      	push	es
 31875 0000280A 57                      	push	di
 31876 0000280B 1E                      	push	ds
 31877 0000280C 56                      	push	si
 31878 0000280D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31879 0000280F 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31880 00002815 40                      	inc	ax
 31881 00002816 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31882                                  
 31883                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31884                                  
 31885 0000281A 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31886                                  	
 31887                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31888                                  	; ds = cs
 31889                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31890 0000281B C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 31891                                  
 31892 0000281F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31893 00002821 FC                      	cld
 31894                                  dsm_again:
 31895 00002822 AC                      	lodsb
 31896 00002823 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31897 00002825 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31898 00002827 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31899 00002829 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31900                                  isit_slash:
 31901 0000282B 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31902 0000282D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31903 0000282F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31904 00002831 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31905                                  isit_null:
 31906 00002833 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31907 00002835 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31908 00002837 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31909                                  
 31910 00002839 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31911 0000283C B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31912                                  dsm_next_char:
 31913 0000283F AC                      	lodsb
 31914 00002840 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31915 00002842 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31916 00002844 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31917 00002846 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31918 00002848 AA                      	stosb
 31919 00002849 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31920                                  blankout:
 31921 0000284B E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31922 0000284D B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31923 0000284F F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31924                                  dsm_exit:
 31925 00002851 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31926 00002852 5E                      	pop	si
 31927 00002853 1F                      	pop	ds
 31928 00002854 5F                      	pop	di
 31929 00002855 07                      	pop	es
 31930 00002856 C3                      	retn
 31931                                  
 31932                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31933                                  ;
 31934                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31935                                  ;
 31936                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31937                                  ;
 31938                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31939                                  ;
 31940                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31941                                  ;	in DevSize
 31942                                  ;
 31943                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31944                                  
 31945                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31946                                  SizeDevice:
 31947                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31948                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31949 00002857 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31950 00002858 06                      	push	es
 31951 00002859 1F                      	pop	ds
 31952 0000285A 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31953 0000285C B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31954 0000285F CD21                    	int	21h
 31955 00002861 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31956                                  
 31957 00002863 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31958 00002865 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31959 00002868 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31960 0000286A 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31961 0000286C CD21                    	int	21h
 31962 0000286E 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31963 00002870 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31964 00002873 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31965 00002876 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31966 0000287A 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31967 0000287C 2EC706[681E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31968                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31969 00002883 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31970                                  szdev1:
 31971 00002885 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31972 00002887 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31973 00002889 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31974 0000288B D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31975 0000288D 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31976                                  	;
 31977                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31978 0000288F 2E3B06[861E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31979                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31980                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31981 00002894 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31982                                  
 31983 00002896 2EA1[861E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31984                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31985 0000289A F8                      	clc
 31986                                  szdev2:
 31987 0000289B 2EA3[681E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31988                                  
 31989                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31990                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31991                                  	; cf=0
 31992                                  	;clc
 31993                                  sd_close:
 31994 0000289F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31995                                  					;  carry flag
 31996 000028A0 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31997 000028A3 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31998 000028A5 9D                      	popf
 31999                                  sd_err:
 32000                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32001                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32002 000028A6 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32003 000028A7 C3                      	retn
 32004                                  
 32005                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32006                                  ;
 32007                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32008                                  ;
 32009                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32010                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32011                                  ;
 32012                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32013                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32014                                  ;

 32018

 32020                                  ExecDev:

 32023                                  					;  block for exec with
 32024                                  					;  Load address
 32025 000028B2 2E891E[831E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecReloc],bx

 32027 000028B9 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx

 32033 000028C1 CD21                    	int	21h			;load in the device driver
 32034                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 32035                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 32036                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 32037                                  		; AL = subfunction 
 32038 000028C3 C3                      	retn

 32067                                  ;

 32069                                  ;

 32071                                  ;

 32093                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32094                                  rba_ok:		; 10/04/2019
 32095 000028D5 C3                      	retn

 32097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32098                                  ;
 32099                                  ; procedure : RoundBreakAddr
 32100                                  ;
 32101                                  ;	Input : DevBrkAddr
 32102                                  ;	Output : DevBrkAddr
 32103                                  ;
 32104                                  ;	Rounds DevBrkAddr to a para address so that it is of the form xxxx:0
 32105                                  ;
 32106                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32107                                  
 32108                                  RoundBreakAddr:
 32109 000028D6 2EA1[721E]              	mov	ax,[cs:DevBrkAddr]

 32362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32363                                  ;
 32364                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32365                                  ;
 32366                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32367                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32368                                  ;
 32369                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32370                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32371                                  ;
 32372                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32373                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32374                                  ;
 32375                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32376                                  
 32377                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32378                                  
 32379                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32380                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32381                                  GetHexNum:
 32382 0000298A 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32383 0000298C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32384                                  ghn_next:
 32385 0000298E 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32386 00002991 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32387 00002994 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32388 00002996 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32389 00002999 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32390 0000299B 50                      	push	ax
 32391 0000299C 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32392 0000299E E82206                  	call	delim
 32393 000029A1 58                      	pop	ax
 32394                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32395 000029A2 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 32396 000029A5 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32397 000029A7 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32398                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32399                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32400 000029AA 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32401                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32402                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32403                                  ghn_shift1:
 32404 000029AC D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32405 000029AE D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32406 000029B0 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32407 000029B2 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32408 000029B4 46                      	inc	si
 32409 000029B5 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32410                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32411 000029B7 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32412 000029BA 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32413 000029BD F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32414 000029C1 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32415                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32416                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32417                                  ghn_shift2:
 32418 000029C3 F8                      	clc
 32419 000029C4 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32420 000029C6 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32421 000029C8 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32422 000029CA F8                      	clc
 32423 000029CB C3                      	retn
 32424                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32425                                  ghn_err:
 32426                                  gnib_err:
 32427 000029CC F9                      	stc
 32428                                  ghn_ret:
 32429                                  gnib_ret:
 32430 000029CD C3                      	retn

 32433                                  ;
 32434                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32435                                  ;
 32436                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32437                                  ;
 32438                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 32439                                  ;
 32440                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32441                                  ;
 32442                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32443                                  
 32444                                  GetNibble:
 32445 000029CE 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32446                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32447                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32448 000029D1 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32449 000029D3 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32450 000029D6 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32451 000029D8 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32452 000029DB C3                      	retn
 32453                                  is_it_hex:
 32454 000029DC 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32455                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32456                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32457 000029DF 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32458 000029E1 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32459 000029E4 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32460 000029E6 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32461 000029E9 C3                      	retn
 32462                                  
 32463                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32464                                  ;gnib_err:
 32465                                  ;	stc
 32466                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32467                                  ;	retn

 32474                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.

 32481                                  
 32482                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32483                                  ;
 32484                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32485                                  ;
 32486                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32487                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32488                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32489                                  ;			; DS = data
 32490                                  ;
 32491                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32492                                  ;
 32493                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32494                                  ;
 32495                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32496                                  
 32497                                  umb_insert:
 32498 000029EA 1E                      	push	ds
 32499                                  
 32500                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32501                                  	; ds = cs
 32502                                  
 32503                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32504 000029EB 8E1E[941E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32505                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32506 000029EF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32507 000029F3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32508 000029F5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32509                                  ui_next:
 32510 000029F7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32511                                  					;    new block
 32512 000029F9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32513                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32514                                  					;    last
 32515 000029FB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32516 00002A01 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32517                                  					; N: get next block
 32518 00002A03 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32519                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32520 00002A05 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32521 00002A08 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32522                                  
 32523                                  ui_insert:
 32524 00002A0A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32525 00002A0C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32526                                  
 32527 00002A0D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32528 00002A0F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32529                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32530 00002A11 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32531                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32532 00002A16 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32533                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32534 00002A1C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32535                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32536 00002A20 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32537                                  
 32538                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32539                                  
 32540 00002A26 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32541 00002A28 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32542 00002A2E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32543                                  					; mark as free
 32544 00002A35 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32545                                  					; start & end of new block
 32546 00002A38 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32547                                  
 32548                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32549                                  	
 32550 00002A3D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32551 00002A3F 43                      	inc	bx
 32552 00002A40 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32553 00002A42 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32554                                  
 32555                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32556                                  					; this block
 32557 00002A43 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32558                                  	
 32559 00002A45 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32560 00002A4B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32561 00002A52 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32562 00002A56 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32563                                  
 32564 00002A5D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32565                                  
 32566                                  ui_append:
 32567                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32568 00002A5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32569 00002A64 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32570                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32571                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32572                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32573 00002A6A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32574                                  
 32575 00002A70 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32576 00002A72 40                      	inc	ax
 32577 00002A73 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32578                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32579 00002A75 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32580                                  
 32581 00002A77 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32582                                  
 32583 00002A79 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32584 00002A7F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32585 00002A86 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32586 00002A8A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32587                                  
 32588                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32589 00002A91 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32590 00002A93 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32591 00002A99 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32592                                  					; mark as free
 32593 00002AA0 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32594 00002AA1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32595                                  ui_done:
 32596                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32597 00002AA6 1F                      	pop	ds
 32598                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32599                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32600                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 32601 00002AA7 C3                      	retn

 32618 00002AB0 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 32619 00002AB2 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 32620 00002AB5 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 32621                                  au_coalesce:
 32622                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32623                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 32624                                  ;au_exit:
 32625                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 32626                                  ;	; ds = cs
 32627                                  ;	retn
 32628                                  
 32629                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32630                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 32631                                  
 32632                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32633                                  
 32634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32635                                  ;
 32636                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32637                                  ;
 32638                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32639                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32640                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32641                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32642                                  ;
 32643                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32644                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32645                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32646                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32647                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32648                                  ;
 32649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32650                                  
 32651                                  umb_coalesce:
 32652                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32653                                  	; ds = cs
 32654 00002AB7 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32655                                  
 32656 00002AB8 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32657                                  
 32658                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32659                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32660 00002ABA 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32661 00002ABE 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32662                                  uc_nextfree:
 32663 00002AC3 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32664 00002AC5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32665                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32666 00002AC7 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32667 00002ACC 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32668                                  					; N: get next arena
 32669 00002ACE E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32670 00002AD1 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32671 00002AD3 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32672                                  uc_again:
 32673 00002AD5 E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32674 00002AD8 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32675                                  uc_check:
 32676 00002ADA 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32677 00002ADF 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32678                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32679 00002AE1 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32680 00002AE6 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32681                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32682 00002AE7 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32683 00002AEB 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32684 00002AEE 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32685 00002AF0 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32686                                  
 32687                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32688                                  ;uc_done:
 32689                                  	;retn

 32738                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32739                                  ;
 32740                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32741                                  ;
 32742                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32743                                  ;
 32744                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32745                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32746                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32747                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32748                                  ;				NC
 32749                                  ;			  else 
 32750                                  ;				CY
 32751                                  ;
 32752                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32753                                  ;
 32754                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32755                                  
 32756                                  umb_allocate:
 32757                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32758                                  	; ds = cs
 32759 00002B20 50                      	push	ax
 32760 00002B21 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32761 00002B23 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32762                                  					;   possible
 32763                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32764 00002B26 FF1E[7D1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32765                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32766                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32767                                  					; the largest UMB
 32768 00002B2A 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32769 00002B2C 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32770                                  	
 32771 00002B2E B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32772                                  
 32773                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32774 00002B30 FF1E[7D1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32775                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32776

 32778                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32779                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32780 00002B37 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32781                                  ua_err:
 32782 00002B39 F9                      	stc	
 32783                                  
 32784                                  	;clc
 32785                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32786                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32787                                  	; cf=0
 32788                                  	;clc 
 32789                                  ua_done:
 32790 00002B3A 58                      	pop	ax
 32791 00002B3B C3                      	retn
 32792                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32793                                  ;ua_err:
 32794                                  	;stc
 32795                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 32800                                  ;
 32801                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32802                                  ;
 32803                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head

 32805                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32806                                  ;

 32808                                  
 32809                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32810                                  get_next:
 32811 00002B3C 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32812 00002B41 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32813                                  _get_next_:
 32814 00002B43 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32815 00002B45 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32816 00002B49 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32817 00002B4A 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32818                                  	;clc
 32819                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32820                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32821                                  	; cf=0
 32822                                  	;clc
 32823 00002B4C C3                      	retn
 32824                                  gn_err:
 32825 00002B4D F9                      	stc
 32826                                  	; 11/12/2022

 32828 00002B4E C3                      	retn

 32831                                  ;
 32832                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32833                                  ;
 32834                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32835                                  
 32836                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32837                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32838                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32839                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32840                                  	; ds = cs
 32841 00002B4F E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 32842 00002B52 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32843                                  
 32844                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32845                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32846                                  
 32847                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32848                                  	; ds = cs
 32849                                  
 32850 00002B54 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32851 00002B56 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32852 00002B58 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32853                                  
 32854 00002B5A 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32855 00002B5C 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32856                                  
 32857 00002B5E F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32858                                  
 32859                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32860                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32861 00002B60 49                      	dec	cx
 32862 00002B61 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32863                                  	
 32864 00002B63 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32865 00002B69 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32866                                  					
 32867 00002B70 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32868 00002B74 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32869                                  
 32870                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32871                                  
 32872 00002B7B 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32873 00002B7D 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32874 00002B83 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32875                                  					; mark as free 
 32876 00002B8A 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32877 00002B8B 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32878                                  
 32879                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32880                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32881 00002B90 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32882 00002B94 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32883 00002B97 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32884                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32885                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32886                                  
 32887                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32888                                  
 32889 00002B9A BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32890 00002B9D 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32891 00002BA0 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32892                                  ;scan_next
 32893                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32894                                  scannext:
 32895 00002BA2 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32896 00002BA6 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32897                                  	
 32898 00002BA8 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32899 00002BAA 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32900 00002BAF 40                      	inc	ax
 32901 00002BB0 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32902                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32903                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32904 00002BB2 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32905                                  got_last:
 32906                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32907                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32908 00002BB4 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32909                                  
 32910 00002BB9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32911                                  	;clc
 32912                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32913                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32914                                  	; cf=0
 32915                                  	;clc
 32916 00002BBF C3                      	retn
 32917                                  
 32918                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32919                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32920                                  ;	;stc
 32921                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32922                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32923                                  ;	; cf=1
 32924                                  ;	;stc
 32925                                  ;	retn

 32927                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32928                                  ;
 32929                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32930                                  ;
 32931                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32932                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32933                                  ;
 32934                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32935                                  
 32936                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32937                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32938                                  	; ds = cs
 32939 00002BC0 833E[771E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32940                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32941 00002BC5 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32942 00002BC7 06                      	push	es
 32943 00002BC8 53                      	push	bx
 32944                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32945                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32946                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32947                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32948 00002BC9 8B1E[7B1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32949 00002BCD 2B1E[771E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32950 00002BD1 8E06[771E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32951                                  	
 32952 00002BD5 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32953 00002BD8 CD21                    	int	21h
 32954                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32955                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32956                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32957 00002BDA 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32958 00002BDC 48                      	dec	ax
 32959 00002BDD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32960 00002BDF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32961 00002BE6 5B                      	pop	bx
 32962 00002BE7 07                      	pop	es
 32963                                  su_exit:
 32964 00002BE8 C3                      	retn

 32969                                  ;
 32970                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 32971                                  ;
 32972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32973                                  
 32974                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32975                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32976                                  	; ds = cs
 32977 00002BE9 1E                      	push	ds
 32978 00002BEA 06                      	push	es
 32979                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32980 00002BEB 803E[931E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32981                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32982 00002BF0 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32983                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32984 00002BF2 8E06[941E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32985                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32986 00002BF6 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32987 00002BFB 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32988                                  ulu_next:
 32989 00002C00 E839FF                  	call	get_next
 32990 00002C03 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32991 00002C05 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32992 00002C07 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32993 00002C09 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32994 00002C0B EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32995                                  ulu_found:
 32996                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32997 00002C0D C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32998                                  ulu_x:
 32999 00002C12 07                      	pop	es
 33000 00002C13 1F                      	pop	ds
 33001 00002C14 C3                      	retn

 33003                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33004                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33005                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33006                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33007                                  
 33008                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33009                                  ;
 33010                                  ; Summary:
 33011                                  ;
 33012                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33013                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33014                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33015                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33016                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33017                                  ;
 33018                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33019                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33020                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33021                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33022                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33023                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33024                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33025                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33026                                  ;
 33027                                  ; Example:
 33028                                  ;
 33029                                  ;   [menu]
 33030                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33031                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33032                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33033                                  ;
 33034                                  ;   [network]
 33035                                  ;   include misc
 33036                                  ;   device=foo
 33037                                  ;
 33038                                  ;   [misc]
 33039                                  ;   device=bar
 33040                                  ;   include alternate
 33041                                  ;
 33042                                  ;   [alternate]
 33043                                  ;   device=tar
 33044                                  ;
 33045                                  ;
 33046                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33047                                  ;
 33048                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33049                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33050                                  ;
 33051                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33052                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33053                                  ;   following order:
 33054                                  ;
 33055                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33056                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33057                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33058                                  ;
 33059                                  
 33060                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33061                                  
 33062                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33063                                  
 33064                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33065                                  
 33066                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33067                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33068                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33069                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33070                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33071                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33072                                  
 33073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33074                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33075                                  
 33076                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33077                                  
 33078                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33079                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33080                                  
 33081 00002C15 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 33082                                  
 33083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33084                                  ;
 33085                                  ; procedure : setparms
 33086                                  ;
 33087                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 33088                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 33089                                  ;
 33090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33091                                  
 33092                                  setparms:
 33093 00002C16 1E                      	push	ds
 33094 00002C17 50                      	push	ax
 33095 00002C18 53                      	push	bx
 33096 00002C19 51                      	push	cx
 33097 00002C1A 52                      	push	dx
 33098                                  
 33099 00002C1B 0E                      	push	cs
 33100 00002C1C 1F                      	pop	ds
 33101                                  
 33102 00002C1D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33103 00002C1F 8A1E[9F35]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 33104                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33105 00002C23 43                      	inc	bx
 33106                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 33107                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 33108 00002C24 BA[7734]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 33109                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 33110                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 33111                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33112 00002C27 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 33113                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 33114                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 33115                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33116 00002C2A B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 33117 00002C2D CD21                    	int	21h
 33118                                  
 33119                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33120                                  ;
 33121                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 33122                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h

 33271                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and

 33540                                  ;
 33541                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33542                                  ;
 33543                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33544                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33545                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33546                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33547                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33548                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33549                                  ;
 33550                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33551                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33552                                  ;
 33553                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33554                                  ;
 33555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33556                                  
 33557                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33558                                  
 33559                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33560                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33561                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33562                                  	; ds = cs
 33563

 33572 00002D38 7506                    	jne	short got_80

 33638                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 33639                                  
 33640 00002D7E 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33641                                  
 33642                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33643                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33644                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33645                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33646                                  
 33647                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33648                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33649                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33650                                  
 33651 00002D80 833E[8B34]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 33652 00002D85 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 33653 00002D87 833E[7B34]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33654 00002D8C 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33655                                  
 33656                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 33657                                  
 33658 00002D8E EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33659                                  
 33660                                  ;	check for 320K
 33661

 33664 00002D95 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33665 00002D97 833E[8B34]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8

 33673                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 33674

 33676 00002DA7 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33677                                  
 33678                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33679                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33680                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch

 34072                                  
 34073                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.
 34074 00002EFA 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		; make a filename an asciiz
 34075 00002EFE 47                      	inc	di			; and
 34076 00002EFF AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 34077 00002F00 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 34078                                  
 34079                                  end_copy_file:
 34080 00002F02 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 34081 00002F07 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34082 00002F09 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34083 00002F0B EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 34084                                  
 34085                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 34086 00002F0D E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 34087 00002F10 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34088                                  
 34089 00002F12 E86200                  	call	get2
 34090 00002F15 E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 34091 00002F18 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 34092 00002F1A EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 34093                                  
 34094                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 34095 00002F1C E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 34096 00002F1F 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34097 00002F21 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 34098                                  
 34099                                  org51:
 34100 00002F24 AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 34101 00002F25 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 34102 00002F27 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 34103 00002F29 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 34104 00002F2B 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 34105                                  					; M051 - Start
 34106                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34107                                  	; ds = cs
 34108 00002F2D 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 34109                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 34110 00002F32 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 34111 00002F34 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 34112 00002F36 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 34113 00002F38 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 34114 00002F3A 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 34115 00002F3C 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 34116 00002F41 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 34117 00002F42 FE06[152C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 34118                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 34119                                  					; inserted
 34120 00002F46 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 34121                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 34122                                  
 34123 00002F48 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 34124 00002F4A 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 34125 00002F4C EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 34126                                  
 34127                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 34128                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34129                                  	; ds = cs
 34130 00002F4E 803E[152C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 34131                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 34132 00002F53 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 34133 00002F55 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 34134 00002F5A AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 34135                                  					; M051 - End
 34136                                  org1_brdg:
 34137 00002F5B C606[152C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 34138                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 34139                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 34140 00002F60 E982FE                  	jmp	org1
 34141                                  
 34142                                  at_quote:
 34143 00002F63 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34144                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 34145 00002F68 7407                    	je	short up_level
 34146                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 34147 00002F6A C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 34148 00002F6F EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 34149                                  
 34150                                  up_level:
 34151                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 34152 00002F71 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 34153 00002F75 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 34154                                  
 34155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34156                                  ;
 34157                                  ; procedure : get2
 34158                                  ;
 34159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34160                                  
 34161                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34162                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 34163                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34164                                  get2:
 34165 00002F77 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 34166                                  	;
 34167                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34168                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 34169                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34170 00002F79 26                      	es	
 34171 00002F7A AC                      	lodsb
 34172                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 34173                                  	;inc	si
