 34174                                  	;
 34175 00002F7B 49                      	dec	cx
 34176 00002F7C C3                      	retn
 34177                                  noget:
 34178 00002F7D 59                      	pop	cx
 34179                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34180                                  	; ds = cs
 34181                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34182                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 34183 00002F7E 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 34184 00002F82 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 34185 00002F86 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 34186                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 34187 00002F88 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 34188                                  
 34189                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34190                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 34191                                  ;;	retn
 34192                                  ;;else
 34193                                  ;
 34194                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 34195                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 34196                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 34197                                  ;
 34198                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 34199                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 34200                                  ;;endif
 34201                                  
 34202                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34203 00002F8C C3                      	retn
 34204                                  
 34205                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34206                                  ;
 34207                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34208                                  ;
 34209                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34210                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34211                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34212                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34213                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34214                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34215                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34216                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34217                                  ;
 34218                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34219                                  
 34220                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34221                                  
 34222                                  skip_comment:
 34223 00002F8D E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34224                                  
 34225                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34226                                  	; ds = cs	
 34227                                  
 34228 00002F8F 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34229                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34230 00002F94 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34231                                  
 34232 00002F96 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34233                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34234 00002F9B 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34235                                  
 34236 00002F9D 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34237                                  	
 34238 00002FA0 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34239                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34240 00002FA4 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34241                                  
 34242 00002FA6 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34243                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34244 00002FAB 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34245                                  
 34246 00002FAD 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34247                                  	
 34248 00002FB1 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34249                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34250 00002FB5 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34251                                  skip_cmmt:
 34252 00002FB7 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34253 00002FB9 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34254 00002FBC 46                      	inc	si
 34255 00002FBD 49                      	dec	cx
 34256 00002FBE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34257 00002FC0 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34258                                  no_commt:
 34259 00002FC2 C3                      	retn
 34260                                  
 34261                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34262                                  %if 0
 34263                                  
 34264                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34265                                  
 34266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34267                                  ;
 34268                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34269                                  ;
 34270                                  ;   INPUT
 34271                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34272                                  ;
 34273                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34274                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34275                                  ;
 34276                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34277                                  ;       All
 34278                                  ;
 34279                                  ;   HISTORY
 34280                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34281                                  ;
 34282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34283                                  
 34284                                  kbd_read:
 34285                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34286                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34287                                  
 34288                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34289                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34290                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34291                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34292                                  kbd_loop:
 34293                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 34294                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34295                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34296                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34297                                          int     16h             ;
 34298                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34299                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34300                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34301                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34302                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34303                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34304                                  
 34305                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 34306                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34307                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34308                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34309                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34310                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34311                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34312                                          int     16h             ;
 34313                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34314                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34315                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 34316                                          inc     bx
 34317                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34318                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34319                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34320                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34321                                          int     16h             ;
 34322                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34323                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34324                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34325                                  
 34326                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34327                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34328                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34329                                  	
 34330                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34331                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34332                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34333                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34334                                          call    print
 34335                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34336                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 34337                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34338                                  kbd_notf5:
 34339                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34340                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34341                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34342                                  
 34343                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34344                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34345                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34346                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34347                                          call    print           ;
 34348                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34349                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34350                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34351                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 34352                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34353                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34354                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 34355                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34356                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34357                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34358                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34359                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34360                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34361                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34362                                          retn			;
 34363                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34364                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34365                                          retn			;
 34366                                  
 34367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34368                                  ;
 34369                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34370                                  ;
 34371                                  ;   INPUT
 34372                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34373                                  ;
 34374                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34375                                  ;       None
 34376                                  ;
 34377                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34378                                  ;       None
 34379                                  ;
 34380                                  ;   HISTORY
 34381                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34382                                  ;
 34383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34384                                  
 34385                                  set_numlock:
 34386                                          push    ax
 34387                                          push    ds
 34388                                          sub     ax,ax
 34389                                          mov     ds,ax
 34390                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34391                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34392                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 34393                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34394                                          jmp     short set_done
 34395                                  not_off:
 34396                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34397                                          stc
 34398                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 34399                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 34400                                  set_done:
 34401                                          pop     ds
 34402                                          pop     ax
 34403                                          retn
 34404                                  
 34405                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34406                                  
 34407                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34408                                  ;
 34409                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34410                                  ;
 34411                                  ;   INPUT
 34412                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34413                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34414                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34415                                  ;
 34416                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34417                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34418                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34419                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34420                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34421                                  ;
 34422                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34423                                  ;       All
 34424                                  ;
 34425                                  ;   NOTES
 34426                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34427                                  ;
 34428                                  ;   HISTORY
 34429                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34430                                  ;
 34431                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34432                                  
 34433                                  menu_check:
 34434                                  
 34435                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 34436                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34437                                  
 34438                                          push    cx              ;
 34439                                          push    si              ;
 34440                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34441                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34442                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34443                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34444                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34445                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34446                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34447                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34448                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34449                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34450                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34451                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34452                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34453                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34454                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34455                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34456                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34457                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34458                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34459                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34460                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34461                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34462                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34463                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34464                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34465                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34466                                          call    get_char        ;
 34467                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34468                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34469                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34470                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34471                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34472                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34473                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34474                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34475                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34476                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34477                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34478                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34479                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34480                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34481                                          pop     si              ;
 34482                                          pop     cx              ;
 34483                                  
 34484                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34485                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34486                                  
 34487                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34488                                          jnz	short menu_search
 34489                                  ;
 34490                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34491                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34492                                  ;
 34493                                          call    kbd_read
 34494                                          jnc	short menu_search
 34495                                          jmp	menu_abort
 34496                                  
 34497                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34498                                  
 34499                                  menu_search:
 34500                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34501                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 34502                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34503                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 34504                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34505                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34506                                  
 34507                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34508                                  
 34509                                  menu_color:
 34510                                          push    cx              ;
 34511                                          push    dx              ;
 34512                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34513                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34514                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34515                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34516                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34517                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34518                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34519                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34520                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34521                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34522                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34523                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34524                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34525                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34526                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34527                                  check_color:                    ;
 34528                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34529                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34530                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34531                                  set_color:
 34532                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34533                                          pop     dx              ;
 34534                                          pop     cx              ;
 34535                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34536                                  
 34537                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34538                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34539                                  
 34540                                  menu_found:
 34541                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34542                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34543                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34544                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34545                                  
 34546                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34547                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34548                                  
 34549                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34550                                  
 34551                                  menu_process:
 34552                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34553                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34554                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34555                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34556                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34557                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34558                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34559                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34560                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34561                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34562                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34563                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34564                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34565                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34566                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34567                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34568                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34569                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34570                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34571                                          stc                     ;
 34572                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34573                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34574                                  menu_numlock:
 34575                                          call    set_numlock
 34576                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34577                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34578                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34579                                  
 34580                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34581                                  
 34582                                  menu_default:
 34583                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34584                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34585                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34586                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34587                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34588                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34589                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34590                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 34591                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34592                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34593                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34594                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34595                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34596                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34597                                  timeout_skip:
 34598                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34599                                  
 34600                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34601                                  
 34602                                  menu_item:
 34603                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34604                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34605                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34606                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34607                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34608                                          stc                     ;
 34609                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34610                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34611                                  
 34612                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34613                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34614                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34615                                  
 34616                                  menu_itemfound:
 34617                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34618                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34619                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34620                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34621                                  
 34622                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34623                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34624                                  ;   description...
 34625                                  
 34626                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34627                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34628                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34629                                          call    skip_token      ;
 34630                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34631                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34632                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34633                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 34634                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34635                                  
 34636                                  menu_nextitem:
 34637                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34638                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 34639                                  
 34640                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34641                                  
 34642                                  menu_getdefault:
 34643                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34644                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34645                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34646                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34647                                  menu_valid:
 34648                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 34649                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 34650                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 34651                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 34652                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 34653                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 34654                                  menu_chkdefault:
 34655                                          push    bx              ;
 34656                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34657                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34658                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 34659                                          push    ds              ;
 34660                                          push    es              ;
 34661                                          pop     ds              ;
 34662                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 34663                                          pop     ds              ;
 34664                                          pop     bx              ;
 34665                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 34666                                          inc     bx              ;
 34667                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 34668                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 34669                                  menu_nodefault:
 34670                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 34671                                  menu_setdefault:
 34672                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 34673                                  
 34674                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 34675                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 34676                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 34677                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 34678                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 34679                                  ;   with no timeout)
 34680                                  
 34681                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 34682                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 34683                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 34684                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 34685                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 34686                                  
 34687                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 34688                                  
 34689                                  menu_display:
 34690                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 34691                                          int     10h             ;
 34692                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 34693                                          int     10h             ;
 34694                                          push    es              ;
 34695                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 34696                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 34697                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 34698                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 34699                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 34700                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 34701                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 34702                                          int     10h             ;
 34703                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 34704                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 34705                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 34706                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 34707                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 34708                                  	dec     dl              ;
 34709                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 34710                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 34711                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 34712                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 34713                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 34714                                  menu_clear:
 34715                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 34716                                          pop     es              ;
 34717                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 34718                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 34719                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34720                                  
 34721                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34722                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34723                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34724                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34725                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34726                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34727                                          int     10h             ;
 34728                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34729                                          call    print           ;
 34730                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 34731                                          int     10h             ;
 34732                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 34733                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 34734                                  
 34735                                  menu_nostatus:
 34736                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 34737                                  menu_disploop:
 34738                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 34739                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 34740                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 34741                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 34742                                  
 34743                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 34744                                  
 34745                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 34746                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34747                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 34748                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34749                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 34750                                          int     10h             ;
 34751                                  
 34752                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 34753                                          call    print           ;
 34754                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 34755                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 34756                                          call    print           ;
 34757                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 34758                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34759                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34760                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34761                                  
 34762                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34763                                  
 34764                                  menu_autoselect:
 34765                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34766                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34767                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34768                                  menu_abort:
 34769                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34770                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34771                                  
 34772                                  normal_boot:
 34773                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34774                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34775                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34776                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34777                                          jmp     menu_search
 34778                                  
 34779                                  not_topmenu:
 34780                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34781                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34782                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34783                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34784                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34785                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34786                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34787                                          jmp     menu_found
 34788                                  
 34789                                  not_submenu:
 34790                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34791                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34792                                  
 34793                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34794                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34795                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34796                                  
 34797                                  no_selection:
 34798                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34799                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34800                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34801                                          push    ds              ;
 34802                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34803                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34804                                  
 34805                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34806                                  ;
 34807                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34808                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34809                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34810                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 34811                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34812                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34813                                  ;
 34814                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34815                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34816                                  
 34817                                  copyblock_loop:
 34818                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34819                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34820                                          pop     bx              ;
 34821                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34822                                  
 34823                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 34824                                  
 34825                                  copyblock_begin:
 34826                                          push    ax              ;
 34827                                          push    cx              ;
 34828                                          push    si              ;
 34829                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34830                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34831                                          push    ds              ;
 34832                                          push    cs              ;
 34833                                          pop     ds              ;
 34834                                          call    comp_names      ;
 34835                                          pop     ds              ;
 34836                                          pop     di              ;
 34837                                          pop     si              ;
 34838                                          pop     cx              ;
 34839                                          pop     ax              ;
 34840                                          je	short copyblock_check
 34841                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34842                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34843                                          push    di              ;
 34844                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34845                                          push    ds              ;
 34846                                          push    es              ;
 34847                                          pop     ds              ;
 34848                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34849                                          pop     ds              ;
 34850                                          pop     di              ;
 34851                                  copyblock_check:
 34852                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34853                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34854                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34855                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34856                                  
 34857                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34858                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34859                                          call    get_char        ;
 34860                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34861                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34862                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34863                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 34864                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34865                                  ;
 34866                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34867                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34868                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34869                                  ;
 34870                                  move_config:
 34871                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34872                                          push    cx              ;
 34873                                  ;
 34874                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34875                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34876                                  ;
 34877                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34878                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34879                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34880                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34881                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34882                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34883                                  copy_boot: 
 34884                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34885                                          cs
 34886                                  	lodsb
 34887                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 34888                                          inc     di              ;
 34889                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 34890                                  
 34891                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34892                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34893                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34894                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34895                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34896                                          push    cs              ;
 34897                                          pop     es              ;
 34898                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34899                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34900                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34901                                          je	short l2	;
 34902                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34903                                          inc     si              ;
 34904                                          inc     di              ;
 34905                                          loop    l1              ;
 34906                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34907                                          pop     es              ;
 34908                                  
 34909                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34910                                  
 34911                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34912                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34913                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34914                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34915                                  
 34916                                          push    cx              ;
 34917                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34918                                          pop     cx              ;
 34919                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34920                                          pop     ds              ;
 34921                                  
 34922                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34923                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34924                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34925                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34926                                  ;   is empty.
 34927                                  
 34928                                          push    es              ;
 34929                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34930                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34931                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34932                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34933                                          pop     es
 34934                                  
 34935                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34936                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34937                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34938                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34939                                  
 34940                                  menu_done:
 34941                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34942                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 34943                                          push    es              ;
 34944                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34945                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34946                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34947                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34948                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34949                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34950                                          pop     es              ;
 34951                                  menu_exit:
 34952                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34953                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34954                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34955                                          retn
 34956                                  
 34957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34958                                  ;
 34959                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34960                                  ;
 34961                                  ;   INPUT
 34962                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34963                                  ;
 34964                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34965                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34966                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34967                                  ;
 34968                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34969                                  ;       None
 34970                                  ;
 34971                                  ;   NOTES
 34972                                  ;       None
 34973                                  ;
 34974                                  ;   HISTORY
 34975                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34976                                  ;
 34977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34978                                  
 34979                                  copy_envvar:
 34980                                          push    cx              ;
 34981                                          push    si              ;
 34982                                          push    ds              ;
 34983                                          push    es              ;
 34984                                          push    es              ;
 34985                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34986                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34987                                  
 34988                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34989                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34990                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34991                                  ;
 34992                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34993                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34994                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34995                                  
 34996                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34997                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34998                                          lodsb                   ;
 34999                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35000                                          stc                     ;
 35001                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35002                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 35003                                          stc                     ;
 35004                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35005                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 35006                                          stc                     ;
 35007                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35008                                          inc     cx              ;
 35009                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 35010                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 35011                                          mov     al,0            ;
 35012                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35013                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35014                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35015                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35016                                  copy_varsrch:
 35017                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35018                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35019                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35020                                          push    cx              ;
 35021                                          push    si              ;
 35022                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 35023                                          pop     si              ;
 35024                                          pop     cx              ;
 35025                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35026                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35027                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35028                                  
 35029                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35030                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35031                                  
 35032                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35033                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35034                                          push    si              ;
 35035                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35036                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 35037                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35038                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35039                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 35040                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 35041                                  
 35042                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 35043                                  	es	; 26h
 35044                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 35045                                  
 35046                                  	pop     si
 35047                                  copy_envprep:
 35048                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 35049                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 35050                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 35051                                          je	short copy_envdel
 35052                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35053                                  
 35054                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 35055                                          push    cx              ;
 35056                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35057                                          repne   scasb           ;
 35058                                          pop     cx              ;
 35059                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 35060                                  
 35061                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 35062                                          lodsb                   ;
 35063                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 35064                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35065                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 35066                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35067                                          stosb                   ;
 35068                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35069                                  
 35070                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 35071                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 35072                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 35073                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 35074                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 35075                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35076                                  
 35077                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 35078                                          pop     es              ;
 35079                                          pop     ds              ;
 35080                                          pop     si              ;
 35081                                          pop     cx              ;
 35082                                  
 35083                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35084                                          retn
 35085                                  
 35086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35087                                  ;
 35088                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 35089                                  ;
 35090                                  ;   INPUT
 35091                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35092                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35093                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 35094                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 35095                                  ;
 35096                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35097                                  ;       Same as above
 35098                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 35099                                  ;
 35100                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35101                                  ;       All
 35102                                  ;
 35103                                  ;   NOTES
 35104                                  ;       None
 35105                                  ;
 35106                                  ;   HISTORY
 35107                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35108                                  ;
 35109                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35110                                  
 35111                                  copy_block:
 35112                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 35113                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 35114                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35115                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 35116                                          je	short copy_done ;
 35117                                  
 35118                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 35119                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 35120                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 35121                                  
 35122                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 35123                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 35124                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 35125                                  
 35126                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 35127                                          push    di              ;
 35128                                  
 35129                                          mov     di,szMenu
 35130                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 35131                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35132                                  
 35133                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35134                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 35135                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35136                                  
 35137                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 35138                                          call    srch_block      ;
 35139                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 35140                                          pop     di              ;
 35141                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 35142                                          push    cx              ;
 35143                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 35144                                          push    si              ;
 35145                                          dec     dx              ;
 35146                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 35147                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 35148                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 35149                                          pop     si              ;
 35150                                          pop     cx              ;
 35151                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 35152                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35153                                  
 35154                                  copy_skip:
 35155                                          pop     di
 35156                                  copy_error:
 35157                                          clc                     ;
 35158                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 35159                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35160                                  
 35161                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 35162                                  
 35163                                  copy_line:
 35164                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35165                                          inc     di              ;
 35166                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 35167                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 35168                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 35169                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 35170                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 35171                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 35172                                          inc     di              ;
 35173                                          inc     di              ;
 35174                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 35175                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 35176                                          call    get_char        ;
 35177                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 35178                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35179                                          inc     di              ;
 35180                                  copy_next:
 35181                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 35182                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 35183                                  
 35184                                  copy_nextline:
 35185                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35186                                          jmp     short copy_block
 35187                                  
 35188                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35189                                  ;copy_done:
 35190                                          ;retn
 35191                                  
 35192                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35193                                  ;
 35194                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 35195                                  ;
 35196                                  ;   INPUT
 35197                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 35198                                  ;
 35199                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35200                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 35201                                  ;
 35202                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35203                                  ;       DX
 35204                                  ;
 35205                                  ;   NOTES
 35206                                  ;       None
 35207                                  ;
 35208                                  ;   HISTORY
 35209                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35210                                  ;
 35211                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35212                                  
 35213                                  get_linenum:
 35214                                          push    ax              ;
 35215                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 35216                                          push    cx              ;
 35217                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 35218                                          push    si              ;
 35219                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35220                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 35221                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 35222                                          call    skip_line       ;
 35223                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 35224                                          inc     bx              ;
 35225                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
