 35226                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 35227                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 35228                                          pop     si              ;
 35229                                          pop     cx              ;
 35230                                          pop     ax              ;
 35231                                          retn
 35232                                  
 35233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35234                                  ;
 35235                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 35236                                  ;
 35237                                  ;   INPUT
 35238                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 35239                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 35240                                  ;
 35241                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35242                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 35243                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 35244                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 35245                                  ;
 35246                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35247                                  ;       None
 35248                                  ;
 35249                                  ;   NOTES
 35250                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 35251                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 35252                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 35253                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 35254                                  ;
 35255                                  ;   HISTORY
 35256                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35257                                  ;
 35258                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35259                                  
 35260                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 35261                                          push    ax              ;
 35262                                          push    cx              ;
 35263                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35264                                          push    si              ;
 35265                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35266                                          push    ds              ;
 35267                                          push    es              ;
 35268                                          pop     ds              ;
 35269                                          call    find_block      ;
 35270                                          mov     di,si           ;
 35271                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 35272                                          pop     ds              ;
 35273                                          pop     si              ;
 35274                                          pop     cx              ;
 35275                                          pop     ax              ;
 35276                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 35277                                          retn			;
 35278                                  
 35279                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35280                                  ;
 35281                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 35282                                  ;
 35283                                  ;   INPUT
 35284                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 35285                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 35286                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 35287                                  ;
 35288                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35289                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 35290                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35291                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35292                                  ;
 35293                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35294                                  ;       AX
 35295                                  ;
 35296                                  ;   NOTES
 35297                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 35298                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 35299                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 35300                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 35301                                  ;
 35302                                  ;   HISTORY
 35303                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35304                                  ;
 35305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35306                                  
 35307                                  find_block:
 35308                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 35309                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 35310                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 35311                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 35312                                          je	short check_line ; no
 35313                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 35314                                          jne	short next_line	;
 35315                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35316                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 35317                                  check_line:
 35318                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35319                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 35320                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 35321                                  next_line:
 35322                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35323                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 35324                                  ;find_exit:
 35325                                  ;	retn
 35326                                  
 35327                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35328                                  ;
 35329                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35330                                  ;
 35331                                  ;   INPUT
 35332                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35333                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35334                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35335                                  ;
 35336                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35337                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35338                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35339                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35340                                  ;
 35341                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35342                                  ;       AX
 35343                                  ;
 35344                                  ;   NOTES
 35345                                  ;       None
 35346                                  ;
 35347                                  ;   HISTORY
 35348                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35349                                  ;
 35350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35351                                  
 35352                                  comp_names:
 35353                                          push    di              ;
 35354                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35355                                          call    get_char        ;
 35356                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 35357                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35358                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35359                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35360                                          inc     di              ;
 35361                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35362                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35363                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35364                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35365                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35366                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35367                                          pop     di              ;
 35368                                          retn			;
 35369                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35370                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35371                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35372                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35373                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35374                                  
 35375                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35376                                  
 35377                                  comp_names_safe:
 35378                                          push    ax
 35379                                          push    cx
 35380                                          push	si
 35381                                          push    ds
 35382                                          push    cs
 35383                                          pop     ds
 35384                                          call    comp_names
 35385                                          pop     ds
 35386                                  	pop	si
 35387                                          pop     cx
 35388                                          pop     ax
 35389                                          retn
 35390                                  
 35391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35392                                  ;
 35393                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35394                                  ;
 35395                                  ;   INPUT
 35396                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35397                                  ;
 35398                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35399                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35400                                  ;
 35401                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35402                                  ;       None
 35403                                  ;
 35404                                  ;   NOTES
 35405                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35406                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35407                                  ;
 35408                                  ;   HISTORY
 35409                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35410                                  ;
 35411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35412                                  
 35413                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35414                                          push    ax              ;
 35415                                          push    bx              ;
 35416                                          push    cx              ;
 35417                                          push    dx              ;
 35418                                          push    si              ;
 35419                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35420                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35421                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35422                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35423                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35424                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35425                                          add     dh,3            ;
 35426                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 35427                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35428                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35429                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35430                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35431                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35432                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35433                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35434                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 35435                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35436                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 35437                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35438                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35439                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35440                                  print_other:                    ;
 35441                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 35442                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35443                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35444                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35445                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35446                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35447                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35448                                          int     10h             ;
 35449                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35450                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35451                                          int     10h             ;
 35452                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35453                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35454                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35455                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35456                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35457                                          int     10h             ;
 35458                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35459                                          mov	ax,0920h
 35460                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35461                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35462                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35463                                          int     10h             ;
 35464                                          push    es              ;
 35465                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35466                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35467                                          inc     di              ;
 35468                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35469                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 35470                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 35471                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35472                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 35473                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35474                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35475                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35476                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35477                                          int     10h             ;
 35478                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35479                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35480                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 35481                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35482                                          int     10h             ;
 35483                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 35484                                  print_done:                     ;
 35485                                          pop     es              ;
 35486                                          pop     dx              ;
 35487                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35488                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35489                                          pop     si              ;
 35490                                          pop     dx              ;
 35491                                          pop     cx              ;
 35492                                          pop     bx              ;
 35493                                          pop     ax              ;
 35494                                          retn			;
 35495                                  
 35496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35497                                  ;
 35498                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35499                                  ;
 35500                                  ;   INPUT
 35501                                  ;       None
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35504                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35505                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35506                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35507                                  ;
 35508                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35509                                  ;       None
 35510                                  ;
 35511                                  ;   NOTES
 35512                                  ;       None
 35513                                  ;
 35514                                  ;   HISTORY
 35515                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35516                                  ;
 35517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35518                                  
 35519                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35520                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35521                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35522                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35523                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35524                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35525                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35526                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35527                                          int     21h             ;
 35528                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35529                                  check_time:
 35530                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35531                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35532                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35533                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35534                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35535                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35536                                  show_time:
 35537                                          push    bx              ;
 35538                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35539                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35540                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35541                                          int     10h             ;
 35542                                          push    dx              ;
 35543                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35544                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35545                                          int     10h             ;
 35546                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35547                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35548                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35549                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35550                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35551                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35552                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35553                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35554                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35555                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35556                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35557                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35558                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35559                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35560                                          pop     dx
 35561                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35562                                          int     10h             ;
 35563                                          pop     bx              ;
 35564                                  input_key:
 35565                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35566                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35567                                          int     21h             ;
 35568                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35569                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35570                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35571                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35572                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35573                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35574                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35575                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35576                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35577                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35578                                  got_time:
 35579                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35580                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35581                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35582                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35583                                  got_key:
 35584                                          push    ax              ;
 35585                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35586                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35587                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35588                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35589                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35590                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35591                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35592                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35593                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35594                                          pop     bx   		;
 35595                                  
 35596                                  timeout_disabled:
 35597                                          pop     ax              ;
 35598                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35599                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35600                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35601                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35602                                  
 35603                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35604                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35605                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35606                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35607                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35608                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35609                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35610                                          jmp     short print1
 35611                                  not_up:
 35612                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35613                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35614                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35615                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35616                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35617                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35618                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35619                                  print1: 
 35620                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35621                                  print2: 
 35622                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35623                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35624                                  to_input_key:
 35625                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35626                                  not_down:
 35627                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35628                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35629                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35630                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35631                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35632                                          call    show_status     ;
 35633                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35634                                  not_f8:
 35635                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35636                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35637                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35638                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35639                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35640                                  
 35641                                  normal_key:
 35642                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35643                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35644                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35645                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35646                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35647                                          retn			;
 35648                                  not_backspace:
 35649                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35650                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35651                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35652                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35653                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35654                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35655                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35656                                          jmp	short print2
 35657                                  
 35658                                  select_done:
 35659                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35660                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35661                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35662                                  
 35663                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35664                                  
 35665                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35666                                  
 35667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35668                                  ;
 35669                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35670                                  ;
 35671                                  ;   INPUT
 35672                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35673                                  ;
 35674                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35675                                  ;       None
 35676                                  ;
 35677                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35678                                  ;       None
 35679                                  ;
 35680                                  ;   NOTES
 35681                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35682                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35683                                  ;
 35684                                  ;   HISTORY
 35685                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35686                                  ;
 35687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35688                                  
 35689                                  disp_input:
 35690                                          push    ax
 35691                                          cmp     al,' '
 35692                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35693                                          mov     al,' '
 35694                                  disp_ok:
 35695                                          mov     dl,al
 35696                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35697                                          int     21h
 35698                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35699                                          call    print
 35700                                          pop     ax
 35701                                          retn
 35702                                  
 35703                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35704                                  
 35705                                  disp_num:
 35706                                          push    bx
 35707                                          add     al,'0'
 35708                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35709                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35710                                          mov     cx,1
 35711                                          int     10h
 35712                                          pop     bx
 35713                                          retn
 35714                                  
 35715                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35716                                  ;
 35717                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35718                                  ;
 35719                                  ;   INPUT
 35720                                  ;       None
 35721                                  ;
 35722                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35723                                  ;       None
 35724                                  ;
 35725                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35726                                  ;       None
 35727                                  ;
 35728                                  ;   NOTES
 35729                                  ;       None
 35730                                  ;
 35731                                  ;   HISTORY
 35732                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35733                                  ;
 35734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35735                                  
 35736                                  show_status:
 35737                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35738                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35739                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35740                                          int     10h             ;
 35741                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35742                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35743                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35744                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35745                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35746                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35747                                          int     10h             ;
 35748                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35749                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35750                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35751                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35752                                  show_onoff: 
 35753                                          int     10h
 35754                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35755                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35756                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35757                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35758                                  
 35759                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35760                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35761                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35762                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35763                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35764                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35765                                          int     10h             ;
 35766                                  show_done:                      ;
 35767                                          pop     dx              ;
 35768                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35769                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35770                                          pop     bx              ;
 35771                                          retn			;
 35772                                  
 35773                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35774                                  
 35775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35776                                  ;
 35777                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35778                                  ;
 35779                                  ;   INPUT
 35780                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35781                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35782                                  ;
 35783                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35784                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35785                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35786                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35787                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35788                                  ;
 35789                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35790                                  ;       AX
 35791                                  ;
 35792                                  ;   NOTES
 35793                                  ;       None
 35794                                  ;
 35795                                  ;   HISTORY
 35796                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35797                                  ;
 35798                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35799                                  
 35800                                  skip_token:
 35801                                          call    get_char
 35802                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35803                                          call    any_delim
 35804                                          jne	short skip_token
 35805                                  skip_check_eol:
 35806                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35807                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35808                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35809                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35810                                          clc
 35811                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35812                                  	retn
 35813                                  skip_token_eol:
 35814                                          stc
 35815                                  skip_token_done:
 35816                                          retn
 35817                                  
 35818                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35819                                  ;
 35820                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35821                                  ;
 35822                                  ;   INPUT
 35823                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35824                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35825                                  ;
 35826                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35827                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35828                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35829                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35830                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35831                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35832                                  ;
 35833                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35834                                  ;       AX
 35835                                  ;
 35836                                  ;   NOTES
 35837                                  ;       None
 35838                                  ;
 35839                                  ;   HISTORY
 35840                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35841                                  ;
 35842                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35843                                  
 35844                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35845                                          call    get_char        ;
 35846                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35847                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35848                                          call    delim           ;
 35849                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35850                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35851                                  
 35852                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35853                                  ;
 35854                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35855                                  ;
 35856                                  ;   INPUT
 35857                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35858                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35859                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35860                                  ;
 35861                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35862                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35863                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35864                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35865                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35866                                  ;
 35867                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35868                                  ;       AX
 35869                                  ;
 35870                                  ;   NOTES
 35871                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35872                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35873                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35874                                  ;
 35875                                  ;   HISTORY
 35876                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35877                                  ;
 35878                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35879                                  
 35880                                  skip_opt_line:
 35881                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35882                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35883                                       
 35884                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35885                                  
 35886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35887                                  ;
 35888                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35889                                  ;
 35890                                  ;   INPUT
 35891                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35892                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35893                                  ;
 35894                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35895                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35896                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35897                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35898                                  ;
 35899                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35900                                  ;       AX
 35901                                  ;
 35902                                  ;   NOTES
 35903                                  ;       None
 35904                                  ;
 35905                                  ;   HISTORY
 35906                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35907                                  ;
 35908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35909                                  
 35910                                  skip_line:
 35911                                          call    get_char
 35912                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35913                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35914                                          jne	short skip_line
 35915                                  skip_line_done:
 35916                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35917                                          retn
 35918                                  
 35919                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35920                                  ;
 35921                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35922                                  ;
 35923                                  ;   INPUT
 35924                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35925                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35926                                  ;
 35927                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35928                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35929                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35930                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35931                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35932                                  ;
 35933                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35934                                  ;       AX
 35935                                  ;
 35936                                  ;   NOTES
 35937                                  ;       None
 35938                                  ;
 35939                                  ;   HISTORY
 35940                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35941                                  ;
 35942                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35943                                  
 35944                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35945                                  
 35946                                  get_number:
 35947                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35948                                  num_loop:
 35949                                          call    get_char        ;
 35950                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35951                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35952                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35953                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35954                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35955                                          push    ax              ;
 35956                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35957                                          push    dx              ;
 35958                                          mul     bx              ;
 35959                                          pop     dx              ;
 35960                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35961                                          pop     ax              ;
 35962                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35963                                          cbw                     ;
 35964                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35965                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35966                                  
 35967                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35968                                  ;num_done:
 35969                                          ;retn
 35970                                  
 35971                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35972                                  ;
 35973                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35974                                  ;
 35975                                  ;   INPUT
 35976                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35977                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35978                                  ;
 35979                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35980                                  ;       AL == next character
 35981                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35982                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35983                                  ;
 35984                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35985                                  ;       AX
 35986                                  ;
 35987                                  ;   NOTES
 35988                                  ;       None
 35989                                  ;
 35990                                  ;   HISTORY
 35991                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35992                                  ;
 35993                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35994                                  
 35995                                  get_char:
 35996                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35997                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35998                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35999                                  	es	
 36000                                  	lodsb
 36001                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36002                                          retn			;
 36003                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36004                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36005                                  nearby_ret:
 36006                                          retn
 36007                                  
 36008                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36009                                  ;
 36010                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36011                                  ;
 36012                                  ;   INPUT
 36013                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36014                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36015                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36016                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36017                                  ;
 36018                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36019                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36020                                  ;
 36021                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36022                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36023                                  ;
 36024                                  ;   NOTES
 36025                                  ;       None
 36026                                  ;
 36027                                  ;   HISTORY
 36028                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36029                                  ;
 36030                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36031                                  
 36032                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36033                                  query_user:
 36034                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36035                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36036                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36037                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36038                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36039                                  qu_1:
 36040                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36041                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36042                                          push    ax                      ;
 36043                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36044                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36045                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36046                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36047                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36048                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36049                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36050                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36051                                  query_all:
 36052                                  
 36053                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36054                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36055                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36056                                  
 36057                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36058                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36059                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36060                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36061                                  
 36062                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36063                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36064                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36065                                  find_match:                             ;
 36066                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36067                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36068                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36069                                          inc     di                      ;
 36070                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36071                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36072                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36073                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36074                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36075                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36076                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36077                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36078                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36079                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36080                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36081                                          inc     di                      ;
 36082                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36083                                          int     21h                     ;
 36084                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36085                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36086                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36087                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36088                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36089                                  cmd_notset:
 36090                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36091                                  line_print:                             ;
 36092                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36093                                          es
 36094                                  	lodsb
 36095                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36096                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36097                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36098                                  non_null:                               ;
 36099                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36100                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36101                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36102                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36103                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36104                                  non_space:                              ;
 36105                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36106                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36107                                          int     21h                     ;
 36108                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36109                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36110                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36111                                  
 36112                                  generic_prompt:
 36113                                          call    print                   ;
 36114                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36115                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36116                                          int     16h                     ;
 36117                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36118                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36119                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36120                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36121                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36122                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36123                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36124                                  not_func:
 36125                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36126                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36127                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36128                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36129                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36130                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36131                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36132                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36133                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36134                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36135                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36136                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36137                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36138                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36139                                  
 36140                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36141                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36142                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36143                                  	clc
 36144                                  do_cmd:
 36145                                  	pop     ax			;
 36146                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36147                                  	; cf=0
 36148                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36149                                  	retn
 36150                                  
 36151                                  skip_cmd:
 36152                                  	pop     ax			;
 36153                                  skip_all:
 36154                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36155                                  	stc
 36156                                  	retn
 36157                                  
 36158                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36159                                  ;
 36160                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36161                                  ;
 36162                                  ;   INPUT
 36163                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36164                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36165                                  ;
 36166                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36167                                  ;       None
 36168                                  ;
 36169                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36170                                  ;       None
 36171                                  ;
 36172                                  ;   NOTES
 36173                                  ;       None
 36174                                  ;
 36175                                  ;   HISTORY
 36176                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36177                                  ;
 36178                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36179                                  
 36180                                  print_error:
 36181                                          push    ax
 36182                                          push    bx
 36183                                          push    cx
 36184                                          push    dx
 36185                                          push    ds
 36186                                          push    cs
 36187                                          pop     ds
 36188                                          pushf
 36189                                          call    get_linenum
 36190                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36191                                          call    error_line
 36192                                          popf
 36193                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36194                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36195                                          call    print
 36196                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36197                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36198                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36199                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36200                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36201                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36202                                  pe_1:     
 36203                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36204                                          call    print
 36205                                  pe_ret: 
 36206                                  	pop     ds
 36207                                          pop     dx
 36208                                          pop     cx
 36209                                          pop     bx
 36210                                          pop     ax
 36211                                  	retn
 36212                                  
 36213                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36214                                  
 36215                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36216                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36217                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36218                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36219                                  
 36220                                  disable_autoexec:
 36221                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36222                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36223                                  
 36224                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36225                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36226                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36227                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36228                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36229                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36230                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36231                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36232                                  dae_1:
 36233                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36234                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36235                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36236                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36237                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36238                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36239                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36240                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36241                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36242                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36243                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36244                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36245                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36246                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36247                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36248                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36249                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36250                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36251                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36252                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36253                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36254                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36255                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36256                                          retn
 36257                                  
 36258                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36259                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36260                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36261                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36262                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36263                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36264                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36265                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36266                                  
 36267                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36268                                  
 36269                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36270                                  
 36271                                  
 36272                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36273                                  
 36274                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36275                                  ;
 36276                                  ; procedure : delim
 36277                                  ;
 36278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36279                                  
 36280                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36281                                  ;
 36282                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36283                                  ;
 36284                                  ;any_delim:
 36285                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36286                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36287                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36288                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36289                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36290                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36291                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36292                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36293                                  ;
 36294                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36295                                  
 36296                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36297                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36298                                  delim:
 36299 00002FC3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36300 00002FC5 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36301                                  
 36302 00002FC7 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36303 00002FC9 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36304                                  
 36305                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36306 00002FCB 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36307 00002FCD 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36308 00002FCF 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36309 00002FD1 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36310 00002FD3 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36311 00002FD5 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36312 00002FD7 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36313 00002FD9 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36314 00002FDB 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36315                                  
 36316                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36317                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36318                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36319 00002FDD F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 36320                                  ;endif
 36321                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36322                                  delim_ret:
 36323                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 36324 00002FDE C3                      	retn
 36325

 36334                                  newline:
 36335 00002FDF E80600                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 36336 00002FE2 72FA                    	jc	short nl_ret
 36337 00002FE4 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 36338 00002FE6 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 36339

 36341                                  	;call	getchr
 36342                                  ;nl_ret:
 36343                                  	;retn
 36344                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36345                                  	;jmp	short getchr

 36348                                  %if 1
