 36350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36351                                  ;
 36352                                  ; procedure : getchr
 36353                                  ;
 36354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36355                                  
 36356                                  	; 24/10/2022
 36357                                  getchr:
 36358                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36359                                  	;push	cx
 36360                                  	;mov	cx,[count]
 36361                                  	;jcxz	nochar
 36362                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36363 00002FE8 833E[D203]01            	cmp	word [count],1

 36391                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36392                                  mapcase:
 36393 00002FFF 51                      	push	cx
 36394 00003000 56                      	push	si
 36395 00003001 1E                      	push	ds
 36396                                  
 36397 00003002 06                      	push	es
 36398 00003003 1F                      	pop	ds
 36399                                  
 36400                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36401                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36402                                  ;
 36403                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36404                                  ;;else
 36405                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36406                                  ;;endif
 36407                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36408 00003004 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36409                                  
 36410                                  convloop:
 36411 00003006 AC                      	lodsb
 36412 00003007 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36413 00003009 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36414 0000300B 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36415 0000300D 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36416 0000300F 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36417 00003011 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36418                                  noconv:
 36419                                  
 36420                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36421                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36422                                  ;;
 36423                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36424                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36425                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36426                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36427                                  ;;
 36428                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36429                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36430                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36431                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36432                                  ;check_eol:
 36433                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36434                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36435                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36436                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36437                                  ;;endif
 36438                                  	
 36439                                  	; 02/11/2022

 36441                                  convdone:
 36442 00003016 1F                      	pop	ds
 36443 00003017 5E                      	pop	si
 36444 00003018 59                      	pop	cx
 36445 00003019 C3                      	retn

 36548 00003087 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36549                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36550                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36551                                  	;clc

 36561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36562                                  ;
 36563                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36564                                  ;
 36565                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36566                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36567                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36568                                  ;
 36569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36570                                  
 36571                                  getnum:
 36572 0000308D 53                      	push	bx
 36573 0000308E 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36574                                  b2:
 36575 00003090 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36576 00003093 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36577                                  
 36578 00003095 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36579 00003096 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36580                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36581                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36582 00003097 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36583 00003099 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36584 0000309B 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36585 0000309C 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36586 0000309E 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36587 000030A1 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36588                                  
 36589 000030A3 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36590                                  
 36591 000030A4 E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36592 000030A7 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36593 000030A9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36594 000030AB 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36595 000030AD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36596 000030AF 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36597 000030B1 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36598 000030B3 7417                    	je	short b15
 36599 000030B5 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36600 000030BA 7410                    	je	short b15
 36601 000030BC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36602                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36603                                  	;nop
 36604                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36605                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36606                                  	;nop
 36607                                  	;nop
 36608 000030BE 740C                    	je	short b15
 36609 000030C0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36610 000030C2 7408                    	je	short b15
 36611 000030C4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36612 000030C6 7404                    	je	short b15
 36613 000030C8 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36614 000030CA 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36615                                  b15:
 36616 000030CC 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36617 000030D1 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36618                                  b1:
 36619 000030D6 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36620 000030D8 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36621 000030DA 5B                      	pop	bx
 36622 000030DB C3                      	retn
 36623                                  badnum:
 36624                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36625                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36626 000030DC 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36627                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36628 000030DE 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36629 000030E2 5B                      	pop	bx
 36630 000030E3 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36631 000030E4 C3                      	retn
 36632                                  
 36633                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36634                                  
 36635                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36636                                  
 36637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36638                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36639                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36640                                  ;	si = 0
 36641                                  ;	ax = country id
 36642                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36643                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36644                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36645                                  ;
 36646                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36647                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36648                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36649                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36650                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36651                                  
 36652                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36653                                  
 36654 000030E5 57                      	push	di
 36655 000030E6 50                      	push	ax
 36656 000030E7 52                      	push	dx
 36657                                  
 36658 000030E8 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36659 000030EA 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36660 000030EC B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36661 000030EF E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36662 000030F2 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36663                                  
 36664 000030F4 06                      	push	es
 36665 000030F5 56                      	push	si
 36666                                  
 36667 000030F6 0E                      	push	cs
 36668 000030F7 07                      	pop	es
 36669                                  
 36670 000030F8 BF[5C33]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36671 000030FB B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36672 000030FE F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36673                                  
 36674 00003100 5E                      	pop	si
 36675 00003101 07                      	pop	es
 36676 00003102 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36677                                  
 36678 00003104 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36679 00003107 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36680 0000310A 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36681                                  
 36682 0000310C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36683 0000310D 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36684 0000310F 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36685 00003112 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36686 00003115 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36687 00003118 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36688                                  
 36689 0000311A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36690 0000311C 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36691 00003120 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36692                                  
 36693 00003122 46                      	inc	si
 36694 00003123 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36695 00003124 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36696 00003125 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36697 00003126 5F                      	pop	di
 36698                                  
 36699                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36700 00003127 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36701 0000312A 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36702                                  
 36703                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36704                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36705                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36706 0000312C 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 36707 0000312E 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 36708 00003130 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36709 00003133 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36710                                  
 36711                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36712 00003135 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36713 00003137 46                      	inc	si
 36714 00003138 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36715 00003139 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36716                                  
 36717                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36718                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36719 0000313B 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 36720                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36721 0000313C F9                      	stc
 36722 0000313D C3                      	retn
 36723                                  
 36724                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36725 0000313E 5E                      	pop	si
 36726 0000313F 59                      	pop	cx
 36727 00003140 5F                      	pop	di
 36728 00003141 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36729                                  
 36730                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36731 00003143 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36732                                  
 36733                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36734 00003146 2E8916[6433]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36735 0000314B 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36736 0000314E 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36737 00003151 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36738 00003154 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36739 00003157 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36740

 36785 000031A4 F9                      	stc

 36794 000031B3 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file

 36830 000031E0 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]

 36894                                  getcountrydestination:
 36895                                  
 36896                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36897                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36898                                  ;
 36899                                  ;input: al - data id
 36900                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36901                                  ;on return:
 36902                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36903                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36905                                  
 36906                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36907                                  
 36908 0000320A 51                      	push	cx
 36909                                  	;add	di,74
 36910 0000320B 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36911                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36912 0000320E 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36913 00003211 47                      	inc	di
 36914 00003212 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36915                                  
 36916                                  getcntrydest:

 36924 00003221 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop

 36961                                  
 36962                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36963                                  
 36964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36965                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36966                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36967                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36968                                  ;
 36969                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36970                                  ;	 be moved.
 36971                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36972                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36973                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36974                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36975                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36976                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36978                                  
 36979 00003235 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36980 00003236 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36981 00003239 F9                      	stc
 36982 0000323A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36983 0000323C 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36984 0000323D 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36985                                  
 36986 0000323F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36987 00003241 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36988 00003243 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36989 00003245 F9                      	stc
 36990 00003246 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36991                                  ricb_exit:
 36992 00003248 C3                      	retn

 36999                                  
 37000                                  set_country_path:
 37001                                  
 37002                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37003                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37004                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37005                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37006                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37007                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37008                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37009                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37010                                  
 37011                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37012                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37013                                  
 37014                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37015                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37016                                  
 37017                                  	push	si
 37018                                  
 37019                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37020                                  	push	es
 37021                                  	pop	ds
 37022                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37023                                  
 37024                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37025                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37026                                  
 37027                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37028                                  	inc	si
 37029                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37030                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37031                                  
 37032                                  scp_default_drv:
 37033                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37034                                  	int	21h
 37035                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37036                                  
 37037                                  scp_setdrv:
 37038                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37039                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37040                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37041                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37042                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37043                                  
 37044                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37045                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37046                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37047                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37048                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37049                                  
 37050                                  scp_root_dir:
 37051                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37052                                  scp_path:
 37053                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37054                                  
 37055                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37056                                  scpath_exit:
 37057                                  
 37058                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37059                                  	push	es
 37060                                  	pop	ds
 37061                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37062                                  
 37063                                  	pop	si
 37064                                  	retn
 37065                                  
 37066                                  %endif
 37067                                  
 37068                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37069

 37072                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37073                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37074                                  ;carry set if not.
 37075

 37084 00003254 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
